name: Tanelia Matthews
text: Every single visit always results in me sitting for extended periods of time even with an established appointment time. I think that it’s highly inconsiderate to not respect the patients’ time. Patients are often told to reschedule if they are more than 15 minutes late. How about if you are not called back within 15 minutes of your scheduled appointment time, then patients reschedule for the office to receive their insurance/self-pay money??? There needs to be a better strategy to the scheduling of this facility, so that every patient receives the appropriate care while having their time respected, as well. Everyone does not have 3+ hours of time to sit and wait for a simple doctor’s appointment.

name: Lauren Grzegorczyk
text:
Currently sitting in the parking lot, waiting for a phone appointment with PA Tammie Smith so I can refill important medication. Over an hour and a half ago during my check in, I was told there were 2 people ahead of me. 45 minutes past my appointment time, I’m told there is still 1 person ahead of me. My appointment time was at 1:40, and it is now past 3pm with still no phone call. These phone conferences have never taken more than 5-10 minutes.

I’ve  been coming here for two years, and it’s been absolutely god awful. Never have I been to a Clinic that is this consistency unprofessional, doesn’t pick up the phone half the time, and can easily have you waiting to be seen for up to 2hours, sometimes more. Always severely understaffed as well, which makes me feel bad for the few employees there that are actually kind and decent. If it were not for sliding scale, I would never come back. If you have insurance, avoid this place at all costs. Seriously.

Update: Finally had my phone conference and PA Tammie Smith was rude per usual! Shouldn’t expect anything more from a doctor with multiple 1 star reviews on webmd though, right?

name: cesar ibarra
text: We love our pediatrician at Huntsville Family Health Center.  Dr. Xavier is very thorough and has gone the extra mile when caring for my child- time and time again.  I feel at ease putting the care of my child in Dr. Xavier's hands.  Dr. Xavier listens to me, addresses my concerns, and asks the right questions.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with him and will continue to see him for all of my pediatric needs.

resp.text: Hi Cesar, thank you for your review.  At Huntsville Family Health Center, we strive for excellence in caring for our patients.  We will relay the positive words you shared about Doctor Niraj Xavier with the team.  Thank you for continuing to make us your preferred choice!

name: Michelle Robison
text: Get to appt on time yet always have an hour or more wait before getting called to the back and then still sit in the room longer waiting for the Dr.

name: Chad Chaney
text: Very helpful everytime I go . My wifes diabetic meds costs almost $4000.00 everywhere and here it costs under 100.00

resp.text: Hello Mr. Chaney, thank you for your review about the helpfulness of our team at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will certainly pass your comments along.

name: Tara Caputo
text: I love Dr. Kurecki and his office staff. He is easy to talk to and really listens! He has a lot of great advice, and I am not waiting 2 weeks to see him. He also has a very diverse background and a lot of medical knowledge. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for a family doc!

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Caputo. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our Huntsville Family Health Center team.

name: Sharon Murph
text: The NP was unfriendly, rushing and didn’t listen to my complaints. I want Dr. Lisabeth Williams back!!!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Murph. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Please consider calling us at (855) 724-7325 so that we can directly address this. Thank you.

name: Nina Thomas
text: Joel is awesome I wish the rest of the staff was like him. He assisted us in ten minutes we had the results we’ve been trying to receive for 21 days no one ever answered the phone so we had to drive to the health center

resp.text: Hi Nina.  Thank you for your feedback.  It will be shared with our leadership team.

name: Sadie Lynch
text: Always a warm welcome doctor Williams is the best

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us here at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will pass your comments along to our team!

name: Jeanette Torres
text: The dr don’t know what they doing. They don’t really pay attention to what you want to say. The place is not sanitized right.im very unhappy with everything.

resp.text: Hi Jeanette Torres.   It is disappointing to learn that your experience was not positive, and we would like to get more details.  Please reach out to Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kelley Cornelius
text: This office was absolutely laughable. The worst experience I have ever had at a physician's office.  They scheduled an MRI I arrive at the appointment to be sent away due to the fact that this office did not have the correct orders written.  Reschedule for the following week and again incorrect orders.  Mind you the place where I was having the MRI done also called multiple times and even physically went to this office to try to get things done.  Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

name: Rebecca Louthan
text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Airi Ventura
text: My partner spent over $60 round trip to get help for his medical issues here, waited for over two hours, and then got told that there's nothing he could do about it. No referrals to any specialists, nothing. Don't go here unless you have no other choice.

name: Deanna Resler
text: Best I've had in a long time really cared and got me the right refferal needed for my gallbladder surgery I will defaintly be back for future sickness

text: Worst doctors office I've ever been to PLEASE DO DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME I had a appointment at 1pm waited two hrs! Still didn't see the doctor if I could give it a negative star I would

text:

Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

name: Ryan Robinson
text:
Best Experience Possible!
I used to think that chiropractic work was some sort of medieval practice but Eastern Shore Chiropractic has shown me that it really is advanced comprehensive medicine.

The knowledgeable and friendly staff take a comprehensive approach to treat the issue. They start with a thorough evaluation of the issue and all necessary x-rays, they then create a treatment plan that includes addressing all components of the issue at hand: treating muscles, fascia, and of course the skeletal structure.

Before being treated for my chronic and debilitating neck/spine pain I didn't think I would ever recover. Now, I have hope that I won't have to deal with this the rest of my life! They don't only treat the issue, they also really focus on creating a at-home physical therapy plan to also address what is creating the issue.

Do not consider anywhere else, Eastern Shore Chiropractic is by far the best option, no matter the issue.

resp.text: Ryan, we really appreciate your review! Thank you!

I injured myself a year ago while training to run a race. I was down and out for 7 weeks, unable to hardly walk let alone run.

I was told about Dr. Justin and Dr. Tobie by a friend who had been urging me to go see him. I finally decided I was getting no where on my own and scheduled an appointment. His staff is so friendly and helpful. They were able to work me in fairly quick. I was impressed with their office, their no wait policy and how friendly everyone was. He used ART on my hip, glutes and legs. It took about 4 weeks of visits, but he finally got me back to running. I learned a lot of useful stretches and ways to take care of myself when running.

I have recommended their office to many people and will continue to do so. They're professional, friendly and caring!

I have been to see them for two seperate injuries and they are very good about educating me about what the issue is, working with me on how to prevent it from happening again and ultimately getting me healthy and pain free as quickly as reasonably possible. name: Jonathan Hoffmann
text:
I have seen Dr. Justin for a few different issues over the past year.  After finding his contact information on the A.R.T. providers page, I decided to schedule an appointment.  I was initially hesitant, as I live in Pensacola and would need to drive almost an hour to get to Fairhope.  I can say that each and every trip I make down for an appointment is absolutely worth it.  Unlike other practitioners that I've seen, Dr. Justin took the time to listen to my concerns and give me feedback.  I didn't feel like another patient on the assembly line.

I was also impressed with his ability to provide me with some immediate relief.  Using A.R.T., Dr. Justin was able to help me alleviate some nagging hip flexor pain, and also give me more range of motion in my knee, in one visit.  While some follow-up visits are required to completely alleviate certain issues, I was impressed with how quickly I felt relief.  It was also helpful to know that Dr. Justin was involved in the same workout program as me, so he really understood the nature of my pain.  It's nice to be treated someone who appears to "practice what they preach" in terms of living a healthful life.

And lastly, the staff at Eastern Shore Chiropractic & Sports Clinic is outstanding.  I'm always greeted by friendly faces when I walk in the door and have never had an issue getting an appointment at a time that is convenient for me.  They are honest, and even notified me of a credit that I had on my account that I was unaware of.  I would whole-heartedly recommend Dr. Justin to my family and friends for any sort of sports-related pain issues.

resp.text: ThanksJonathan, we really appreciate this wonderful review. We pride ourselves on helping all our patients not only obtain pain relief but also helping them understand what is causing the pain. We feel that all of our patients are family and as family we want them to feel at home whenever they visit us. Thanks again and please stay in touch.

name: Jamie Botter
text:
I spent nearly 2 years being referred from one specialist to another. Blood test after blood test and retesting.  More x-rays than I count. The entire time I told each one that I thought all my problems were coming from my neck. My insurance denied my  MRI so I was told I have fibromyalgia given more pills.  I had pretty much given up on getting any help.  I finally faced my fears and went to see Dr. O'laire.
He started out by getting x'rays and I thought "here I go again 🙄  another wasted copay!"  When he told me that there was something wrong my neck I wanted to hug him, jump up and down, and cry all at the same time! I've never been so happy for someone to tell me there's something wrong with me!
Dr. O'laire and Phillip have been amazing and have seriously improved my quality of life.  I honestly can't thank them enough!  They have the friendliest staff and I actually don't mind going to my appointments! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!

name: Kelley Norris
text: I started with Vital Force in January 2021.  As a Registered Nurse, you better believe I did some research and asked questions prior to starting.  Joey was instrumental in my decision make an appointment.  He answered a lot  of question before I ever agreed to come in.  The day I went for my consultation, I was at the end of my robe.  I felt horrible. A full 2 years of my body aching bone deep, I didn't have the energy to get beyond half a day. I knew my hormones were way out of balance.  I also knew something was more wrong than being a 50yr old menopausal woman who had to live with it.  The program was explained in detail.  Once my lab work came back.  I mean an extensive panel of labs!  The proof was right there in front of me.  The Team at Vital Force tailored a program to fit my needs.  It took about 3 weeks of taking supplements and IV infusion therapy then I noticed a huge change in my self. Each week, I was better than the last.  I HAVE MY LIFE BACK !!  I feel better than I have in years.  If you don't take time to take care of yourself, you body will make you do it !  If you are in doubt about whether Vital Force is right for you , GO, meet with the team and let them help you be the best version of yourself.

As soon as results came in I got a call from Ryan to discuss my parameters and what all we could do to get everything back in check. Between vitamins, supplements, and prescriptions he has taken the BEST care of me and has been there for me to make sure we get me at my best self!!

text:
We are blessed to have Revive in town!
I had a bad reaction to dental anesthetics and getting a surgery recovery bag infusion with Vitamin C and gluth\athione helped me tremendously! I already had two infusions and will be getting them after each dental treatment.
Yesterday I had an ALA (alpha-lipoic acid) infusion, which is a new addition to the practice. I had a wonderful sense of warmth and relaxation during the infusion, and it helped to soothe bad neuralgic pain after the dental treatment.
ALA has many health benefits, just ask Dr. Russell if it's right for you.
Thank you Dr. Russell for being so helpful, considerate and caring. I really appreciate what you have done for me.
Stephanie is a great nurse with easy hands, she makes the treatment more comfortable and pleasant.
Alisha and Amber have been amazing, sweet and helpful.

I love you guys!

After three months they retested my bloodwork and Everything has been greatly improved and they tweaked things again as to the changes.
This has been a life changer for me and I am shouting it to anyone who will listen.
Also, I have fallen in love with each staff member as the whole Revive team makes you feel so at home and cared for.  They are always positive and patient with any questions I have had. They take such personal interest in each patient.

Reading reviews help me choose discover hope my review helps you. #almostpainfree

text: A friend invited me to one of their dinners.  I was so impressed I decided to go to the clinic and signed up.  The exam and X-rays were amazing. What a messed up spine and neck. I was having bad headaches everyday and my four doctors didn't know why.  But Dr. Samantha did.  It was caused from and old neck injury.   After the first treatment - no more headaches. Wow!  She then started working on my back.  My doctors could not believe how good I looked with Stage 4 cancer.  She helped me with my diet too.  I've taken a few months of treatment and my X-rays look so so much better.  My cancer has shrunk over 60%.  I feel so much better.  I am taking an immunology drug at the Southern Cancer Center.  Almost finished with that.  Dr. Sam is amazing.  She has my one kidney working better too and told me why I was having problems with it.  My kidney Doctor agreed. If you are having any kind of problems go see them.  She will tell you if she can help you or not.  They are extremely caring,  kind and honest.

text: I have been going to Barbara Buettner for a decade, and this lady is firmly in the asset column. Barbara is a kind spirit who has chosen a life of helping others through the laying of hands. Patients get professional and personable service at her Chiropractic Arts, which has more of a family atmosphere than that of a doctor's office. Barbara is the only one that I trust to keep my head on straight! My words can not adequately express the importance of this lady to myself and the community.

name: Holly Lewitas
text: You couldn’t be in better hands than those of Dr. Buettner’s. I am over 70 years old and have been her patient for over 15 years. She has not only saved my back and my hips but also my sanity when I thought there could be no way to end my pain, but she did. She also solved things like my vertigo and taught me why it happened and what I could do to counteract it. There are times I felt like I might have to crawl to get there, but dang it I was going to get there! No, you do not always feel all fixed after one visit, and you do have to work with her and do what she says and yes, it can take more than 1 visit to reverse the damage you have waited too long to work on, but she never makes you come more times than your body needs. She is kind, realistic, honest, and professional. She will tell you the truth. You will definitely learn to respect the value of ice. Bottom line – you can trust her, and you will be so incredibly grateful that you found her and her skilled hands and problem-solving mind. She is the best!

resp.text: Holly, You just described our business!!!! Thanks so much! (We know why you are a writer) LOL!!! Please tell your family and friends to join us!! Happy New Year!!!!

text: I cannot say enough good things about the whole operation at Chiropractic Arts! I’ve struggled with back problems for years and doctors have never been able to properly “fix” me, but after only a few months with Dr. Barb, I am seeing massive improvement in my lower back- pain has been alleviated and range of motion is much better. I’m not “crooked” in the mornings anymore :) Plus she is so easy to get along with and you feel like you’ve just known her for years, even from the first session. I have also recently added in massage therapy with Robyn and she is extremely talented. She has such good pressure to make you really feel like you’ve been worked on (she’s done wonders on my neck in only 2 sessions!) but also has the ability to completely relax your mind and body. And Candace at the front desk just plain rocks- she’s very attentive and always great conversation. I highly recommend Chiropractic Arts not only for their services, but also for the atmosphere. You’ll always leave the office in much better shape than you arrived- feeling better, more positive, and uplifted. PS. Shout out to Tesla, the cutest canine office companion!

text: I came to Dr Kelly as a new patient and was in a great deal of pain, he has helped me so much. His receptionist is so kind and helpful and Dr Kelly was very easy to talk to about my problems and knew just what to do to help me.  I have found my new chiropractor.

name: Dee
text: I do not recommend going here.  I was taking my child to a party at a neighboring business (a dance studio) to celebrate the end of their year and their successful recital.  One of the employees at this business yelled at and berated my children and me for parking close to their building.  Even though they appeared to have NO clients at the time and even though other people had parked and can park in that lot, he decided to take out his frustrations on me.  You have to be really mean spirited to yell at children and a mother doing her best for her children.  Do not go to this business.  And sir, if you're reading, never forget that while someone might not be a client today, he or she could be tomorrow or could know people who might need your services.  What harm would it have done you to allow us to use that spot?  That lot never filled up completely.  You had the space but were too mean spirited to allow us to use it.  Shame on you.

name: Nancy Foster
text: This is a wonderful doctor. He is personable and gives great adjustments! I would recommend him to everyone!

name: Angie Gilliver
text: I suffered from plantar fasciitis for quite a while. An MRI showed that it was ruptured and there was a bone spur. I was referred for physical therapy. After many PT sessions I  felt like it wasn’t working for me and I decided to stop treatments. A friend told me how Dr. Douglass had helped her plantar fasciitis . I was totally skeptical. But now I’m a believer! I have not had one issue with this in the two years since he treated me and was cured in only about 5-6 treatments. During one treatment I mentioned how my arm “goes to sleep and feels like pins and needles” almost every night. He also found the blockage in my arm and treated it with the same instrument he used for the PF. It worked as well for that issue. He is a very caring knowledgeable chiropractor who does much more than spine manipulations. I highly recommend him.

name: Maria Landers

name: Joy Moseley
text:
I went to Dr Eriksen office after attending a seminar at Olive Garden. It was very informative and I was amazed at the results Dr Eriksen’s patients shared with us via video.  The video and presentation also showed the different procedures that could help alleviate or even eliminate the patient’s pain through the use of laser therapy and other means.  It impressed me so much that I set up an appointment with Dr Eriksen at his office Ericksen Chiropractic Laser Surgery Center in Dothan, Alabama.

At my first appointment and throughout my therapy, Dr Eriksen and his staff were and still are such amazing, courteous, and caring individuals. They all make you know that you are in good hands! The good news is that I am so glad that I took that first step! The various treatments Dr Eriksen used worked for me and exceeded my hopes!!

Although a lot of the patients had problems with their back, knees, hips, my problem was with my feet. I had Plantar Fasciitis  which makes it very painful to walk.  The pain  was even worse when I would dance - which I loved to do. After the various therapies my feet no longer hurt. I am no longer hindered from doing what I love and I can maintain an active life style. I look forward to wearing my dancing shoes again & having a good time. Happy feet, happy life!!

If I have future problems, whether it is with my feet, back, knees, ankles, hips, etc, I will definitely return to Dr Eriksen  Chiropractic Laser Center.

I am eager to see the benefits my child gains from chiropractic care. I will definitely be continuing care for myself and seeing Dr. Browning earlier for my next pregnancy! I also have to mention her staff is so wonderful and very helpful too!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Rebecca! We were thrilled to be able to serve you through your pregnancy and look forward to watching thrive under chiropractic care.

name: Kodi Lemon
text: I called in today (5.25.2021) as a new patient in excruciating pain. The friendly staff who answered the phone not only told me to come on in, they would fit me in, but also offered to go ahead and run my insurance while I was on the way, so that part was already out of the way! The whole staff is amazing, the atmosphere is relaxing and pleasant, and Dr. Browning is THE BOMB! Even with being a walk-in, their practice runs so smoothly that I was in and out in no time! I walked into that office feeling so defeated from the pain I have been in, and I walked out a whole new person! I cannot say enough good about my experience, and I've only had ONE! Can't wait for my next appointment with Dr. B! 10/10 would HIGHLY recommend!

resp.text: We are so thankful that you were able to get relief after only one adjustment! Looking forward to seeing you on a regular basis so you never have to feel defeated again!

name: Tiffany Cole
text: I had an amazing experience with New Life chiropractic! There was an extremely thorough assessment of my newborn and gentle care and adjustment. Before his adjustment he was so tense and seemed to be in constant discomfort from the trauma of birth. Afterwards, he is a totally different baby. He is no longer tense, he isn’t favoring turning his head to one side over the other, and he just seems to be more comfortable in general. I recommend anyone to take their new baby to them for a routine adjustment. They also found that he had a tongue and lip tie, which his pediatrician missed. Overall, we had a very wonderful experience and will be visiting again.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience Tiffany! We are thankful that your baby is already doing so much better!

text: As always the staff at New Life Chiropractic today was very professional and helpful. I give them 5 stars and recommend Dr Browning highly. She treated my grandson as an infant and he never had ear problems. Also his sinus would clear with her help. He is now 14.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mrs. Patricia! It has been a blessing to see your grandson do so well under chiropractic care.

Along came my second and I could not walk from sciatic pain and also pregnancy carpal tunnel.
I continued this time and brought my kids and finally convinced my husband. Who did not believe in chiropractic care. He now says he can not live without Dr.Browning! I’m in my third pregnancy and I can tell you I have not had any of the troubles as I didn’t with my first two pregnancies.

Maintaining my body with Dr.Browning has actually minimized the general doctors appointments we previously had for sickness. We just don’t need to go anymore. I highly recommend Chiropractic healing and Dr. Browning!

text:
Dr. Browning is more than a chiropractor she is a friend! Thanks to the chiropractor treatments I received my first pregnancy and birth went great.
My daughter had treatments a week after birth and was a very content baby. I also enjoy the friendly positive atmosphere! Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Rachel! We love your family and are so thankful that you have trusted us with their chiropractic care. It is amazing how much our bodies function when we take care of our nervous system!

name: Gale Gregory
text: I have used Chiropractic care for years,  Dr. Browning has maintained my physical health under her great care.  I love going to my appointments! SHE'S GREAT!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Gregory for your kind words! We love seeing you WELL!

name: Lyndsay Riffle Heatherly
text:
After seeing Dr. Browning consistently for over a year, myself and my two young children have experienced major improvements in various areas of our health and well-being.

Her practice is family-oriented, yet also professional- it's a very unique balance!

She is whole body wellness minded, like myself, and she was exactly the chiropractor I was looking for for myself and my family.

I only wish we had started seeing her sooner!

resp.text:
Thank you Lyndsay for your kind words! It is amazing how much healthier our bodies function when we take care of our life-line. We are glad that your family is reaping the benefits.

-Dr. Browning’s Team

name: Keshia Green
text: My toddler and I love going to see Dr. Browning! She's amazing with my 3 year old, who even asks to go get adjusted. I've been seeing her weekly since the beginning of my pregnancy (monthly before), and I can feel a huge difference between my current pregnancy and my last. She truly cares and is passionate about chiropractic and what it can do for your overall health.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Keshia! We love that you have trusted us with your and your daughter’s (and future children!) chiropractic care.

name: Ashley LouAllen
text: Dr. Browning and her staff are the absolute best! I had a difficult pregnancy and was told by HH OBER to go see a chiropractor or a physical therapist for treatment. My boss referred me to Dr. Browning and I went from barely able to walk during my second trimester to feeling normal again after a few visits. I’m now taking my newborn to her for treatment and we are so happy with the results!

name: Tricia Mitchell
text: Dr. Browning is very kind and knowledgeable. The staff is friendly and always have a smile!  The best!!

name: Kimberly McFadden
text: We love Dr. Browning at New Life Family Chiropractic!! We originally started going after baby number 6 was born with a large hematoma on his head. After regular care for him it resolved, he stopped screaming constantly and you can’t even tell now. We saw such a difference in him that now my husband, myself and all six of our children see her regularly. We have seen such improvements in everyone in our home. Thank you for providing such wonderful care!!!

name: Heather Smith
text: Where do I even begin!?!? I have so much good to say so I probably can’t make this short. Haha Going to Dr. Browning has been a game changer for both me and my now 4 1/2 month old. We started going when I was 2 months postpartum and looking back I wish we would have gone sooner. It started out with just back pain for me, but I dismissed it because well, I’ve always had back pain and I have just dealt with it and other chiropractors just dealt with the temporary pain but never found the root of it and so it always came back. Well, the pain got worse as I carried a growing baby around and started exercising again after I was released from my doctor after my emergency c-section. My son was also having trouble latching breastfeeding on one side and turning his head to the left. I heard about Dr. Browning through a breastfeeding group in Madison and decided to give it a try. From our first visit, the staff was kind, helpful, and knowledgeable. They even have a nursing mother’s room and the Pediatric room is very kid friendly. After just ONE adjustment we both felt better. Dr. Browning came up with a care plan to treat the root of the issue in my spine and not just treat the pain. After a few adjustments, my son can now turn his head to both sides and he LOVES to go see Dr. B. You can tell she is passionate about what she does and she is so gentle with him.  I love that he’s sleeping better, latching better, his suck has improved, and he has visible relief after every adjustment. He takes the BEST naps after an adjustment. As far as me, I’m pain free in my lower back now and have consistently been feeling better each time I get adjusted too. I’m excited for both me and my son to be feeling better. I’m really sad I didn’t know about Dr. Browning sooner while i was pregnant and I’m excited to see how staying under Dr. Browning’s care helps with my future pregnancy and postpartum journeys.

resp.text: Thank you so much Heather! We are SO glad that you and baby J are functioning better!

name: Don Hamblett
text: Dr. Browning and her staff are amazing! They are all patient oriented and brighten everyone's day! Sierra and Savannah are the best!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback Don!

name: Hector Portillo
text: Received my first chiropractic adjustment ever from Dr. Browning. Wish I would have done this sooner. I can finally sit-up completely straight without tightness in my upper back and my breathing is much better!

name: Renee Shadden
text: Dr. Browning is an excellent chiropractor who cares not only about giving you a proper adjustment, but about all aspects of her patients’ well being. She makes sure you are equipped with the proper exercises to strengthen your body’s weaknesses and gives you advice for proper posture and the tools to develop good preventative habits. I highly doubt recommend her and her friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Renee and trusting us with your chiropractic care!

name: Tabor Edgecombe
text: AWESOME experience today, looking forward to another visit. Amazing staff and Dr. Browning is the best.

name: mike love
text: New Life Family Chiropractic is a wonderful place and I highly recommend.  Dr. Misty Browning takes the time to get to know her paitents and makes it her goal to not only fix the physical symptoms but also explains everything associated around the problem.  Since me and my son has started seeing her I haven't had a headache and my quality of life has improved tremendously. My son plays college football and had a lingering knee injury the past 3 years and he's now back at school getting ready for his final season injury and pain free.  We can't say enough about Dr. Browning and her wonderful staff!

resp.text: Thank you Mike! It is amazing to see the healing that happens when we help the nervous system! We are thankful that you and your son have trusted us with your chiropractic care.

name: Quinten McFadden
text: My family and I  look forward to our chiropractic visits. In fact this is the only Doctor visit they are excited about.

name: Suzanne Moore
text: Dr Browning is amazing.  Rotator cuff surgery and 6 months of physical therapy left me with severely limited mobility.  Now, thanks to her chiropractic skills, I have 95% range of motion!  I'm so thankful.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your amazing testimony Suzanne!

name: Tabor Edgecombe
text: As always great experience, so happy I decided to start coming.

name: Kandake Nefertiti
text: Dr. Browning is very passionate and knowledgeable about what she does and is always in great spirits. She’s very helpful and she always tries to get mothers to give tips to first time moms, like myself, and I greatly appreciate her for that.

name: Cierra Steele
text: Chiropractic care has changed my life for the better! Dr. Browning doesn’t just treat your symptoms- she educates you on a healthier way of life and treats and fixes the SOURCE of your problems. In just the few short months that I’ve seen her I have been able to concentrate better, no more brain fog and severe fatigue, less headaches, better posture, more energy, and so much less pain! I am thankful for a doctor who cares about my wellbeing and educates me on the importance of keeping my spine and joints healthy.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear of how much your life has improved with Chiropractic care!! When you unlock the doctor within, it can do pretty amazing things!! Thank you for taking time to share your experience!!

name: Jennifer Howell
text: My family has been using Dr. Misty for years and we just love her! Recently, I went in for a routine adjustment with my kids. I’d fallen and really messed up my ankle a month or more ago, and even though Dr. Misty has treated my family for everything from back pain to sinuses to fevers,  it never occurred to me to ask her to check my ankle. I had been to the orthopedic for a check, and he told me to just give it time. My little one actually mentioned it to Dr. Misty and she adjusted it. Literally it was better in two days - no stiffness and the knot on the side of my ankle is gone. Amazing! Great job, Doc :) Moral of the story - if you have an ailment, tell Dr. Misty.

resp.text: We are always honored to take care of entire households and multiple generations from the same family! It's really great when the kids are the ones that help guide you to the help you need! I LOVE this!! Thank you!

name: Jan Yoder
text: So happy to have found Misty!! She has helped me tremendously!! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you Jan! We are thankful that you have trusted us with your chiropractic care!!

name: Stacie Wheeler
text: After my first consult and getting x-rays.  Had appointment for first visit.  After waiting an hour past my appointment time.  I finally just gave up and left.   People who came after me were seen while I was still waiting.  So frustrating.  Not respectful of my time but would charge me if I miss an appointment.  Guess I'll be looking for another chiropractor.  Very disappointed!!!!

name: Katherine Peters
text: Every time I go, I leave feeling better. Full body healing!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Katherine!

name: LeAnne Fields
text: This place has a family-like atmosphere! It’s clean and child friendly. My three children and I go consistently every week! The consistency has helped me and my children in different ways! Dr. Misty Browning is super helpful and knowledgeable!

name: Kurt Melero
text: You can tell that Dr Browning really cares about each and every patient. She provides excellent care during each visit. I like that she has a heavy hand and she takes care of all the problem areas I have and I always walk out of there 100% better than when I walked in.

name: Page Mauter- Holifield
text: Dr. Browning and Heather are extremely knowledgeable. They both put my concerns at ease. After only a month of treatment, my symptoms have improved vastly.

name: Beth Standridge
text: Dr. Browning has done wonders for my newborn. She’s very knowledgeable and compassionate about her work. I wish I would have found her sooner.  Her assistant Beth is accommodating and super sweet!

resp.text: We are honored to help your baby! Thank you for taking the time to review us, it helps other moms find the help they need for their baby too!

name: Susie Yoder
text: Our 6 month old son has rotational nystagmus and upon only a couple visit we could already see an amazing improvement! Dr Browning is a wonderful chiropractor an we love the clean an godly environment! Very friendly staff also!

name: Breannah Stewart
text: Absolutely love taking my son Here. Dr Browning is really good at her work. She has helped my son improve so much. She has a sweet assistant. She takes good care of you while your waiting to be seen. I never knew taking my son to a chiropractor could him in ways a pediatrician would have brushed off.

name: Ashley Jordan
text: Beth is so sweet and really made me feel welcome my first time! The doctor is also very welcoming and seems genuinely concerned about your concerns! Absolutely the best chripratic care place I have been!

name: Brittany Quail
text: Dr. Misty Browning is fantastic with children! She took such tender and special care of our six month old son while we were traveling out of town and had an emergency. She is very knowledgeable and confident in her adjustments with babies and I am so very grateful for the way she treated my baby as if he was one of her own. Thank you, Dr. Browning!

name: Bonnie Goodman
text: Dr. Misty Browning and the staff at New Life Family Chiropractic are amazing. I have been going to see Dr. Misty for 8 years and would highly recommend her to anyone with low back pain, sciatic nerve pain, neck, knee pain or anything else that hurts you. She is a very dedicated and professional Dr. I always feel better walking back to my car and am very thankful that I found her. Give her a chance, all you have to lose is pain.

name: Kerrie Hoffner
text: This chiropractor has a true gift of healing.  When Misty works on you you actually do feel New Life coming into you,.  She is wonderful.

name: James Ian Dunn
text: Dr. Browning has helped alleviate my neck pain.

name: Jeff Fuller (Standing Firm)
text: Love the staff. Caring, compassionate, and friendly.

name: jrbishop0789
text: I've been going for years. Always listens and takes time to be sure you are getting relief before sending you on your way. Then he prays with you.

name: Johnny Jones
text: Traveling and working abroad does all kind of wear and tear on my body.  Dr. Kay and his excellent team help to straighten me out again.  The best part is I can call and get an appointment the same day, which with my schedule is big plus.  I have been going for over four years now and will continue for many years to come.

name: U P
text: My family has been a patient for 20 years. Dr. Kay has treated my family with an array of issues i.e. neck, low back, asthma, etc. I go to him before I go to any other doctor. When I was in severe pain he would meet me afterhours on weekends and holidays. I am so much better now than when I started and have the xrays to prove it. Dr. Kay treats patients like family and his staff is AWESOME. I had numerous chiropractors before Dr. Kay but no others after him. I hope he is able to practice for a very long time. It gives me a panic attack to think he may retire one day :)

name: Dave Jackman
text: Dr. Kay is friendly, knowledgable, and has helped me tremendously. One day I couldn't walk and after meeting with him the first time, I walked out the door. Now I just need tune-ups every 2-3 months and I'm good.

name: Diane Duncan
text: I've heard there are good Chiropractors and bad ones. Dr. Kay is my first doctor, but I've been with him for over 2 years. My son and I swear by him. If we have a pain, we go to him first. The office staff treats  you like family. I'd like to think I found one of the good ones.

name: Pack Leader Marketing
text: I arrived at the office after a night of NO sleep and was plenty cranky.  Linda put me at ease with a comforting assurance that every thing was going to be all right. Dr Kay came in started me on "kindergarten" therapy because I as so bad off (I think you call it "acute"). After fewer than 5 visits and practicing the therapy as directed, I was cured of some pretty wretched pain.  Dr. Kay, Dr. Hamrich, Linda and Amanda...Chiro All-Stars!

name: Amy Lett
text: Dr. Kay's hands are annointed.

name: Suzanne Tjarks
text:
I've been coming to Dr Wagner for 3 years. As a competitor, I beat my body up daily and at my age it gets hard to cope with sports  injuries the way I could when I was younger. Dr. Wagner is very knowledgeable on sports injuries. I trust his opinions and listen to his advice even when I want to be stubborn and think I am still 21!
When he adjusts me the pain is gone instantly
and I feel like a new person again. He shows concern and compassion for his patients.  His staff has always been very helpful and they know me  by name, that's always a special touch.
I love that he has combined the Growing Younger Spa with his Chiropractic Care...it makes it easy to come to one place now. The office is just beautiful!  I have sent several people to Dr Wagner for various reasons and they have all been very appreciative...he is a very good Dr.
Thank you Dr. Wagner!
Sincerely
Suzie Chitwood

name: Jeanna Wing
text: I suffer from a lovely bout of scoliosis and need regular chiropractic care. I have been seeing Dr. Wagner for the almost 15 years.  He is a great chiropractor (and I have had a few over the years!) and he LISTENS to you which is huge!  I would (and DO) recommend him to anyone in need of these type of services.

name: Chad Noles
text:
I have been having lower back pain and shooting pain down my right leg for over a year now. I went to the ER last year because it was hurting so bad. They gave me pain meds and muscle relaxers and sent me on my way. 2 visits to my family doctor and the same result.

I finally gave up and went to see Dr. Wagner a few weeks ago and I am so glad I did. The insurance and billing is so easy. They do not require an appointment either which makes for for convenient visits. Just walk in after your initial setup and enter your info on the computer and straight back you go.

Dr. Wagner did an in depth consulation, took some x-rays to see what the situation was and he put me on the path to feeling pain free again. He is the first chiropractor I have ever been to, but I am a believer now. I would highly recommend him to anyone. Coming from a previous skeptic, that is saying a lot!

name: Steven Seagraves
text: Dr. Wagner is top-knotch.  Great facility and treatment.  I started coming here after an auto accident and 3 years later I still come as needed, about once every other month or so...even though it is in the next town over and I pass at least a dozen other chiros on the way to his office.  Being a full-time desk-jockey with a stature of 6'3" and a previous neck injury, I encounter neck and back issues regardless of physical activity outside of work.  Dr. Wagner always lends an ear and knows how to put me back on the right track -- I always feel great and pain-free after an adjustment. His facility is state-of-the-art with the easiest, hassle-free insurance/billing I have EVER encountered.  I would recommend him to anyone, hands down!

name: Paxton Sanders
text: Quick and easy to deal with, plus immediate relief for my back.

name: Yasmine Benchekroun
text: Very happy with my first visit. The staff is wonderful and very welcoming. I went in for an upper back pain and the Doctor was very professional. He explained to me all the issues I had going through the scans of my backbone. It was all detailed and very clear. He explained in advance the areas he was going to work on, why and how. I'm feeling great now! I definitely recommend D'Olive Bay! Thank you!

name: Noble Country
text: Instant results on the first visit! Very thorough and professional. The best chiropractor period!

name: Tonia Emmons
text: Fabulous professional people with amazing results!!! The BEST from all the rest!!!

name: Lee Strickler
text:
I have been to many Chiropractic Clinics. I was told by the last one I visited he could do nothing more for me.
Dr. Steve in 3 visits made me feel better than I've felt in years.
Amazing results!

name: mcapo227
text: First time visiting and was extremely happy. Dr Steven is not only knowledgeable in his field but kind, patient, empathetic and informative. He took time to explain everything clearly so that I understood what the treatment would entail. I walked out feeling 100% better than when I arrived. Brook was very friendly. I am looking forward to more treatments here.

resp.text: We are glad you are feeling better! Look forward to seeing you more. Thanks for coming to see us.

name: Lucy Mounteer
text: Dr. Steve is the best chiropractor I've ever been to. He even adjust your pet for you. Him and the staff makes you feel like family and I enjoy using the message chair. Prices are not high either. Dr. Steve takes care of you and doesn't just try to make a buck, like others I've been to. I love the people at this office...

name: Sarah Turner
text:
Dr. Steve is the best chiropractor I've ever had! He really knows his stuff and knows how to focus in on what's really wrong each time I visit. It's not just a normal back crack. You won't be disappointed!! Donna and the girls are
amazing too! Always so friendly and personable when I come in. Not to mention all the furry helpers there to greet you! I just love it!!

name: Mike Kelly
text: Words can not express how awesome Dr. Steve is.  I was in so much pain and tired of the previous chiropractors not telling me anything, just adjusting me and sending me out the door. Oh and don’t forget to make another appointment on the way out. Dr. Steve took the time to show me my back vs. a normal back and what I was doing to cause this.  Then showed me some steps to take to prevent a reinjury. I have referred him to everyone I work with and even my mother has started coming here.  Hats off to you Dr. Steve.

name: Tatum Raquel
text: Dr. Steve was recommended to me by another great chiropractor in the area that I've gone to for years. I initially made the switch because my insurance company changed when I switched jobs, but I'll stay because of the great service he and Donna provide. They work with me and my sometimes ridiculous schedule, and they genuinely care. They don't just ask about ailments. Donna and I talk about my fiancé, my niece and nephews, or whatever else is going on when I arrive early. Dr. Steve and I talk about work and weekend plans while he adjusts my back. And Dr. Steve makes sure to address any areas of concern that he sees, not just what I'm complaining about at that exact moment. So I always leave feeling better overall. I would give them 6 stars if I could!

name: Suzan Reaper
text: I was pleasantly surprised at how only one adjustment made such an astounding difference to the pain in my lower back. I've been a couple times since and even utilized the massage service! I plan on coming back very soon because I am confident my visit will be just as fantastic as the last time! Highly recommended!

name: Jamye Thompson
text: Dr. Wetzonis is awesome! His office is warm and inviting. He is very thorough and truly wants to make sure he helps you. You can tell he loves what he does and is very passionate about his profession. I am so glad I found his practice and will recommend everyone I know to him.

name: Sherry Bittinger
text: I have been a patient for two years now, and I cannot imagine having to seek treatment elsewhere.  Dr. Steve is the most knowledgable, sincere, friendly, patient, thorough chiropractor!  He views each patient as an individual that needs individual care and treatment.  This is the first that I haven't felt like "the next in line," and I look forward to each visit to the office. My overall health is at its best since I started going to visit Dr.Steve at D'Olive Bay Chiropractic in Daphne!

name: Brian Cooper
text: Steve is a great chiropractor!  I always feel great when I leave his office,  he even adjusted my ankles a couple of weeks ago that I had problems with and no more stiffness and pain! Great staff as well, can't go wrong here!

name: Alli Wolfe
text: Dr. Steve is the best! Excellent chiropractor and great person! He has always kept me informed of my progress and always takes the time to explain everything going on. I highly recommend him to anyone.

name: Big boys Podcast official

Especially when I first got out of bed. I also walked on the outsides of my feet so badly I could not go barefoot and had to wear special shoes. All that is in the past now thanks to Dr Steve!!!

text: Dr. Wetzonis is very knowledgeable, professional, and helped me with my bad back pain. He is not all about making money. He wants to fix any issue(s) you have. His staff is very friendly as well. I'm very glad I chose this practice out of the many throughout Baldwin County.

name: Mickey L

text: Relaxing and professional environment.

name: Patrick Fagnan
text: Highly recommend this place!

text: Dr. Bryant and his staff are incredibly caring, professional and effective.  I came into the clinic with an awful case of vertigo -- unable to stand, drive or open my eyes without serious sickness.  I could tell a noticeable difference after each treatment and after extended treatment, I am almost back to normal.  Highly recommended!

name: Mary Ingram
text: Best chiropractor I've ever seen! Seriously. Dr. Bryant has a comprehensive holistic approach by using nutrition tips, lifestyle changes, and other tips and tools to help keep you in alignment and better overall health so that you will get and stay well. He is genuinely interested in your health and how to make measurable improvements. Excellent staff. And I love spinal decompression.

name: Michelle Dryer
text: Absolutely wonderful!  Dr. Bryant and his staff are great!  They are all very helpful and want to ensure that your visit is pleasant and that you receive great care!  They are also very accommodating for scheduling and make themselves available to answer any questions.  I would definitely recommend Dr. Bryant's office to anyone seeking chiropractic care!  A++

name: Blake Hargrove
text: Dr. Bryant and his staff are superb! The staff makes you feel like you're visiting extended relatives. They ask how your kids are doing by name, and add a personal element that goes above and beyond simply providing chiropractic services. Dr. Bryant is extremely knowledgeable, and has kept me in fit condition for the past several years. Highly recommended.

name: Maine Ether
text:
Best chiropractic care in the Tennessee Valley. After enduring restless anounts of nerve pain for over 10 years, Dr. Bryant and staff got me back to lucid functionality in record time. So thankful for the caring, optimally exceptional services that they provide.

Jennifer Hill - U.S. Army Veteran

name: Andrew Chiles
text: Dr. Bryant is a great chiropractor.  I've seen five chiropractors over as many years of varying quality with  varying results. Most provided some short term relief, but never identified the underlying issues.  He helped diagnose what none of the others had and provided the longest lasting results

name: Benjamin Bishop
text: I had serious sciatic nerve pain from hip joint down my right leg that actually would make me fall on the ground. Mr. Bryant took X-rays, adjusted  my spine, & let me use the spine-olater table. After about 2 weeks of treatment 5-6 visits all the pain was gone. The relief has lasted 8 years now. This guy is good!

name: Jenny Plays
text:
Dr. Bryant was the only person who alleviated my headaches permanently in 2011. I had a headache for 6 months while I was pregnant and could not take medication. I also could not be X-Rayed while pregnant. He adjusted my neck, and my headache was reduced in one day. In two days, my headache was gone. I continued to receive treatment from him until I was straight and pain free. He also gave me instructions on adjustments I could make at home and at work to prevent this from happening again. I saw 4 doctors and many massage therapists. In the end, it was Dr. Bryant who exterminated my pain.

In 2013, I was diagnosed with DDD in my lumbar region. I have 3 bulged discs and one is severe. Dr. Bryant suggested laser therapy and decompression for my spine. I was reluctant to try, but the pain was excruciating. I did not want to have invasive treatment on my spine. I was not ready for Dr's to stick needles in my spine. Nor did I want to start taking narcotics. The pain was overwhelming. I was out of work for an entire week. I decided to try the laser therapy treatment at Dr. Bryants office. Every day my pain was reduced. By 4 treatments the pain was tolerable. By 6 treatments the pain was down to a 1 our of ten.

I highly recommend Dr. Bryant to anyone with headaches, neck or back problems and much much more. He is truly an angel for giving me back my quality of life.

name: Brigitte Terry
text: What a compassionate, caring and overall friendly staff! With the challenges brought by the pandemic, this office was highly recommended. Convenient appointments have been available, without having to wait weeks or months! If your waiting for pain relief they may have your answer.

name: Jerri Marie Vice
text: Beautiful staff, lovely facility. Always willing to work with me.

name: Andrew wood
text: They told me they checked my insurance and I was able to come in three times for free. A $600 plus bill came in for 3 visits. I was thinking they were covered. I can’t afford $200+ a visit. They agreed to reduce the bill but every month it never changed. I called each month to resolve the issue 4 times. I told them I would pay when they would fix the bill like the agreed. When they finally fixed it they sent a letter saying they sent me to collections. The doctor was nice but the billing department is a disaster.

name: Devin Surber
text: Best experience I have ever had. The doctors are patient and understanding and make this experience comfortable and enjoyable. Dr. Spurlock healed my aching knees and got me back to my active lifestyle! He is compassionate and great at his job.

name: Jacob Detweiler
text: Amazing staff and environment! The office manager even helped watch my sick child while I received treatment.

name: Denie Girardeau
text:
My family & I have been using Dr Spurlock for years and have nothing but positive things to say.  He is a excellent Doctor, compassionate and has Neurological experiences as well.
In regards to the billing.  It is a slow process for insurance to pay and I do have a deductible.  The office has been kind & patient whenever there were delays.  The overall treatment and experience far exceeds anywhere else I’ve ever been.
My best advise is don’t live in pain when you can get great help here.  <><

name: Becky Satterfield

name: Lorraine Price
text:
This place is easy to find. I was greeted by a receptionist and given paperwork to fill out. After filling that out, I was given a second set of paperwork. There were diagrams of a body facing forward and backward, and I had to indicate where my pain was on those bodies. When finished, I immediately saw the doctor. We had a brief, direct, and informative discussion. He is an extremely nice man who doesn't care about titles or formalities. Just call him, "Ken."
I was then led to a room a few steps away to do range of motion tests. Afterwards, I sat on a chiropractic table and had electrical stimulus pads placed on my painful areas for about 15 minutes. The entire visit lasted only an hour and 15 minutes. Not bad when you are suffering with back pain or a bulging disc! I look forward to learning more about the extent of my injuries and ways to heal and/or relieve pain.

I recommend giving Chiropractic Connection the chance to meet your Chiropractic needs.

text: I absolutely love this Chiropractor. I started taking my one year old here for an ear infection that 2 rounds of antibiotics couldn’t even get rid of. The results were noticeable by the first visit. 6 visits later her ear infection was completely gone. I recently made appointments for my oldest daughter, their father and myself. We had our consultation, exams, and x-rays done all in one visit. She was very thorough and explained everything she found wrong with us while doing our exams and how this effects other parts of our bodies. I already thought her prices were great just taking my one daughter but the referral prices she gave for the whole family were phenomenal. Her staff is amazing, super friendly and personable as well as helpful with great attitudes and always smiling. Great service at an affordable price!! 10 of of 10 would recommend this Chiropractor!

text: I was about to travel 9 hrs and i was visibly in pain to the point of tears and bc they don't accept walk-ins,  i was left to suffer.  A 'doctor' that leaves someone to suffer without even trying isn't worth going to.

resp.text: We are very sorry that we could not provide you with immediate care this morning.   Our office has a responsibility to do a proper examination on every new patient that comes into our office for the very first time.  In some cases, for example, the doctor may decide that an x-ray is needed before providing care.  This is done to not only protect the patient, but also to ensure that the patient receives the most appropriate care needed.  We had a completely full schedule, and we only have one chiropractor. We hope that this clarifies why we can’t always provide immediate care for walk in patients in crisis.

text: Definitely a life changer. Didn't know what to do or where to even begin. Between partial paralysis, insomnia, and irregular breathing, many things ailed me. name: Keri S
text: Dr. Marino is the most knowledgeable chiropractor I've ever met! He is caring and informative. He is typically able to diagnose without the use of X-rays or diagnostic imaging and uses a range of diverse techniques to ensure the right kind of adjustment. After the adjustment he even gives advice on stretches and exercises to do to relieve pain when it starts as well as to prevent it in the future if done as recommended. He also suggested supplements to take and specific foods to either avoid or eat more of to achieve a completely healthy and balanced body. It's amazing the things that chiropractic care can help with that don't even appear to be related until you remember that your nerves control everything and all your nerves are connected to the spine. He is also the one that does the acupuncture, which I might just have to try now. I highly recommend this chiropractor no matter what the pain or problem he CAN help either himself or at least point you in the right direction.

text: I went to HealthSource for some relief in my jaw, which has caused pain in my neck and head. Immediately, they took X-Rays and said they would be contacting me after they review my records. It took them one day to call back, which amazed me. I returned and was quickly given an estimated cost for 25 sessions, after insurance was applied. The amount for the sessions was way out of my budget range, so I never became an official patient. But that is the ONLY reason I did not seek help from this establishment. Aside from cost, everything else was easy, and again, I can't say enough about the staff there. They were excellent. I wish I could have fit their sessions into my budget.

text: Dr. Jessica is gentle but incredibly effective. I started seeing her when I was 5 months pregnant and she helped so much with the back pain I was experiencing. Miss Tracey is also a great massage therapist! So thankful for these ladies helping me get through the hardest part of the pregnancy, and looking forward to continuing to receive their services.

name: Brittney Lingo
text: My husband and I tried to conceive for over a year. We later found out that my endo. had closed my tubes so IVF was our only option and even that was only a 50/50 chance. I started going to Dr. Jessica to align everything to increase my chance of IVF success. Seven weeks later from starting alignment we found out it was a success and baby was on her way. At eight months into pregnancy we found out Stella was transverse which is the most dangerous possession due to umbilical prolapse. Dr. Jessica started doing her magic and got Stella to rotate. Thank you Dr. Jessica and your amazing staff. God, you, and NewLife gave us the best gift of all, Stella!!!

name: Cassi Robertson
text: We love this place! Great atmosphere and my little one loves her. He's learned to make himself right at home! Love how she spent so much time educating us in the beginning. I felt very confident in her ability after explaining things so they were understandable!

name: Dez
text: This place has some of the nicest people and Mrs Jessica educated us on what chiropractic care can do. They take individuals, which is perfect for me since I don't have children and I'm not pregnant. We learned there was a lot of misalignments in my body and with her care most of them are much better! She's very gentle and I wasn't sore most times, and if so it was only a slight bit. I'm still going to her to continue to improve my health. I highly recommend people to go see her and give it a shot. With nice staff, gentle adjustments, and friendly conversation, it's an extremely comfortable environment, and this is coming from someone who is scared of doctors! Please give Family First Chiropractic a chance if you're looking to see a chiropractor!

name: TSU BSN
text: Our whole family loves going to see Dr. Jessica!  You feel like you are going to visit a best friend...not a physician!  The whole staff is great!  We are SO blessed to have them in our area!!  The Greens love Family First!

name: Kendra Festian
text: We love Dr. Jessica! She is so amazing with my 10 month old and helps keep him above the wellness line!! He always is much happier after an adjustment!

name: Leah Shirley
text: Dr. Jessica and the staff are very friendly. She is very thorough with her adjustments and consultations. The office has a great atmosphere! This was my first experience with a chiropractor and she made me feel very comfortable. I always look forward to my adjustments and seeing all the friendly faces!

name: Sara Riendeau
text: Dr. Jessica is the sweetest lady. She is super attentive and caring to each of her patients! She treats my babies like her own and we just feel so welcomed and comfortable by her office manager when we come in ❤

name: Matt Bond
text: Dr. Jessica is amazing! During the consultation she was very thorough and made me feel very comfortable with my decision to come here!! Every appointment since she has been so kind and gentle and shows genuine care about my health. Highly recommend!

name: Bobby S
text:
WOW! I cannot say enough about Dr Jessica and her staff. My back was in pretty bad shape when I first went to Dr Jessica. She was very caring and explained everything she was doing to treat me, which in turn, helped me to take better care of myself. Needless to say, I am much better and I get regular adjustments. Also, I love the Christian atmosphere and the warm welcome (no matter how busy she is!)
All I can say is, give her a try. You will be glad you did.

name: Rachel Bruner
text: Always well taken care of in this professional and Christian environment. Not often do you find doctors and caregivers who treat each patient with such love and compassion. When I go to Family First Chiropractic I know I will be welcomed into their family from the time I step inside until I leave. They are caregivers who truly want to help you and heal you. Dr. Jessica has given me such relief with back pains that I will forever be greatful!

name: Keisha McKinnie
text: My family loves Dr. Jessica and her staff. We have been coming here since we moved to Dothan and she's the sweetest chiropractor in town. I love her adjustments, they make me breathe and feel better almost immediately. Me, my husband and my son come here and recommend that you do too!

name: Bryan Stewart
text: Dr. Jessica was very knowledgeable and thorough.  She took her time with the examination, and explained the process and options in my care plan.  Her office is equipped with the most modern of tools, from the sign in at the desk, through the actual treatments!  The office has a very relaxed and family friendly atmosphere, and I wholeheartedly recommend them!

name: Sadie Pipkin
text: We have been seeing Dr. Jessica since right after she opened, and I honestly can't say enough good things about her. From keeping me comfortable through 2 pregnancies to preventing ear infections in our 3 children to helping with headaches and literally everything in between, she's pretty much the only doctor we've needed. I am so beyond thankful to her for keeping us healthy!!

name: MOMents of GRACE
text: I LOVE Dr. Jessica and the amazing services she provides! She has been instrumental in helping me stay adjusted throughout my pregnancy when I have needed it most! Plus she offers great classes and ways to get involved in the community. Definitely check her out if you are even vaguely close to Dothan :D

name: Samantha Bowlin
text:
I first started going to Family First Chiropractic when I was pregnant to relieve major hip and back pain. Pregnant mamas, go treat yourself! It's a serious game changer and Dr. Jessica is so friendly and kind you'll feel like you're visiting a longtime friend.

When my daughter was born she had difficulty latching on my left. My husband and I took her to see Dr. Jessica when she was four days old, although at that time my husband was very skeptical of chiropractic care. Dr. Jessica was so gentle and knowledgable. By the time we left her office, my baby was able to breastfeed correctly on the left! She continued to work wonders on my little one over the course of the next few months and we could see the relief and comfort in our daughter following each appointment. Dr. Jessica helped my daughter to overcome many eating and sleeping issues, including reflux and complications from a tongue/lip tie. Her help was invaluable!

name: Tiffany Sprague
text:
I can't say enough good things about Dr. Jessica. She has helped me through two pregnancies and is an absolute angel.

I recently took my two year old in for a visit because she seemed to be uncomfortable. Without going into too much detail, We've been trying to figure out what's going on with her for a while now with multiple doctors brushing it off as nothing. Dr. Jessica took one look at her and knew exactly what was wrong and exactly where she needed to be seen. Because of Dr. Jessica her doctor took me seriously and she got the referral she needed!

I can't begin to tell her how much that meant to me. Thank you Dr. Jessica, thank you so much!

name: Blakely Anderson
text: I have been coming to Dr Jessica since she opened 4 years ago. I used to have regular headaches but chiropractic care has totally gotten rid of them. She has seen me through 2 pregnancies and helped tremendously. I didn't have near the pain and discomfort as most women. She uses so many different techniques to make sure you get the relief you need.  She is one of the sweetest people I've ever met. I'm so happy she is in Dothan. We are blessed to have her.

name: Amanda Arrighi
text: I started going to Family First Chiropractic around June 10th. My lower back and right hip were causing me so much pain that I finally took the advice of a friend and set myself up an appointment. I went in for my consultation and learned a lot about the alignment of my spine, hips and posture. Jessica set me up on a wellness plan where I went in for 2 adjustments a week for a few weeks and then 1 adjustment a week for a few weeks. I went in for my 9th appointment today and I was happy to report I’ve noticed that my lower back pain and hip pain hasn’t even been an issue for the last two weeks AND I was even more happy to notice that I’ve even been SLEEPING better! No more tossing and turning due to pain while sleeping, no more tingling in my arms while sleeping, actual full nights of sleep! They’re so nice at Family First, it’s so affordable AND it’s helping me! I highly recommend this office!! Thanks so much for helping me! 😊😊

name: Jessica Goodwin
text: Our whole family goes here and we love it!  Really helped through my pregnancy and helps all three of us now! Highly recommend Dr. Jessica

name: Mimi Jones
text: We love FFC, Dr. Jessica and her entire office. We are forever grateful for her care especially through my entire pregnancy and with our son who was born 7 weeks premature. Dr. Jessica is a wealth of knowledge and great with little ones. Its the highlight of our week.

name: Gregory Dykes
text: Dr. Jessica is great. She is does so great with our kids. I recommend her to anyone needing relief.

name: Matt M
text: Awesome Environment!! Very welcoming and wonderful staff!! Would recommend to anyone! I go every week. Only DR I can say I’m happy about seeing!!

name: A-Plus Therapy
text: Friendly staff and appointments are handled timely. Adjustments worked great to decrease pain and enhance athletic skill for my daughter’s sport.

name: Kortnie
text: Absolutely love this place! The staff is so sweet. Dr Jessica helped my daughter with her ear infections and is now helping my son.

name: Megan McReynolds
text: Dr. Jessica is friendly and very knowledgeable, especially about prenatal care. By 33 weeks, my breech baby flipped head down into proper birthing position thanks to Dr. Jessica’s gentle adjustments.

name: Amy Johnson
text: My family and I LOVE Dr. Jessica!  We have seen improvements in so many ways after our adjustments. My youngest son has been getting adjusted since the day after he was born, and he has been the best sleeper!  We have noticed a decrease in colds, asthma symptoms, allergies, headaches, sleep disturbances, and so much more. Dr. Jessica is great with our kids, and they love getting their adjustments. We can't say enough good things about Dr. Jessica be the staff and Family First!

name: David Schaefer
text: From my very first visit I felt very welcomed. Never once have I felt like just another patient. I can honestly say I have never looked forward to going into any kind of treatment until I found family first chiropractic!

name: Carleigh Stroup
text: I absolutely LOVE everything about this place. The atmosphere is zen, comfortable, and calming. The staff are so welcoming and kind. And of course the adjustments and treatments are fantastic. I plan on making a visit here as part of my routine. I came in with severe shoulder and neck pain and lost a lot of movement on both. After one adjustment I felt sooo much better, even though I was sore. I could tell the sorenes was my muscles getting use to the adjustment because I had left my neck and shoulder unattended for so long. Highly recommend!

name: Jodie Kilpatrick
text: We love the health and knowledge we've gained from being treated at FFC! Dr. Jessica treats each of us with a holistic approach, which I'm so excited to find around this area. The other doctors I've experienced around here are typical, unfortunately: just get you in and out after 5 min after you've waited for awhile, they're so impersonal, and they don't listen or try to get to the underlying problem, they just want to prescribe something that may or may not work. I love chiropractic because it's the opposite of this approach and I believe has much better results. My husband has been treated for back problems with noticeable and quick results, I've been treated for back pain and gotten adjustments during pregnancy, my children have been treated for various things including my youngest for colic. From the very first adjustment her colic improved immensely and has continued to do so with weekly adjustments. I'm thrilled! I can't say enough good things about our experiences! She also has great community outreach events and classes on all kinds of topics. Hope she stays in our area for a very long time!

name: Michele Patterson
text: The only place I will go. They are quick to help in any way they can; they are also friendly and the cost is decent. I honestly always look forward to my appointments.

name: James Beddoe
text: We love Dr. Jessica! She has been taking care of my son since he was 7 days old with gentle infant adjustments and we wouldn't trust anone else with the health of our children. She now takes care of the whole family including my pregnant wife who credits chiropractic care for her more comfortable pregnancy. The office and staff are always warm and accomidating. Dr. Jessica has helped keep my family healthy and happy for over 2 years now and we couldn't say enough great things about her as a person and doctor.

name: XXX XXX
text: Recommended to me and I have been extremely happy with staff and results.  Dr. Jessica is the best! She keeps me going.

name: Kelly Hart
text: Dr. Jessica is the ONLY reason I've been able to hold off on a THIRD surgery for disc repair!  I have herniated discs in my lower back and have had 2 surgeries to "clean out" the disc space and remove chipped bones from my nerves. I spoke with my surgeon after my second surgery (spring 2015) and asked if I could benefit from chiropractic care.  I had already heard wonderful things about Dr. Jessica and thought she may be able to help me. He agreed that it might help to reduce the frequency of the continued muscle spasms around the disc.  I had an epidural in late November of '15 and another one in Feb '16 and I haven't had one since. I was on the verge of a 3rd surgery in Nov '15 because I was in so much pain and we knew the same disc was causing problems.  Dr. Jessica has been able to help me  to reduce the pain, adjust me without "cracking and popping" that SO many chiropractors push on their patients and she cares about her patients. We are truly blessed to have Dr. Jessica in this area and pray for her continued success!

name: Jennie Skelton
text: Oh where do I begin,  Dr Jessica has been absolutely amazing with our family. We first started chiropractic care for our baby for constipation issues and screaming every time she was in her car seat and honestly I was very skeptical that it would work but boy was I wrong. In the several years we have known Dr Jessica she has treated my 5 children, hubby, and myself for all kinds of ailments from ear infection, migraines, back pain, sinus infections, back injuries, constipation, concussion from a car wreck, back pain from a car wreck, and even one you may not realize  carpal tunnel! I was diagnosed with severe nerve damage to both wrist and arms, was prescribed a very strong medication that I have now stopped taking because since Dr Jessica has been adjusting my arms, elbows and wrist as well I have had almost 100% relief. Forgive my rambling, but we cannot say enough about the absolute wonderful Dr Jessica. ♡♡♡♡

text: I love Dr Jessica so much!! She has such a big heart she is truly a great person!<3

name: Jenny Duckworth
text: Dr. Richardson is very friendly and pays excellent attention to what you need and where you hurt. He's honest about how often you should come back for the best care for you. His new partner, Dr. Fowler, is excellent, too. Different approaches, but both great. Try both to see who fits your needs best. The staff are super kind, friendly, and easy to work with. They also have discounted massage therapy for patients. The waiting area is comfortable, calming, and has free coffee. I highly recommend this place!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to give us such a nice review Jenny. I really appreciate it.....Dr. Richardson

name: Wayne Duckworth

text: I have been a patient at Crimson Chiropractic since 2009, receiving services frequently throughout each year. I've seen both Dr. Richardson and Dr. Fowler, and TRUST THEM BOTH with my care! I have back issues, migraines & fibromyalgia but with regular visits Dr. Richardson helps me through these issues. I highly recommend Dr. Richardson to anyone having any issues: Be it back, shoulder pain, leg pain, migraines, trouble with sinuses and just about anything else you can think of.
