Mr. Tafoya,
Thank you for your honest review. We appreciate you recognizing our thorough approach to corrective chiropractic care.  As a team, every aspect of care we provide focuses on you and your specific corrective chiropractic needs.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to present you with those recommendations, though we are disappointed it did not meet your expectations. In the event you do not receive the results you desire from the Groupon Chiropractor that you mentioned, we will be here and would love to assist you on your journey to wellness.
Sincerely,
My Chiropractor

text: First time I’ve ever been to a chiropractor to be adjusted and it was amazing! Dr. Craig, Hannah and Tracey are all so nice and will go above and beyond for their patients. I highly recommend My Chiropractor.

text: Dr Craig has been my chiropractor for years! I moved out of state and no chiropractor has ever been as talented as he is. Every chance I get to come back to Birmingham I ALWAYS schedule an appointment to get adjusted. Dr Craig and his staff not only takes care of you like family but cares about you and your body! If you’re asking yourself if this should be your next chiropractor then take it from me! Call and get on their schedule!

name: J
text: Best Chiropractor in town!! Super friendly and knowledgeable! Dr. Craig is an angel!!

name: FRANCHESICA BLAIR
text: I literally come in with a frown and leave with a smile. The CNS is so important and Dr. Craig always provides great service that leaves me feeling refreshed, focused, and rejuvenated. Definitely my favorite place!!

name: Lauren Teter
text: I have been going to Dr. Craig for four months now, and I have seen such a positive difference in my day to day life and my activity level without having any discomfort. He treats every ache and pain I have, and he is so responsive to every request I have regarding my care which leaves me feeling heard and taken care of. Every Monday morning, I walk in and the staff greets me with a huge smile on their face asking me about my weekend. It is the perfect way to start off my week, and it gives me something to look forward to. I have never had such excellent customer service. I highly recommend going to My Chiropractor in Hoover! They are the best, and they will change your life for the better!

name: Tracey Kerr
text: Dr. Craig is absolutely FANTASTIC. He consistently provides a welcoming environment where the entire staff is supportive, encouraging and educated in health/wellness care. If you want a proactive, caring doctor that listens, My Chiropractor /Dr. Craig is the place for you. Thank you Dr. Craig, I am delighted to have found a place and a doctor that my entire family loves. I would highly recommend to anyone!

name: Elizabeth Langston
text: Dr. Craig and his staff are AMAZING. They have taken such good care of me. They worked with me to find the best treatment options for my particular scoliosis case. I hoped for less pain in my back, but what I didn’t see coming was better overall health (including better sleep) and the sweet friendships I now have with each of them! I look forward to my weekly visits and recommend My Chiropractor to everyone!

name: Linda Kelley
text: Doctor Craig keeps me well and healthy. I want him for my primary doctor.

name: Mattie LaPrade
text: Dr. Craig and the staff at My Chiropractor are absolutely fantastic! They have not only relieved my pain from previous injuries but have also made me feel so welcome in Birmingham after my recent move! Dr. Craig doesn’t follow a specific regiment regarding adjustment schedule, but instead listens to you and how you’re feeling to recommend adjustment frequency. They will always work with you regarding your schedule, even if you need to be worked in on their busy days. The staff at My Chiropractor truly cares about you and wants to make a difference in your life. I cannot sing enough praises for this group and I honestly look forward to my visit each week.

name: Jenn R
text: I think Dr. Craig is great.  I have been coming here for years and couldn’t think of anyone else that could do as great as Dr. Craig with all of my care.  The staff is wonderful and so sweet every visit.  If you are looking for a great Chiropractor look no more .  My Chiropractor is this place to be.

name: Barbara Fowler
text: I am very thankful for Dr. Craig and his great staff. I have seen Dr. Jerry since 2002 and I was very concerned after he left that a new chiropractor would not be able to handle my tough issues from cervical fusion. After the first visit with Dr. Craig, my mind was certainly put at ease. He has well-exceeded my concerns and I highly recommend him. I love the environment and a doctor who truly cares about me and my well-being.

name: HILAIRE ARMSTRONG
text: I tried this Chiropractor because I was still having problems with my back from a car accident in 2014. No one recommended this place to me but I thought I would try it and I am so glad I did. I have gone through physical therapy twice since my accident and this was the first time anyone could give me an explanation as to why I continue to have problems with my back and neck. The staff was great, compassionate, and friendly. Dr. Craig took the time to take X-rays and explain what he saw step by step and allowed me to ask as many questions as I wanted. He also went through my previous records and MRI in more depth than the doctors who took them. I have been going to him for a few weeks now and I feel an incredible difference in my back and neck. I have finally been able to sleep at night because of the treatments he performed. I now have confidence that I will improve and not have problems back the rest of my life being that I am only 25. Having a doctor that is knowledge, professional, and kind is exactly what Dr. Craig is. I would recommend anyone to try him. My Dad just recently started treating with him as well and he swears his golf swing has improved tremendously. My Chiropractor is hands down the best Chiropractor I have been too and the most knowledgeable.

name: Kyra Moseley
text: Dr. Craig and his staff are wonderful!!! I will always be grateful for him working me in for my first visit the Saturday I threw my back out. He made it possible for me to participate in my daughter’s birthday party that afternoon! Dr. Craig is the best!

name: Lillie Gaston
text: I have absolutely enjoyed Dr. Craig and his staff since he took over the practice! I have been going to My Chiropractor since 2011 and have enjoy it ever since. After a severe accident in 2014, Dr. Jerry (old owner)and Dr. Craig (new owner) got me back to normal! I definitely recommend Dr. Craig!!

name: CONNIE SCHOTT
text: I came to Dr Craig after a 13 hour road trip,  with back tenderness and discomfort in my left leg. Dr Craig came highly recommended and I felt comfortable from the moment I came into the office. After receiving the initial therapy, Dr Craig gave me a very thorough adjustment and I felt relief almost immediately. I will continue to visit Dr Craig for continued care. There is nothing better than feeling relief immediately when it comes to back pain. Thank you Dr Craig and staff for such a positive reaffirming experience!!!

name: Joshua Nelson
text: I've been to a lot of chiropractors over the last 20 years, and let me just say that this place is one of the best I've ever been to. I travel a lot for my job, and threw my back out somehow in my sleep. I needed an emergency adjustment that same day. They snuck me in, knew exactly what they were doing, got me adjusted, and back on the road so I could finish out the week. Very friendly, caring, and compassionate people. I wish they were located in my home town so they could be my local chiropractor. Great experience all around.

name: Heather Wallis
text: I came limping into Dr. Craig's office and walked out feeling great! He and his staff have been wonderful and are always warm, welcoming, and ready to listen. text: Dr. Craig and the staff at My Chiropractor do a wonderful job of keeping me moving pain-free. I enjoy weight lifting and CrossFit, so chiropractic care is very important for my training. I can't recommend them enough!

text: My family and I have been cared for by Dr. Jerry since 2002 and Dr. Craig made the transfer to a new chiropractor painless. A year ago, I needed an MRI for neck and upper back pain and it was scheduled by the his staff quickly and efficiently.  I was looking for a non-surgical option and Dr. Craig has been successful at keeping the surgeons at bay.  Dr. Craig adjustments are just what my family needs to assist in keeping us fit for another week of exciting challenges.  Dr. Craig gives an great adjustment. You will not be disappointed.

name: Lynne Lindsey
text:
I don’t (ever) give shout outs unless I have a beyond positive experience with a service or product first hand.  Dr. Craig Catalfu (My Chiropractor Clinic in HOOVER on hwy.150 across from Walmart ) is one of those places!   A huge shout out to Dr. Craig for his knowledge of the profession , his commitment to healing, state of the art equipment,  his humor/kindness along with a great staff make his practice the absolute BEST and the ONlY choice.. if your goal to get better!
Here’s my story...
I have been a dedicated Crossfitter for 5 years, (going 4-5 days a week).   In late April, 2 days before I was to participate in Festivus partner games, I woke up, put my feet on the floor and the back of my legs buckled.  Come to find out...my sciatic nerve (L4/L5) brought me to my knees.  Never before had I ever experienced any thing like that...& the bad part was it was totally out of my control!  I couldn’t fix it!  Sheer will, determination (and an awesome partner, Keith Foster🏋🏼‍♂️) allowed me to make it through the games...(we came in 4th🤗).
I’d never been to a chiropractor before until someone at my awesome gym (CrossFit 459)told me about the greatness of Dr. Craig Catalufa.   I called and made an appointment, and on a scale of 1-10, my pain was at a 3.
After 6 weeks, I am BEYOND thrilled to say...10 being normal...I’ve gone from a 3 to a 9.3!  If you want results...call Dr. Craig’s office today!  Private message me if you need any more info.!  Lynne Lindsey♥️

name: Whitney Culpepper
text: Recently, I was having pain in my foot and determined it was plantar fasciitis. I mentioned it to Craig, and he told me to stop by and he would fix it up no problem. I stopped by the office and he taped up my foot and it was better in only a couple days! Not only is he good at his job, but Craig and Hannah are super nice people! If you are looking for a chiropractor, there is no need to look anywhere else!

text: Outstanding! I could barely walk in during my first visit and 13 days later I was playing in a flag football game.  Good, caring, thoughtful office staff!

name: Matt Lucas
text:
I've been visiting Dr. Craig for close to a year now, due to formerly chronic neck pains that caused severe migraines.  Over the course of my treatment, I've come to know the staff who have always been very kind and professional.  I set my appointments and do not have any issues getting in and out in a timely manner.  Dr. Craig took his time when I first came to him to really assess the situation we were looking at in a surprisingly in-depth manner.  When I first came to Dr. Craig, I was a little worried about the methods that would be implemented. (My dad used to have neck adjustments and seeing that as a kid always terrified me that the neck would easily break with only a little more force.) I'm no longer worried about having neck adjustments as I do trust Dr. Craig now that I know he has my best interests in mind.

Now I am here a year later since I started coming to Dr. Craig and only need to go to essentially monitor my neck condition and make sure it adjusts properly, to see if any new issues arise, etc.  The office is clean and comfortable and the location is easy to access and exit.  If you have chiropractic needs, I highly recommend Dr. Craig - he has treated my neck accurately and I no longer have the debilitating migraines and neck pain that I once did.

text: I've been going to My Chiropractor for many years. Dr. Jerry cared for his patients and was a dear friend to me. On one visit, Dr. Jerry introduced me to a very nice young man (Craig) that was working there and talked to him thru each step of my adjustment, explaining my issues. The next visit Dr. Craig adjusted me and was very thorough and so caring/concerned. Dr. Craig ALWAYS spoke to me and inquired as to how I was doing. That meant so much to me and said a lot about him. Shortly afterwards, I learned of Dr. Jerry's plans to retire and was so thankful Dr. Craig was taking over the practice. From one caring doctor to another caring doctor made for a smooth transition. Dr. Craig is very thorough, explains his adjusting and gives helpful suggestions/exercises, etc. to his patients. I am very pleased with Dr. Craig and his staff is very welcoming, friendly and they truly care about each patient. I definitely recommend My Chiropractor to anyone looking for a professional, family, friendly Chiropractor and staff. You will love them.

text: Dr. Craig has been helping me for a few weeks and already I can feel a difference. He's very patient, especially when it comes to adjusting my neck since I have a horrible habit of tensing up, and he waits for me to relax each time.

name: Renee Marlow
text: When Dr. Craig first started practicing at My Chiropractor, I admit I was weary.  I have a lot of issues with my back: bulging discs in my neck and lower back, SI Joint disorder, and I had ACDF w/lamenectomy (sp?) on my cervical spine. Plus, I'm just a crabby lady who doesn't like change and I've experienced how much damage the wrong Chiropractor can do to you. ***BUT*** Dr. Craig took over, and he's been wonderful. He personalizes each treatment with you to not only focus on your recurrent issues but to pinpoint any particular issues you're having that visit. I always walk out of an adjustment from Dr. Craig feeling much looser, more balanced in my hips, and straighter and taller in the back. Not to mention he's always cheerful and encouraging and takes the personal touch further by showing genuine interest in how you are doing and what is going on in your life. Even if I walk in to my appointment tired and cranky I walk out in a much better mood. The ladies that work there are fabulous too - everyone is kind ,caring, thoughtful, and genuine. The care you get at My Chiropractor from Dr. Craig and his staff is not only good for your body, but good for the mind as well.

name: Corey
text: Great staff. Always enjoy my visits.

name: PurpleJive
text:
Wow! I must say I haven't been to very many doctors who are as amazing as Dr. Craig Catalfu. Very rarely do I feel the need to leave a review for a doctor's office. But My Chiropracter is AMAZING! Every single person here is so friendly, helpful, and compassionate. They are also some of the most patient people I've ever met. Sometimes it's hard to be patient with me because I'm so scatter-brained, but the staff at My Chiropractor treats me like I'm a part of the family. I'm a very intuitive person, and I can read people pretty well... But I can definitely say, without a doubt, that I know the staff at My Chiropractor genuinely love their jobs. They greet you with bright faces and smiles and ask you how you're doing. They listen and try to relate to your response. They are the epitome of perfect customer service.

Dr. Catalfu is so thorough. He asks all the right questions, and listens to every detail to ensure you get the best care possible. He sat with me for over an hour listening to me talk about everything. (Bless his heart, because I'm such a talker, lol.) He's just a genuinely sweet person, and I'm so lucky I found this place. He's also wonderful at adjustments! So many chiropractors won't thoroughly adjust you; they'll just pop your back or pull on your legs. But Dr. Catalfu does everything he can to make you feel comfortable.

I had a horrible migraine for days, that wasn't going away with medicine. So, I started looking for a chiropractor and 5 different chiropracter offices turned me away because I needed an adjustment on such short notice. So, I finally found My Chiropractor and gave them a call. Marilee answered and asked me what was going on. I told her, and she made certain that I could be seen that Friday. She genuinely cared about how I was feeling, and she did her best to squeeze me into a very tight schedule. After my adjustment, my migraine was gone in 10 minutes. I couldn't believe it!

If you're looking for an amazing chiropractor, give this place a call. I love them! :)

name: HE Hill
text:
New to the community, went in for evaluation prior to being treated for neck pains. Office Manager took all my Insurance info (BCBS Primary & Secondary) She came back to me and said it would be a $30 copay. I informed her that my secondary always pays anything that primary doesn’t. She insisted that I had to pay the $30 that day to be seen. I told her I had had back to back shoulder surgeries with multiple MRIs, Doctor visits, physical therapy etc and have never paid a penny out of pocket. I assured her it would cover everything and asked her to please run both insurances. Her words “You may be an ethical person but we don’t know you”. That made me feel real cared for and wanted. During our conversation she reiterated multiple times her experience of ten years doing this each time I asked her to please submit both ins plans. Two weeks later she called to say that it was denied apparently due to an incorrect zip +4 code which I did not provide. No problem anyone can make a mistake, even with ten years of experience, correction made and re-filed. Then Twenty days later I received a call saying it was approved and paid in full. Was told I could pick up my $30 reimbursement check in the office. I asked for it to be mailed to me, she said no against office policy, I have to pick it up. I then whined a bit sharing with her that it was a 2 ½ hr drive which is very long for a $30 check. She agreed to mail it and hung up. Then promptly called me back to say that they had a local address on file. I shared that we had purchased land there and were transitioning to build and selling our current home. As I gave her my current address she made a snide comment “OH WOW THAT’S ONLY 1 ½ hrs”, to which I respectfully informed her that my place of employment was 2 ½ hrs. Not only did she make me feel unappreciated or undesired as a new client but to imply that I was a liar and a cheat, not once but twice is not my idea of a friendly hospitable welcome to the community, which is exactly what we received from our new dental and medical provider, thankful for them. I believe Dr Raley would have been very thorough and Ms Tiffiney (Radiology Tech) was very good and sweet as can be. I called to share my experience with Dr Raley, he listened, thanked me for the feedback and wished me good luck. It’s unfortunate, they lost two new patients, me and my wife.
So here we are ….. or should I say go !  Down the road to another office !

resp.text:
Mr. Hill
Thank you so much for your feedback.  It is indeed our office policy, and legal insurance requires, for us abide by your insurance policy contract and will continue to be such.  We are not allowed to change the insurance policy, to which you have already agreed to abide by.
It is unfortunate that you supplied us with the insufficient zip extension resulting in the delay of your reimbursement, however we are glad to hear, with the zip extension corrected, you did receive your full $30 reimbursement from us just as your insurance policy states and we correctly performed.

I believe your frustration stems from 2 common misunderstandings of how insurance is designed.
From the patient’s perspective, smooth coverage of care occurs because there is an underlying mechanism to how that occurs.  The contract you signed regarding your chiropractic care contractually constrains us to take copays.  Your insurance carrier then decides if / how to reimburse.  However, they retain that ability to decide. They do not give that decision ability to the doctor’s office.  They require the office to simply inform / enforce your contract by taking your copay and leaving the decision of reimbursement to your insurance company.
Also, although your deductible requirements may be fulfilled through claims from multiple type of healthcare genres, your copays/reimbursement requirements for medical care, dental care and chiropractic care are commonly separate and can be very different.  Your other providers likely acted within their contractual obligations, however we are constrained, by your contract, to work within the realm of the chiropractic agreement which you made with your carrier earlier.
Those 2 points of misunderstanding on the patient’s part commonly create an environment of frustration for both the patient and the doctor’s office.  Our office manager accurately performed your contractual obligation of your policy perfectly as evidenced by your receipt of the $30 reimbursement we mailed to you.  She did attempt to convey those insights into those 2 common misunderstandings (as you noted) underlying your contract that you signed with your carrier.
We perform this equally for all patients (both new and existing) so as to remain in proper relationship with your insurance and in proper relationship with our patients by avoiding favoritism or discrimination against any patient.  This allows us to help as many as possible.  Her 10+ years’ experience pays off for everyone!
We are pleased you are here in our community.  You will find our town full of welcoming, good hearted people doing the right things for the right reasons.  Our office manager and radiology technologist are exemplary of that character and that is why they are so highly regarded in their communities, churches, and in healthcare at large.  I am blessed to be on their team.  I know you will be glad you chose Andalusia!

But that has all changed now that I found Dr. Raley and his staff, April & Tiffany at 3 notch chiropractic in Andalusia!   His office is very professional as well as friendly.   Dr. Raley spent time discussing the issues I was having with my neck and then came down with a plan to help me.   After several weeks of treatment’s my neck didn’t cause me anymore problems.  No medication needed!   Not only has he fixed my neck but he has also worked on my lower back an I am making great progress already!
I highly recommend Dr.Raley and the 3 Notch chiropractic staff if your looking for someone that will take the time to address your issues and work up a plan to take care of those issues!  Very knowledgeable, friendly and kind office!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

He uses such a gentle touch it amazes me that it can possibly work, but it does! I also had terrible hip pain and constantly had to turn from side to side all night long.I couldn't sleep more than an hour before waking and having to turn. I can sleep through the night now. text: Awesome and affordable!! Dr. Meals accepts walk-ins and has a reasonable charge of $28. With that being said if you are w/o insurance this is the place. text: We’ve been enjoying Dr. Aplin’s chiropractic care for over 20 years. The staff greets us and cares for us efficiently with smiling faces and sincere loving hearts. name: JoAnn Gill
text: Doctor Aplin is a great chiropractor. I don't know how he does it, but he knows how to adjust you by your stance. His adjustments are fast and accurate. I constantly ask him questions concerning health problems and his suggestions are very helpful.

resp.text: We're so happy you're so happy with InVision Chiropractic!! Thank you so much for sharing your experience, JoAnn!

name: Ken Priest
text:
I have been attended by several chiropractic services in this area and across the country. I find that the majority of chiropractors tend to stick with the methods taught by the particular schools they attended. This is not what I look for in a chiropractor or chiropractic services.
I look for forward thinking doctors who have expanded on and are not limited to what they were initially taught. In particular, I look for one who works with kinesiology,  one who is particularly focused on the relationship between the muscles not only with the bones, but with each other and the energy relationship with other factors in our bodies and in our minds and surroundings.
I find Dr. Richard Aplin to be an open minded doctor and practitioner who can learn and grow and think outside the box in order to visualize what is happening within our bodies and respond with corrective/directive measures.
I find him to be the most effective chiropractor for my needs in this geographic area.

resp.text: Thanks for your thorough review, Ken - we really appreciate it!!

name: Larry Masters
text: Dr. Aplin and his entire staff at InVision are all highly professional, knowledgeable, friendly and helpful. The results you receive are life changing.  It's amazing to see what a GOOD chiropractor can do for your well being. Problems I never considered could be delt with by chiropractic care vanished. My wife and I both love InVision.

resp.text: Larry - you are so kind. Providing life-changing results is truly why we are in business - we're so glad you have experienced our passion! Thank you for sharing.

text:

Of all the chiropractors I've worked with, Invision Chiropractic and the neurological chiropractics model they follow, has been BY FAR, the most effective approach I have been involved with....  I have broken through a 20 year "plateau" and am experiencing a new level of sustained healing and subsequent ease with less pain in my body.  Im so glad I found them!

resp.text: Wow - that is one powerful story, James!! We're so grateful to be a part of your tremendous healing. Thank you for sharing!!

name: Lorren Bailey
text:
This is a long review but worth the read.

Dr. Aplin is an amazing doctor! He takes chiropractor care to levels no one has ever heard of in this town. Let's be real for a moment, almost every who's had pain at some point in their life has gone to a chiropractor for help. The standard way of thinking is that if you could just get that elbow to pop back or to have a hip or shoulder reset then all your pain would go away. But it never works, you might find some mild relief but it's usually short lived by a couple of hours to maybe days and then you wake up and say, you slept wrong and it's out again.

Well the team at Invision chiropractic care will teach you how to do address the underlying problems so you can fix it yourself in the long run. Yes you will get adjusted, yes it will probably hurt (Dr. Aplin has a different approach to adjusting that I've ever seen) but I'm a walking, breathing, significantly less pain and overall stress less person than when I walked into his office 4 months ago.

I'll be honest, I have a long history of surgeries to pains and only walked in to this office cause I didn't want to have another surgery and my dear friend suggested Dr. Aplin. I went when I truly didn't believe he was helping. I went when the pain spread to a neighboring body part. I went even though my TOC doc said I needed surgery to fix my problem. 4 months and I never missed an appointment. I can say today that I don't need surgery, my pain is gone and the results of becoming less stressed and worry free was worth more to me than the pain getting better.

BrainTap. Google it. Dr. Aplin introduced me to it and has changed my life because of it. I feel like I have the answer to a life long question that I know so many of us ask "How do I feel better?" yes that's generic but let's be honest, everyone is stressing about something these days. But after 4 months of using the BrainTap and doing my homework from Dr. Aplin, I do feel better, lighter able to take on what the world throws at me. It just works!!

resp.text: Lorren - you're a ROCKSTAR! Thanks for being a great patient and showing what you can achieve through commitment and prioritizing your health. We're thankful for you!

name: Levi Harper
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed coming here. Dr. Aplin is very straightforward with what his intentions are and why he feels they are necessary. Any time I have had a "catch" or aching area he is able to relieve it and suggest preventive measures for it not to happen again. Also the staff is great and seem to genuinely care about the patients. I am done with treatments and I get phone calls asking (not pressing) if I would like to come in but also just to see how I am doing. Would recommend if you are looking for a Chiropractor.

text: I woke up hunched over like an old lady one day.  My backs always been bad cause I’m a nurse.  I googled the place with the most good reviews and ended up here.  Everyone is so helpful here.  The doctor even went and got my purse and insurance card for me out of my car so I wouldn’t have to crawl and get it myself.  My back died on a Thursday and Dr. Mann had me at work on a Monday. You won’t find a better chiropractor!

name: Savannah Hogan
text: So this might be a little long winded but I have to tell you about my experience here!  My daughter was the first of us to use Dr. Mann.  She came in for really bad neck pain and headaches.  Dr. Mann said it was related to what is now being called 'text neck.' In two weeks of treatment she was completely better! Not only that it's been months now and she feels great- and still playing on that phone! The second patient was my son.  We were told he needed tubes in his ears because he had chronic ear infections for months.  It broke my heart thinking about that so I was chatting with Dr. Mann on one of my daughters visits and he told Chiropractic can be successful in treating that without tubes. So we gave it a try (child adjustments are different and very gentle if you didn't know) and low and behold after months of ear infections they were COMPLETELY gone.  We were thrilled- not to mention we saved hundreds avoiding surgery.  The next patient was me!  I do pure Barre and I was having trouble with my low back and knee.  It turns out that I had mobility issues.  Couple weeks of work and my workout is now a breeze. And finally my husband.  He's had back issues before but not quite like this recent one.  He works at a computer all day.  This time the sciatica was going all the way to his foot.  He is currently finishing up his rehabilitation with Dr. Mann and is already pain free!  I am so glad we came here first! No pain, no drugs, we feel great, and at a fraction of the price of surgery. Make this your first stop!!!

resp.text: Mrs. Hogan we are so happy to have met you and your family.  Thank you for taking the time to leave this review!  We look forward to seeing you all again soon! Have a great day and have a great year!!!

text: My appointment went very well.  Wait was short and everyone was helpful.  I was recommended Dr. Mann by a co worker and I am very pleased with my care.  Also thank you for getting me in on short notice

text: Dr Brian has the brightest smile and healing knowledge. Chelsea has the most wonderful greeting and is able to work in appointments for those aches and pains. Heath is so helpful and clear on his instructions on the table. Those hot pads are the best. You won’t go wrong getting adjustments for your back, hips and knees from Advanced Chiropractor!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review! See you next time!!!

name: mark mcalister
text:
I would stay away extremely overpriced. It was $235 for a new patient set up every visit after would be $99. The exam was minimal, no new x-rays and didn't even look at my old ones before slapping me with the bill. For chiropractic care this is egregious.
After this visit i went to another practice new patient was $30 which included x-rays and a much more thorough examination.

resp.text: Good Morning! $18 is our average patient copay!  If you have questions on what your price would be please call us at 2563518500 so we can give you correct quotes.  Also, our exam guidelines follow both that of the Journal of the American Medical Association and the Journal of Chiropractic Medicine ensuring we deliver complete and thorough examinations every time! X-rays should only be taken on an as needed basis. If a chiropractor is taking x-rays on all patients without medical necessity we urge you to report this to the State Board of Chiropractic as this is either based on greed or severely outdated research and considered below the current standard of care. In all honesty, we believe this to be a fake review left by a competing Decatur chiropractor as the information in your comment is misleading and inaccurate.

name: R Mitchell
text: Dr. Mann helped me with my back pain.  I had been getting worse and worse for months and I was having to miss work.  Everyone here is always nice and my back feels strong and pain free again. Thank you

resp.text: So happy to hear you were pleased with your care at Advanced Chiropractic Mr. Mitchell.  See you next time!

name: Casey Miller
text: Dr. Mann was exactly what is looking for when I was searching for something to help with my back pain. My other doctor just wanted me to take pills and then an orthopedic surgeon said I need an operation.  I didn't want any of that so I went here. The staff is very nice and the Dr. Mann is very professional.  He said even though I was in severe pain that he could still help me. Sure enough here I am now doing everything I need to without any pain. It has been 2 weeks since I have been.  I am   Thankful and grateful. Definitely recommend this office.

resp.text: We are so glad you found us Casey! See you soon!!!

name: Dana Bradley
text: Incredibly appreciative for all the help I received here.  I didn't make it here until after a month of muscle relaxers and an MRI.  I was scheduled for an appointment with my orthopedic doctor but my appointment was 6 weeks away.  I was really just looking for something to hold me over.  I took my report to Dr. Mann and I was told not only could help me he believed he could keep me from having any surgery and possibly no more meds.  I had my doubts, especially after he told me I had a disc in my lower back that was bulging.  To my delight, I began sleeping better each day.  After 2 weeks work wasn't so bad.  After 1 month I felt so much better I cancelled my orthopedic visit.  I don't know why the chiropractor isn't everyone's first recommendation when something hurts.

resp.text: We are so glad we could help you Mrs. Bradley!  We hope you are well and look forward to seeing you and your family in the future!!!

name: Brylee Young
text: Really nice people. Super great and very helpful. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brylee! Hope you have a great day!

name: Luke Appleton
text: Highly reccomend this office to anyone trying to avoid pills and surgery for their back pain.  My back had steadily gotten worse and had reached a point that I couldn't take it anymore.  It hurt at work and as affecting my sleep.  Went to my MD and they just gave me a prescription. I'm not a pill head so I looked this place up.  Very little wait time here. I sat for less than 5 minutes waiting the whole visit. Sat for about 30 at my MD.  I used Dr. Mann here.  He went over what was going on.  I recieved treatment that day.  I had no idea how much sitting in a bad chair could affect my back.  I have since conpleted my rehab and feel great.  Even better than before it started bothering me.  Definitley worth the visit.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review Luke! We are glad you had such great results during your time here! We strive to be leaders in rehabilitation and wellness care!  See you next time!

name: Autumn Troxel
text: My headaches and low back pain are gone!  I used to get headaches regularly. They weren’t usually debilitating but they were constantly there and just annoying. I would find myself in a bad mood just from the pain always being there. My lower back started after I had my child and I just couldn’t get it to go away. I found this place online and they were able to get me in the same day. My wait times are always very short at advanced chiropractic. I cannot stand going to an office and sitting for an hour waiting.  I think my longest wait was less than 10 minutes.  The office is very clean- they clean between every patient. They also take blue cross blue shield insurance which was great. I’m hoping to get my husband in soon for neck issues he had after a car accident.  Overall very pleased with my care here and happy to support local business in Decatur!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review Autumn!  We love that you have had such great results!  Let Mr. Troxel know we deal with a lot of auto accident victims and have great success! See you next time!

name: Robin Varner
text: I would recommend Advanced Chiropractic to everyone!  The staff is so  nice!  I came for back pain.  Dr. Mann was patient and kind.  He walked me through everything and made sure I understood what my problem was.  I felt 100 percent better after finishing here.

resp.text: Thank you Robin for sharing your success with us at Advanced Chiropractic! See you next time!

text: EXCELLENT service and treatment here.  My sciatica and back pain are gone.  I understand better now how to avoid back pain as well.  My blue cross blue shield PEEHIP and secondary covered my bill entirely.

name: Jerod Stevens
text: Feel like new now.  Thanks for all the help. Will definitely be sending you some business. Take care!

name: Gabby Rochester
text: Great clinic! Great hours too super convenient. I was having pain in my back and down my leg. I started this week and can already tell the difference! I have received great adjustments, some home exercises, and decompression therapy. Front desk was very accommodating, the doctor was very insightful and showed me why I’ve had so many problems with my back! I was especially impressed with the suggestions Dr. Mann gave me to avoid flare ups and actually help me fix why it was happening instead of just living at the chiropractor forever.  I also purchased their holiday massage special. It’s a 3 pack of one hour massages for $99. Can’t beat it! It’s always a little nerve racking to try a different doctor but I’m so glad I chose this place on my google search! Five stars for sure!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Gabby! Glad to here you have had such great success! Thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Tiffany Hightower
text: Dr. Mann and the staff are amazing! The best chiropractor I have been to. Dr. Mann worked with me for a couple of weeks and now I feel much better! I would highly recommend them to anyone. Also Kelsey and Heath are the best! Everyone is always in a great mood! I love it!

resp.text: Thank you Tiffany! We always enjoy seeing you at the office.  So glad to hear that you had success with our practice!  Have a great day!

name: Jennifer Landry
text: Dr. Mann is a great chiropractor.  It looks like it's been said her a 100 times but I wanted to say why my treatments here allow me to say how much I mean that and miss being in Alabama!  I spend most of the year in Atlanta now because of work.  I have tried and tried to find a chiropractor here that was as good as Dr. Mann but I haven't been successful.  I called Dr. Mann before one of my appointments in Atlanta and asked if he would mind talking to my chiropractor (bless him for doing that) Even after an in depth conversation about the type of treatments I was receiving with Dr. Mann in Decatur I still wasn't getting the same level of relief from my Atlanta chiropractor that I was receiving at Advanced Chiropractic.  My neck is just not the same when I go to other places.  I only get to be adjusted a few times a year by Dr. Mann now because of the move and it's one of the worst things about not being home.  But every time  I am in town seeing Dr. Mann is on the list!  Another thing I always appreciated about Dr. Mann's office is there is always a plan.  He doesn't just say 'see ya' at the end of your appointment.  If I am working on an injury I always know when I need to be seen again.  If I am on wellness I know I need to be back monthly.  Other places I have been don't give any direction and it just seems less professional.  Be thankful for what you have here!!! He's the best! Thanks again Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jennifer for leaving us a review! We always asked to be updated by your family when they come in for treatment about what you and yours are up to these days!  It sounds like the husband and kids are  adjusting to the move pretty well! We miss seeing you guys every month now that you've moved to Atlanta!  And yes anytime you are home give us a call and we will work your whole gang in.  Hope to see you soon!!!

name: nathanael west
text: This is a great place to get adjusted! They are friendly and make you feel welcome! I started going a couple months ago and I feel great! I suggest you give them a call!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. West for taking the time to leave a review!  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a positive experience with Advanced Chiropractic!  We look forward to seeing you in the future.  Have a great day!!!

name: Miles Blackwell
text: This is the chiropractor you've been looking for.  I'm a fan of all things wellness and am a believer that the chiropractor can save you from surgery. I am also very picky about the places I go for treatment and advice. I had just relocated to the area for work.  My supervisor had also just moved here and said I should give this place a try.  I called ahead and asked about the services provided and some questions about my new insurance.  I had my appointment that evening.  The office is more modern looking than some of the other places in town (past experience has taught me sometimes old building means outdated doctor). The staff and doctors are all nice people and I can without a doubt say that was the best treatment I have ever been given.  My last chiropractor was a good friend and great person but was a smaller build. Just guessing but I think that really was the difference in treatments and let me tell you it was significant. I come in about once a month and it keeps me doing everything I like (and some of the chores that I don't).

resp.text: Thanks for the review Miles!  We work hard to make sure we maintain a professional environment and stay up to date on the latest research on wellness and rehab treatments.  Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review!!! See you soon!

name: Tiffany Nichole
text: I haven't felt this good in a long time! No more pain! No more headaches! Going to work isn't so painful anymore. I'm getting much better sleep at night. I can do just about anything I want to now. I'm not afraid to tackle a garden or the laundry! I'm so glad I gave this place a try. In the very first visit I could see the difference. After a few weeks I felt like a new person. I originally only came here because I had just moved to Decatur and driving to my old chiropractor was getting to be a hassle. On my first visit Dr. Mann discussed new treatment methods that he had seen some success with and I decided to give the rehab a try before just going to my regular Wellness treatments. Like I said in just a couple weeks I could see the changes. I used 2 feel tingling from my back almost weekly. I now haven't felt it in weeks. I used to have to avoid certain Hobbies that I enjoyed because I was afraid my back would go out. Thanks to Doctor Mann I now have no fear of my back going out on me. That in itself is huge for me! And yes this office is super convenient! Right on the Beltline across from publix!!!

resp.text: Thanks Tiffany! We are glad we were able to help you!

name: Keisha Talley
text: My son and I come here for chiropractic treatment.  The front desk is always stellar and I have great trust in Dr. Mann. We always come her first for any pains or injuries we might have.

resp.text: Thanks Keisha for leaving us a review!

name: Rachael Gardner
text: Wonderful and nice people and they helped my back significantly

resp.text: Thank you so much Rachael for taking the time to  leaving us a review.  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your results at Advanced Chiropractic!  See you next time!

name: Jamie Reynolds
text: Just finished my visit and I am very impressed. Office was very easy to find. It’s on the Beltline in Decatur. No long wait, very nice staff. My appointment with the doctor went well. Dr. Mann is very friendly and approachable. He answered all my questions and we were able to start my treatment today.  Looking forward to coming back tomorrow when he says we will go over my x-rays together.  My copay was only $20 with my insurance. Already feel a little better! Looking forward to getting a good night of sleep!

resp.text: So glad you had a good experience! Thank you Jamie for leaving us a review and thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Blaine Roberts
text: I love going to Advanced Chiropractic the staff is extremely nice and very helpful. They are also quite knowledgeable about the products they offer. The atmosphere is very enjoyable and the massage therapist is excellent as well. One of the best chiropractic offices I’ve ever been too.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope to see you soon Mr. Roberts! Have a great day!

name: Danny McGee
text:
I originally came here because of the office hours. I don't get off till 4:30.
My old chiropractors office wanted me there by 4:45 to be seen. Advanced Chiropractic is open till 6:00.
I must say I have been very pleased with the switch. I highly recommend Dr. Mann! When I first came here I was contemplating another back surgery. Dr Mann ,through adjustments and suggestions on exercises, has improved my quality of life.  My job can be physically demanding at times. Dr Mann keeps me going! I have never had a problem getting an appointment when I have had a bad day. His office staff are friendly and helpful. The massage therapist is great to.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review! It had been a pleasure having you join our office.

name: Jonathan Franks
text: I was pretty happy with my chiropractor back home so finding a new place was not the most exciting thing for me.  I had been using the same chiropractor that my parents introduced me to when I was was young so I wanted to find the right doctor for me and my family.  I moved to Alabama as part of the construction happening in Madison right now and will be here for at least a year.  I found this place on google and called to schedule a consultation.  The office was nice. Front desk was helpful. Dr. Mann was very  professional and gave me the same level of treatment I was used to getting in back in Tennessee.  He also had some new ideas that were actually very helpful at work.  The machinery I sometimes use put me in bad positions and could flare me up for days. I’m a golfer too and he is going to try and get me back on the course.  My swing has been causing some radiating back pain in to my leg.  This place also works out with my schedule. I don’t get off of work until 5 sometimes but can still make it to the office since they are opening until 6. I’ll Be trying the massage therapist soon too.

resp.text: We are happy you found Advanced Chiropractic too Mr. Franks!  We understand that seeing a doctor for the first time can be a little nerve-racking.  We do our best to ensure a thorough and pleasant first visit while answering any questions you may have to help put your mind at ease.  We see a lot of construction workers- both supervisors and laborers.  We keep the office open a little later just so you all commuting back in to town can be seen.  Better hurry with the massage our yearly Christmas Special ends today! See you soon!

name: CT Accounting
text:
Started here for my back issues.  I really thought I got it from my dad but Dr. Mann said a lot of it has to do with lifestyle as well.  I had great results here.  Instant relief, followed by weeks of improvement.  Visits never took that long- barely sat in the waiting room before me treatment begins and I was moved to the next parts of my treatment were with little to no wait.  At the end I did have a few question but Dr. Mann stayed with me to answer my questions.  Nothing beats being able to sleep, wake up, go through a demanding day, and still feel great every day.  I will most definitely keep using Dr. Mann and his clinic on a regular basis.

Update 12/23/19-  It has been months since I have had even the slightest pain! I am back to exercising 3 days a week and doing pretty much anything I want, pain free.  I honestly have had days that I forgot that I was ever in pain all the time.  My son's basketball season started up which means lots of driving and uncomfortable locations I must linger in for hours, multiple nights a week.  With the instructions Dr. Mann gave me my back has held up and I have not missed a second of a single game.  They were able to work me in this morning for an adjustment before I hit the road for the holidays.  Dr. Mann even came out to my car to help me setup me seat cushion to keep my back from acting up on the long drive we have to my wife's family gathering in North Carolina.  I cannot say enough about how happy I am that I found Dr. Mann's office.   Until next time! Thanks again you guys! Have a Merry Christmas!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving the review!  We are so glad you have had such great results!  Chiropractic is great for many things!  We believe in keeping the body pain free and healthy so you can keep doing the things you love to do!  If we wait until pain arises then new damage has occurred and some parts of the body just don't grow back like the original pieces!  We are trying to change the narrative of health care by not only fixing the problem but preventing it from coming back as well. See you next time at Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Hannah Criscoe
text: I feel so good, me and Kate never felt better

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!

name: Daniel Jones
text: Yesterday I woke up and my back had reached a point that I just couldn’t handle anymore. I had been trying to work through it for weeks.  I work second shift so at 11 I began going down the list of chiropractors in Decatur.  I found out that a lot places were closed by lunch and some were taking more time off for the holidays.  When I called advanced chiropractic Dr. Mann said he would keep the office open for me. I arrived after 12 and noticed that the office actually closed at 12.  He still took me in, did my exam and took my xrays himself.  I’m a plant supervisor and I would not have survived the night without Dr. Mann’s help.  I look forward to next week and getting more relief. Thanks again doc

resp.text: Mr. Jones we are glad we were able to help you.  Our proudest moments are getting people back to living life- both work and play!  We look forward to seeing you again! Thank you for leaving us a review and have a good day!

name: Rhett Maples
text: This was my first time seeing a chiropractor. I’ve had back pain for months that would come and go but this time it was worse.  The aching and nerve pain were keeping me awake at night and bothering me throughout the day.  My doctor told me it was time to see a surgeon.  I asked around and was recommended Dr. Mann by multiple friends.  I decided to go in for a consultation.  After talking Dr. Mann said he felt he could keep me from having surgery. And he was right. After 2-3 weeks I started noticing the pain was decreasing. By the end of my rehab I was getting uninterrupted sleep and getting through the work week with no issues.  I feel confident in my back again. I saved thousands by avoiding surgery and didn’t have to worry about the risks of surgery.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Glad we could help you!

name: Sydney Noel
text: I’m very health conscious so I needed to find someone who could conveniently meet all my needs. Chiropractor, massage, health questions things like that. I found this place about 2 years ago and I am thankful I did. Through headaches, back pain, and pregnancy Dr. Mann has helped me even more than I could have imagined. The office is also very easy to get to. My last visit was just for a wellness adjustment and some diet advice.  Dr. Mann always takes time to answer any questions which is really hard to find these days.  I recommend everyone see a chiropractor and use this place if you’re looking for the best office to meet all your health needs!!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Sydney! We are proud to offer a variety of services and products to our patients. Our goal is to be the one place you need for all of your wellness and rehab needs. Thank you using us for so many years. Happy Holidays!

name: Kristina Warren
text: Recently moved to the area and was looking for a new chiropractor. I made the HUGE mistake of visiting Dr. Mann. Very unprofessional. Sort of “know it all”. He would not listen to any of my problems he just kept talking. Other than that I received my adjustment which was fine but then he wanted me to come back 3 times a week! I have a life. I don’t have time for that. The staff was very kind and attentive. Maybe I’ll just try a massage next time.

resp.text: We have no record of a 'Kristina Warren' ever being in this office.  This false review has been reported to the local authorities and Alabama Chiropractic Board.

name: Donald Priest
text: I use Advanced Chiropractic for my low back pain problems.  I see Dr. Mann regularly and he keeps me going.  I try to go once a month so I can keep working. My wife uses their massage therapist regularly and is very pleased with her visits their too.  They have great hours and are very flexible.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!  We are so glad you have had such great improvements over the years.  Dr. Mann enjoys seeing families come in!  We appreciate you spreading the word about Advanced Chiropractic! Have a great day!

name: Madelyn Kelly
text:
Dr. Mann is not only a great chiropractor, but he has awesome people skills and is super sweet and caring! I enjoy going to see him and his staff, I could go on and on about him, and his work. So ill keep it short and sweet, I would give him more than 5 stars, but that is the max I can give, so ALL THE STARS for you Mister!
YOU DA BEST DR MANN!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Madelyn!

name: Sonja Gibson
text: I have a history of neck pain from a car accident and have a job that aggravates my condition. I started seeing Dr. Mann several months ago and have had great results. He is very knowledgeable and friendly. I'm usually nervous about seeing a new doctor but I have felt comfortable with Dr. Mann and his staff since my first visit. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Ms. Gibson!

name: Kris Small
text: Okay, So I've dealt with my back pain for many years I've seen chiropractors for many years and I am a licensed medical provider and I am honestly dismayed by this place, I told the D.C. what exactly was wrong and he ignored me. Attempted to realign a part of my body that didn't need it and when he was done after 6 minutes in the room with me he managed to not fix the issue at all now I'm out over $100.00 and absolutely  no relief for a simple pinched nerve, oh but he did set me up on the "maintenance plan" which is 3 visits a week at $65 per visit that's $780 a month! That's more then my mortgage for what every single other chiropractor has been able to fix and treat in one visit for under $50.00. Please be wise and heed this as a warning. I do not recommend this place for anyone. They may be a legal D.C. but it's as close to a scam ad you can get legally.

resp.text: Kris- you are being dishonest. Health expenses without insurance can be tough, but that is no excuse for your dishonesty in your review. Cameras show your time in the office was approximately 40 minutes; less than 5 minutes in the waiting room- standard for any first visit. Furthermore, we offer the lowest cash prices for new patients in town and also very flexible payment plans.  You were told the prices before you came in. Our cameras even show you were in high spirits until it was time to pay your bill.  And instead of talking to us and working out a payment plan we watched you go into your car and leave this angry review.  Also, what you tried to tell us was ‘wrong’ with you was actually incorrect and probably the main reason you’ve had to deal with your back pain for years instead of actullay being ‘fixed.’ While we have great respect for you and your field, you have to remember- you are not a doctor-  for instance a chiropractor in a car accident should heed the EMT’s instructions because that is what they have been trained to do.  You are also confusing your terminology- maintenance is for wellness patients- and is an optional once a month visit for those who have complete their ‘rehab’ plan to help stay ahead of injuries and reduce wear and tear on the body. Rehab plans are what you were trying to quote. Certain injuries take time to heal and a proper plan for recovery. You are absolutely right Kris- We do things different at Advanced Chiropractic.  We get so many patients who have seen chiropractors that take shortcuts to treat their injuries and the patient continues to deal with pain for years.  Our goal at Advanced Chiropractic is to HEAL the injury. We have found that if we simply make pain go away we are no different than a pain killer or opiate.  However, with our custom made rehabilitation plans you can escape that continued damage, year after year, which is so important as many parts of the body don’t grow back when you repeatedly injure them.

name: Robin Stacy
text: When I start feeling discomfort, Dr Mann has taught me how to manage it: how to move properly and what therapy to do. He is ALWAYS willing to answer my questions. All of the listening and advice has helped tremendously!

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Stacy!  Always good to see you!  I hope you continue having success in your path to wellness!  You are right proper movement is the key to wellness not just going through the motions!  And YES questions are great! They empower the patient! Hope your family is doing well and we will see you next time!

name: Hanna Denton
text: Dr. Mann and his staff are very positive, upbeat and helpful. Their office is clean and welcoming. Definitely a great place to go for your chiropractic and massage needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a review Hanna.  It is always a pleasure to see you and we love having you at our vendor fair as our essential oils representative!!!  Our office is filled with scents of peppermint, orange, lavender, and thieves (depending on the room).  Looking forward to seeing you again!!!

name: Kimberly Smith
text: I used to have really bad back pain. I’ve been to several doctors and this is the only place to give me relief. I was a tough case and it took several weeks but I am finally pain free. Dr. Mann has a nurse practitioner that helped me as well and I also have gotten a few massages. I now have back exercises that help me take care of myself. I only go once a month now to stay feeling good. Now we’re going to see if we can tackle these migraines!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Kimberly!  So glad our team could get you such great results!  And it is fantastic that the exercises and lifestyle tweaks have gotten you to self care!  Don't you worry we'll get to work on those migraines now!  Looking forward to seeing you and Mr. Smith soon!!! Take care!!

text: I recently visited advanced chiropractic for low back pain.  It was so bad I couldn't walk.  He took x-rays and found I have scoliosis.  With the exercises, adjustments, and therapies I received I am now walking pain free.  Very happy with my results

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Marilyn! You are so sweet! And we are thrilled you are walking again! We love seeing you and look forward to helping you and your family!

text: I first came to this office when Dr. Clyde was here. I saw him for many years as he was a church friend. He chose Dr.Mann to take over the office. I am happy he did and I still come regularly to the office for all my aches and pains! Give them a call!

We always strive to give the best care to our patients whether it is staying up to date on the latest research or simply taking the time to hear the patient say what they need to be heard.  I hope we can take care of all your health and wellness needs for years to come!

name: Greg Linderman
text: I was in an ugly car accident when I first came to see Dr. Mann.  I felt a little banged up right after the accident and then sore the next day.  The accident wasn't my fault so I decided to go make sure I was completely OK.  I went to Advanced Chiropractic and have had a great experience.  The front desk was very helpful. I saw the doctor quickly and had xrays taken that day. My soreness was from whiplash from my accident.  It took several weeks to get me back to 100 percent but I'm thankful I went here. I would recommend that anyone in a car accident go here ASAP for care you can trust.

resp.text: Thanks Greg for taking the time to leave this review!  Car accidents are a big deal! They wreck (no pun intended!) the body head to toe!  Even if you don't initially have any pain that doesn't mean there isn't any damage.  Being hit by a 1000lb object even at 5 mph does serious damage to the body.

name: Justin Fagan
text: I came here on a whim never have been to a chiropractor before and i must say that the experience that i received when i walked through the door was nothing short of excellent. Whitney was great and extremely helpful with getting me set up and taken care of especially at a last min call and Gia also done a wonderful job takin care of Me in conjunction with Whitney.. I see Dr Manns name quite often over social media and when you google chiropractor its one of the first to pop up and theres a reason one of the most professional individuals I've ever met , explained everything he was doing to a t and offered mounds of information for things that he had found with my back .. greatly recommend Dr Mann and his staff to get you situated .

text: Dr.  Mann and staff were great. I was nervous about going to a chiropractor as I am one who tends to tense up when past chiropractors twist my on my neck. resp.text: So glad you had such great results!

name: kelsey johnson
text: I was having back pain and decided it was finally time to do something about it.  So I did my Google search and found this to be a very popular place. They accepted my blue cross blue sheild insurance too so that was nice.  They were able to work me in the next day. My first appointment was less than an hour.   All my worries were examined and questions answered. I even recieved treatment in that hour. The next day they had my entire care plan cost on paper including how long it would most likely take to meet my goals. My next visits were less than 30 minutes in the office TOTAL.  That's fantastic considering my eye appointments go for about 90! I just finished my first week of rehab and I'm already noticing improvement! Definitely pleased so far and will be  recommending to my friends and family!!!

resp.text: Thanks Kelsey!  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave us a review! So glad to hear that you are having good results!  We always want to see results within 2 weeks to make sure your individually made care plan is effective!  We look forward to seeing you again and meeting your family! Have a great week!!!

name: Sarah Killian
text: I get really bad headaches. I’ve tried over the counter medicine and it did nothing. Went to a specialist and after several weeks still no significant results. Went to a holistic doctor- still nothing. I had been diagnosed with everything from migraines to fibromyalgia. A friend of mine told me to try her Chiropractor because she had great results for her low back. They take insurance (I didn’t know that at the time) so that was helpful. My first visit I Came in and the front desk was very helpful. I soon met Dr. Mann and after listening to my history he took some x-rays. He examined them and decided it was safe to begin treatment. Said what I actually had was a cervicogenic headache and that he was confident we could reduce the number of headaches I was having.  Within the week my headaches were almost totally gone. After two weeks of no headaches I am now down to just monthly visits to make sure they don’t come back. My only regret is that I didn’t go sooner. Thanks Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us for your healthcare needs Ms. Killian!  Headaches can be the biggest pain (no pun intended) .  I'm glad our team here at Advanced Chiropractic was able to get you sleeping and working like normal again.  We enjoy every visit with you!  Good luck with the new job and we'll see you soon!!!

name: Terri Richards
text: I came for shoulder and neck pain.  You never spend much time waiting here! The front desk is very kind, and Dr. Mann does a lot more than just crackin bones!  I also received exercises, stretches, and ergonomics tips for self treating at home.  He showed ways to tackle things differently so that I don't keep reinjuring myself.  I also keep doing my exercises that I was given to keep going pain free.  Tight shoulders are gone too!  I was skeptical at first because I had never been to a chiropractor before but the pain and even the numbness are completely gone now.  I really appreciate all the help! I'll probably try their massage therapist next! Highly recommend to anyone who tired of being achy and in pain!!!

resp.text: We are glad you had a good experience Terri!  Neck and shoulder pain is extremely common now and many people just ignore it!  Our rehabilitation program and ergonomics coaching is a major part to our success!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: Ashley Smith
text: DO NOT LET THIS MAN TOUCH YOU!!!! I've been going to chiropractor for 10 years have always felt much better afterwards. After leaving his office I've been in bed for days from pain.  Every other chiropractor reviews your x-rays first then does an adjustment. He never looked at my x-rays and wanted me to come back in to get my results. I will be getting my x-rays that he took and take them to a different chiropractor to see what he messed up.

resp.text:
Hi Ashley, we believe you have mistakenly reviewed the wrong office- we have no record of an Ashley Smith ever being treated in our facility. At Advanced Chiropractic, our patients' x-rays are always reviewed with the doctor on the first visit before treatment begins to ensure a safe, quick recovery.  'First do no harm' is a rule we strictly adhere to- as should all doctors. We are so sorry you received a poor standard of care at another clinic. Please give us a call at (256)351-8500 and we will help you recover from the injury you have endured.
Also, when you retrieve the x-rays from the other office you visited we'll review them for no charge- just mention this post..
