text: Went above and beyond to work me in on a Saturday to give me some pain relief. Thank you for your time.  Conservative with xrays and common sense provider with a genuine care for the patient.

name: Ray Dutton
text: Important insights from my first visit helped relieve me from a lot of pain.

name: Robert O'Neal
text: Great Experience

name: Scott Brown
text: The best!

name: Jackson Landscape
text: Just good at what he does.

name: Dana Lewis
text: Most awesome  chiropractor  ever!!!

name: April Rogers
text: I absolutely love Dr. Hollowell and his staff. They are very friendly and very understanding. I would highly recommend for anyone.

name: Angie West-Mendez
text: My husband had been suffering from debilitating lower back pain for 2 years. After going to doctors and other chiropractors, he went to Howell Chiropractic. After about 2 months of treatments, the improvement was remarkable. He hasn’t had to go back in almost a year. He’s had some back pains due to his job, which is physically demanding, but he recovers much quicker than he used to. We highly recommend Dr. Howell and could not be more grateful for what he has done.

name: Cassey Hayes
text: All around great place to go too! I use Dr Redden! I’ve had some mild-some what severe neck pain and lower back issues; and I’ve been twice and I can tell a difference!! Highly recommend!

name: Chuck Westrick
text: Hollowell Chiropractic is highly recommended. They get you in and out. They've got a friendly and knowledgeable staff. After each of my visits, I leave feeling like a new person. Come see them for your Chiropractic ailments.

name: LaMesha Craft
text: Dr. Hollowell and his staff are nothing short of phenomenal! I've been going to the chiropractor on an "as needed" basis for the last six years.  I was at Fort Rucker for a military education course and needed an "adjustment."  The staff are professional, friendly, and proficient! Dr. Hollowell is very attentive to all patients.  With the exception of the first visit (due to the thorough in-processing) I was in and out in about 30 minutes.  I highly recommend Hollowell Chiropractic Clinic ... a little adjustment goes a long way!

name: Megan Ledezma Vera
text:
Dr. Hollowell and his staff were incredible. I was suffering from chronic back pain and an acute exacerbation. I had been told that my right shoulder was lower than the left since childhood. He was the first medical professional to even suggest that I might have one leg that is shorter than the other. A series of x-rays later, that was one of the issues!

I can't believe how professional and quick the staff was. Same day appointment with x-rays, assessment and adjustment! I walked out feeling like a new person!

name: Patti Williams-Rosenswie
text: Worst experience I have ever had in a professional office.  Waited over an hour in the treatment room, got up to leave and doctor stopped me in the hall to tell me he was just coming in.  He talked down to me like I was an idiot and hadn't researched my condition or treatments at all.  Offered treatment only on one foot instead of both.  Treatment offered was what had been done at home on a regular basis.  I refused the TENS treatment  so he ordered ultrasound and xrays and stretching exercise I also do routinely.  I would not recommend this practice even in an emergency.

name: Susan franklin
text: I have been to the doctor and physical therapists to relieve my back and shoulder pain. It helped a little but I still had reoccurring pain. A relative suggested that I try Dr. Holloway; it has really helped. I would strongly recommend his practice.

name: John Carter
text: Dr. Kaul is the best chiropractor I have found. His staff is super nice and helpful. I've been seeing Dr.Kaul for over 5 years now and I won't be seen by anyone else. Most of the time 1 adjustment gets my back and neck back in line.

name: Stephanie Anderson
text: They are the best at everything at Mobile Chiropractic! The best doctor-Dr.Douglas Kaul and the best staff. They are always friendly and professional. They treat you like family.

name: Cathy Zevac
text: Dr. Dixon has helped me a great deal.  I am more comfortable with her manipulation than any chiropractor I have used.  I have been using a chiropractor now for over ten years and feel like I have a good point of reference for different "styles" of care.   Her gentle massage manipulation works wonders and I don't have any fear of unexpected " pops" or jerking.   If you have never used a chiropractor and have any concerns about it, Dr. Dixon would be the perfect person to see.  Her style of manipulation is comfortable and very helpful.

name: J'Kayla Edwards
text: I have never been to a chiropractor before my car accident so I was really nervous about going. I always felt comfortable and the staff was very friendly. It was easy to make time in my schedule to get there. I never spent more than 30 minutes in the office which was extremely convenient. Dr.Kaul was great and knew  exactly what he was doing and I'm so glad I went

name: Tonya Payton
text:
If you're in need of chiropractic services and are within driving distance I highly recommend Mobile Chiropractic Associates, here's some reasons why;

1. Less than 10 minute wait times to see the doc, and if you're really in a bind you can just walk in without an appointment  (returning patients) and they will fit you in...really!

2. All of doctors are professional but definitely treat you like family (where a lot of places SAY they do the same, Mobile Chiropractic is one of the only medical offices I know that actually DOES it.

3. They accept many different types of insurance, including Medicare, HOWEVER they will work with anyone to make chiropractic care affordable.

4. On the spot X-RAYS available, no need to head over to the hospital if you need one

5. They will move things around to get you an appointment at a time that works for you.

6. IT WORKS!! Chiropractic covers many more problems than just back/neck pain (headaches is a big one, even migraines!) and it truly works. They do a great job and really listen to you.

Seriously, I could go on and on but here's my point, they are the best and you are definitely not going to regret your visit so give them a try!

name: Stephanie Deese
text: I have been a patient for many years. All of the doctors are wonderful.  I do not have to wait long to see the doctor when I go for my appointment.  The office staff is always so nice and very helpful.  I highly recommend Mobile Chiropractic Associates.

name: Fred Moore
text: Dr. Kaul, Dr. Beaumont, Dr. Dixon and Dr. Henry are ALL excellent doctors to work with at Mobile Chiropractic.  They have one of the most experienced clinics in town.   Our law firm has handled hundreds of cases where our clients have received treatment from Mobile Chiropractic and our clients have nothing but great things to say about them.   I would not hesitate to send a client or a family member to them.  Highly Recommended.

name: Megan Blosser
text: The staff at Mobile Chiropractic Associates are friendly and compassionate.   I have always had a positive experience when I visit.  I was leery about chiropractic treatment, but Dr. Dixon put me at ease and the difference in my pain after an adjustment is such a relief. One of the highlights of Mobile Chiropractic Associates is not having to wait long at all after you arrive for your appointment or if you happen to just drop in.

name: Gamel Hawthorne Lofton
text: I think this is the best place to go.  They have great doctors and they work around your schedule.  I love them.

name: Missy Jones-Reed
text: The staff was very friendly and fast. The doctor was sure to involve you every step that was being performed. The will also work with you on payment if you cannot afford the first initial visit. Love this place will recommend to others.

name: Charlotte Blount
text: Mobile Chiropractic and Associates I highly recommend.  The doctors and staff are warm, friendly, and very professional.  This is a more holistic approach to healthcare and it works.  When your in pain it really zaps your energy.  Try this healing approach. You may be surprised at how good you feel.

name: Rebekah Graham
text: I have been going here for quite a while and everyone is friendly and Dr Dixon is the greatest.

name: John Adam Moreau
text: Douglas Kaul DCM greatly alleviated problems I had. The experience showed me that chiropractic is a key branch of medicine.  One goes, when appropriate, to a dentist, an MD, an osteopath.  Now I know chiropractic is also a sensible option. No one field has the answers to all the afflictions, injuries or ailments one may have.  The approaches and methods of chiropractic might be just what one needs in certain situations.

name: Jason Herring
text: Me and my wife both go there when we are in any pain. My wife has to go because of a car wreck she was in years ago that she gets migraines from. Every time she goes, she feels like a million bucks after! I would definitely recommend this place! And there staff is the friendliest in town!

name: Emily Hill
text: Extremely great service! The staff is always so nice and accommodating, and the doctors are very experienced and can get you feeling better fast!

name: Stephen Moore
text:
My law firm (Moore Law Firm) has worked with the Doctors at Mobile Chiropractic for over 25 years on now hundreds of car accident cases where their Doctors have treated our clients. Without exception, every single client has had great results.
Drs. Kaul, Beaumont, Dixon and Henry are recognized as four of the best chiropractors in Mobile.
Most of our clients who treated at Mobile Chiropractic have made a full recovery from their injuries at the time of release from care. In addition to my clients Mobile Chiropractic also treats my family members.
The Doctors at Mobile Chiropractic are compassionate and make every patient feel comfortable with the treatment plan provided.
I would not hesitate to recommend Mobile Chiropractic to my clients, family and friends.

name: Jensen Goslyn
text:
I first came to the MCA with another patient and after seeing how much help Dr. Kaul was able to give -her- I decided to make an appointment for myself to see if he might be able to help with my case.

The office/waiting area is neat and clean, staff knowledgeable, friendly, efficient and quite professional - I felt very comfortable each time I came into the office, even when not a prospective patient.

Dr. Kaul is one of those chiropractors that has a no-fuss, honest approach that I appreciate greatly - he listened as I described my issues, gave me an efficient-and-thorough exam, took a set of x-rays and then talked with me - not -at- me - about treatment options. All without assuming that I needed lay-person's terms or talking down to me as some medical professionals have in the past.

I would absolutely recommend others to come by for treatment/adjustment(s). It's time and money well spent!

name: Killer Beaz
text: Great staff, Great service!  Dr. Henry has taken care of our family for a couple of decades.

name: Tyler F. (Tflo)
text: Dr. Rodd is the best. He always fixes me up and wait time is nothing. Super friendly, HIGHLY recommend!

name: Hot Rod Todd
text: Best chiropractor ever. He really takes his time and doesn’t just pop your neck and send you on your way.

name: Johnathon Pell
text: Awesome guy, awesome staff.  This guy is no joke, definitely knows what he's doing. I'll never go anywhere else

name: R Webb
text: Dr. Rodd is amazing. Once you visit him you’ll never want to go to another chiropractor again. The best ever.

name: Theresa B
text: Friendly, caring and professional staff and they don't over-schedule, leaving you in pain and waiting forever. Dr. Rodd is the real deal. He cracks me up! 🙄😉

name: Amanda Woerner
text: I am at the beginning stage of treatment and I have already seen improvement.  Dr. Schultz is great at what he does.  My neck was unable to turn to the right last week and now I can turn my head without pain.

name: Mei Mei Parrish
text: Dr. Jesse is amazing! I had neck tension and headaches that I could not manage to get rid of. I saw Dr. Jesse and after a few appointments I can see a huge difference! He takes his time and definitely knows the best treatment plan for you. So glad to have found a chiropractor on the eastern shore that was able to help me!

name: Benjamin Cash
text: I can’t recommend HealthSource Chiropractic enough. Jesse is the man. He is great and really goes the extra mile to make sure your comfortable, understand what’s going on and even takes a sports medicine approach to your healing. Amanda is awesome with billing, scheduling and managing the front office. If you are looking for a great chiropractic  office on the Eastern Shore then look no further than HealthSource in Malbis at the Eastern Shore Plaza 🙂

name: Barbara Herring
text: Dr Jessie is a very gifted & kind Chiroprator. I have seen many Doctors over the years & he is one of the Best . He listens to my concerns & finds just the right gentle relief.  I am grateful to have found him.

name: Ethan Leslie
text:
Jesse at HealthSource Spanish Fort has a way with finding that pop that has driven you crazy for weeks. His hands make you feel like you are being pulled apart like soft bread in the best way imaginable. Extremely knowledgeable, kind, and detailed in his explanation and weekly regiment.
My only regret is waiting until I was 31 to go.
If you have been on the fence about going to a chiropractor and are looking for one you can trust. If given the chance I can say with confidence Jesse Schultz at HealthSource Spanish Fort will change your life and how you view chronic pain. 10/10 kartwheels would recommend and excited for the next appointment.

name: Joey Smith
text: Jesse is a top notch chiropractor that goes above and beyond to ensure your quality of health and way of life. If you're looking to come in for an adjustment or establish a plan to get your body operating as designed look no further than Health Source Chiropractic in Spanish Fort. Great service and great experience every time. Thanks Jesse.

name: Matthew Schultz
text: I was able to track down Dr. Schultz after he left from the previous establishment I was going to for care. He was the only one that took the time with his patients. When I found out he was in Spanish Fort, I immediately booked an appointment. One thing you will learn, chiropractic care is about teaching you to take care of yourself. You don’t just get adjusted. You learn stretches and strengthening techniques to better your well being. Although Dr. Schultz and I have the same last name, as I can tell we are not related. If you are looking to better your well being you have to come see Dr. Schultz at HealthSource, you and your body will be happy you did.

name: Shelly D
text: I have had just a few visits with Dr. Jesse but I am very happy to have found him! I just moved here and had some long standing issues that I have been working through. He is addressing them ALL! I am looking forward to a long and healthy relationship with Dr. Jesse and HealthSource!

name: Scott Burke
text: Great team from the front desk to getting worked on by Jesse. Friendly and welcoming atmosphere. Highly recommended.

name: David Mathias
text: It’s awesome to have have new HealthSource Team in Spanish Fort. Doctor Schultz and his team are highly competent and the office is so welcoming!  Love this place!

resp.text: Thank you for your support of our practice!

name: Victoria Fox Kinnamont
text: I LOVE MY CHIROPRACTIC TEAM!!! Dr. Meredith, her husband Jim, and their staff are kind, understanding, and thorough. I first "walked" into their office in so much pain. It was more like a crawl. With every appointment, my pain level and quality of life have improved. It's been over a year and I'm still a faithful patient. Dr. Meredith is also helping me through my new pregnancy! THANK YOU!

name: Brent Curtin
text: I am not the easiest patient in any capacity and I love these guys. Doc Mere and Jim are first class. I recommend them Highly if you are looking for a chiropractor. They take time to get to know you and want to see you get better.

name: Therese Crowson
text:
I would like to thank Health Source Chiropractic for the amazing Rehab and Wellness service I've received. Dr. Meredith is passionate with her service and knowledge. My health and mobility has excelled above whatever I could have imagined. I'm so grateful I've had the opportunity to experience the care and knowledge of Dr. Meredith. I have to admit I was a little skeptical at first. This was my first experience with Chiropractic services. I was referred by a co worker and now almost all of our staff and family members are under Dr. Meredith's amazing care!
Please don't suffer if you need care. Dr Meredith will get you back your quality of life you deserve. Also the staff Jim and Carla are so kind and helpful. I can't thank you all enough for your services.

Life time patient,

Therese Crowson

name: Sarah Creech
text:
Skilled, caring professionals.  State-of-the arts equipment.

I had a debilitating ear ache that persisted for over a year.  Doctors examinations found no problem with my ear and I was actually diagnosed as having migraine headaches located in ear area.  Medications helped temporarily, but ear ache always came back.  HealthSource of Spanish Fort was able to determine and fix the source of my ear ache.   The pain was caused by a misalignment in my neck and upper back.  After two months of treatments, I am so happy to say,  my ear is 'pain free.'

Due to an automobile accident years ago, I had a spinal fusion (L4 and L5).  I continue to go to HealthSource monthly for maintenance.  Their massage therapist is wonderful!  A very welcome, affordable member of their staff.  Thank you HealthSource.

name: bjjenkinsand3kids
text: Dr Meredith, Jim, and Carla are amazing to say the least! I started seeing them with nearly no range of motion and in extreme pain! Within 2 months I have great range of motion now and my pain has decreased drastically!  Although I'm not completely better yet, I'm definitely headed in that direction! I will definitely continue to use them indefinitely!

name: Skylor Yates
text: Great people with great work.

name: Todd Harding,sr
text: Dr.Merideth and her assistant Jim got my back, neck, and pelvic bone back in alignment. I'm feeling like a million bucks and got me back in the  golf game again. They really know their stuff. Awesome experience.

name: Danny Spybey
text: Been going there for years and they have never let me down! As an active golfer it is a perfect fit!

name: Chance White
text: Dr. Addess and Jim have helped my son during football season as well as the off season.  He used to have migraines and that has stopped since receiving treatment from Health Source Chiropractic.  They even came to one of his games to watch him play.  I will recommend them to anyone and everyone.  They not only offers a great service, they genuinely care about you as a person.

name: Margot Hamilton
text: Amazing people. Very caring and always out for the patients best interest.

name: Raeann Passmore
text: The only thing I can say other than this being one of the friendliest and helpful places I've ever been to, is the staff are amazingly informational and I would recommend anyone I know to this place so if anyone is in need of a great chiropractor along with some great new friends this is the place for you and again thank all of you at Health Source for being supportive and helpful

name: Jonathan Moral
text: Flexible scheduling and convenient hours to accommodate the needs of patients. Many patients, like myself, come in experiencing some discomfort and getting relief quickly is the goal. As a walk-in patient, the front office took my information down and then I proceeded to x-ray and then treatment. Dr. Hardy went over what he saw and let me know what to expect from treatment. I was already feeling much better after the first adjustment. Follow-ups insured my relief would progress. The office is welcoming and well-maintained. The professional and friendly staff were pleasant to work with.

resp.text: Thank you sir!  We really appreciate you taking the time to leave us that great review.

name: Catherine Teague
text: This is my First experience with Chiropractic Care And it is Amazing! The Hardy Team makes you feel at ease with your concerns and Dr. Hardy is very professional and  efficient. I would definitely recommend you give them a visit if you are thinking of natural remedies for healing and health👍⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

resp.text: Catherine, thank you such much for your great review!  We sure enjoy seeing you!

name: Matthew Woods
text: Amazing chiropractor. Tosha, Courtney, and Kelly are the best. Sometimes I need to move my appointment around. They always work with me when I need help. Very good people. Would recommend to anyone and everyone.

resp.text: Matt, thank you so much for your review.  We always look forward to seeing you and really appreciate you allowing us to provide you with chiropractic care.

name: Stacie Wheeler
text: Dr. Hardy and his team have been great.  They helped me with my back pain (hurt with moving). He even worked out some issues with my neck that I didn't really know was a problem, however after a few visits it felt so much better.  They always are respectful of my time and worked with me to figure out the best plan to best utilize my insurance benefits! All around great experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Stacie.  We really appreciate you allowing us to take care of you!

name: Alex Pitts
text: Didn’t feel anything during treatment... don’t feel anything now- except $125 less in my wallet.  Hours are almost impossible and they’re constantly closing. They’re friendly though I’ll give them that.

resp.text: I'm very sorry but we do not have record of this person in our office.  It hurts to see us get a 1 star review since me and my staff strive to provide the very best care we can.  It is true, we have closed quite a bit over the past week due to the unusual ice and snow storm that has closed Decatur down.  We felt that is was in our patient's and staff's best interest to not put them at risk during this time.  I am sorry our hours don't fit your schedule.  We have office hours from 7:00 am to 4:30 pm most days.  Unfortunately, we cannot accommodate everyone's schedule.  As with most conditions, one visit is usually not enough to correct most problems.  We feel like our fees are very reasonable on the first visit, especially since that amount includes x-rays and treatment.  We really do appreciate the opportunity to help you.  If we can ever be assistance to you in future, please let us know.  I really appreciate the kind words about our staff's friendliness!  They are the best!

name: daniel naron
text: Dr. Hardy is an excellent chiropractor. He has a genuine care for his patients that is easily identified as soon as you meet him. He is blessed with a professional and polite team that takes care of business. You are greeted with a warm welcome and leave with a friendly goodbye. The office and equipment are immaculately clean and the staff practices excellent housekeeping and hygiene. A true blessing for the Decatur community.

resp.text: Thank you so much Daniel!

name: Natalie Melendez
text: Dr. Hardy and his fantastic staff are always very welcoming, they make you feel like family!  They truly care about their patients.  Best chiropractor in town!

resp.text: Thank you Natalie!  We appreciate you!

name: Darlene Hughes
text: 100% recommend Dr. Hardy. I have slept better in the last month, than I have in a year. His staff is always helpful and can answer any questions you have.

resp.text: Thank you so much Darlene!  We really do appreciate the opportunity to take care of your chiropractic needs.

name: David
text: No one answers the phone at this office! I have been trying to have my records transferred from here for over 3 weeks now and I can't get a hold of anyone there.  I am either going to have to take off work to get here or pay $350 or more for my doctor to do a new exam and xrays because I'm hurting.  Infuriating!!!

resp.text: We really hate to see a review like this!  We do answer our phones Monday – Thursday 7:00 am – 4:30 pm.  Our voicemail has Dr. Hardy’s personal cell phone number on it.  We can be reached through Google, Facebook, our website, email or Dr. Hardy’s personal cell phone.  We have had no records request from anyone named David.  Not sure why you would mention the figure of $350 for new x-rays and exam since we never charge the patient more than $125 out-of-pocket on the first visit.  We have reason to believe you were not actually a patient in our office.  If so, we apologize and would be more than happy to get your records to you or your new doctor immediately.  Our phone is (256) 355-1049.

name: Tammy Locklear
text: First experience today with chiropractic services. It was WONDERFUL! Thank you for putting my anxiety at ease. Professional and personable! Thank you for a great first experience.

name: Jeremy Alexander
text: Very nice folks! My wife was in a lot of pain and they saw her right away. They gave her therapy and the Dr adjusted her back. It's been my experience that Hardy Chiropractic genuinely cares about their patient's well-being and attempts to provide services that will either eliminate or minimize your pain.  Both the staff and Dr. Hardy are  very polite and caring individuals that are always willing to go the extra mile in serving their patients.

Over the last year, I've referred 3 of my co-workers to Hardy Chiropractic, all of them still see Dr. Hardy on a regular basis.

name: Amanda Goodlett
text: I began having problems with my back and neck and I was in a lot of pain so I made the decision to make an appointment with Dr Hardy. His staff was able to find an availability for me to come in very quickly. Since I have started my treatment plan, the pain I was feeling in my lower back is almost gone and the pain in my neck has decreased by at least 30%. Just as a lot of people might be, I was very nervous to begin a treatment plan in chiropractic therapy because of my pain but Dr Hardy and his staff have kept me well informed. I would rate the entire staff with excellent customer service because every time I go, I see nothing but smiling faces. They make me feel relaxed and are all quick to help meet any needs or answer any questions that I have with confidence. I appreciate that in a staff when I am quite literally putting my health in their hands. I give them 5 stars.

text: I do not know what I would have done without Dr. Hardy. This wonderful Dr. has help me to continue walking and when I had no money he keep seeing and treating me just as if I had paid him. Dr. Hardy even saw me on his days off and was always welling to come in the office on the weekend if I needed him. He even bought a exam table that automatic goes up and down because I could not get onto the regular exam tables. So now I have my own exam room, just for me. He never did give up on me, even when there was nothing more he could do for me. He keep me going until I had back surgery and he is still taking care of me. To me he is the best doctor who I will always owe my life too. I love my #1 Doctor. Lets not forget the ladies in the office, who are kind, friendly, and make you feel like family. They all are so loveable, and I love each and ever one in that office. Including Mrs. Hardy.

name: Anne Chelekis
text: I absolutely LOVE my visits to SpineCare.  I have arthritis in my right hip, and while there is nothing to cure it, there are ways of treating it, and lessening the pain.  When I first went to SpineCare, I thought the severe pain was because of my knee,   Dr. Houssain immediately diagnosed my condition after studying my MRI and x-rays, as being a deteriorated hip due to arthritis.  The pain in my knee was due to using my i t band to compensate for the weak hip.  ( there was absolutely nothing wrong with my knee!). He then gave me some therapeutic exercises to strengthen my back, so that I would rely less on my I t band muscle.  Now that I understand what’s going on with my joints and how to properly treat the arthritis, my pain level most days is way down from what it used to be.  Now when I leave my SpineCare appointment, I feel so good and relaxed,  it’s almost like going to a spa!  Thanks Dr. Houssain - you’re the best!

name: Willie Anderson
text: Dr. Hussein is the best He started working on my back about two weeks ago  today I am able to do things that I wasn’t able to do before I started seeing him I can walk without hurting now I can walk up to mile and a half No pain and  a lot of my pain is gone thanks to Dr. Hussein I recommend anybody with back pain to go see Dr. Hussein you’ll start feeling better within days go see him

name: Ryan
text: Total waste of money.  The staff was friendly but the doctor didn’t do anything but try and get as much money as he could. He said my symptoms were normal and would go away.  Put a tens unit on me for ten mins rubbed some icy hot on my back. Then pops my upper back when my lower back was the problem, tried to sell me a back brace to drive in. The best part is when I come back on my next visit I’ll get a core exercise routine.  Now I  guarantee it’s the same xerox sheet he gives to everyone and could have handed it to me today. That’ll be $90 and charged me for the sticky pads he used on my back. Complete waste of money and time off of work.  Should have googled my symptoms.

name: Susan Bish
text:
My husband suffered 13 years with lower back pain.  He went through physical therapy, pain management and even surgery to have his tailbone removed. Nothing helped until he met Dr. Houssain. Within three weeks, his pain subsided and within five weeks, the pain was gone.

I went to Dr. Houssain six months later with lower back pain and bursitis. I have been seeing him for five weeks and amazingly, I am now able to sleep a full night for the first time in four years, go back to my exercise classes and resume my life to the fullest.

Dr. Houssain takes all the time you need, answers any questions and is extremely knowledgeable. He has a wonderful staff that is friendly and very helpful .

name: Sharon J Smith
text:
After pain in foot kept me from walking more than 20 mins on my treadmill, I went to a podiatrist, who said surgery. I asked friends for chiropractor recommendations to see if something less invasive would work. Saw Dr. Houssain and did a thorough physical exam of my foot and asked lots of questions. He began therapy for cleaning out fibrotic tissue and made suggestions for exercise and range of motion as to not cause further inflammation and healing could began.
I’m now up to an hour on my treadmill, no pain and beyond thankful!
Another issue the Dr. helped me work through was chronic pain in left shoulder blade, turns out it was my posture (head hung, reading and looking down at phone...). It is completely gone and I so appreciated him teaching me how I could keep that from reoccurring! I’m all about education, prevention and non invasive, non drug options, if at all possible!
Thank you, Dr. Houssain! I so appreciate you. Very friendly, professional, kind staff also!

name: MissSlipjig
text: Dr. Houssain is excellent! I haven't been to his office in over a year and half but that's only because he fixed all my problems. :)

name: Steven Sims
text: Very competent and knowledgeable staff. Massage was great and Dr. Houssain was excellent!

name: Raymond Webb
text:
I am a 71 year old Complex Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS) patient. I have suffered accelerated degenerative disc disease (DDS), spondylosis, and stenosis  in my spine, since age 38. In the past 15 years, my condition has necessitated a spinal fusion (L5-S1), a microdiscectomy (L4-L5),  and a neck (cervical) fusion (C3-C4).       The surgeries were successful with the last neck surgery sparing me from becoming a paraplegic or death. I have been blessed with excellent surgeons and caregivers. I'm grateful.
I had tried chiropractor prior to my surgeries. The chiropractor worked diligently with me. I also worked hard doing all to help myself. The effort did not help. I would suppose my spine had too many mechanical issues at that time.
As I aged, my condition worsened until I was bed fast 18 hours or more each 24 hour cycle. One day as I was laying in bed , the latter part of 2015, I thought maybe I should try chiropractor services again. After all, the surgeries had alleviated some of the worst mechanical problems in my spine. I had 7 primary points of pain. The pain between my shoulder blades was the worse, a grating, stinging type of pain. My thoughts were, If I can knock out 80% of that pain, I would be 30-40% better overall. Also, this pain would mushroom into total body pain, unless I was able to quiet the pain. Laying on ice gel packs would help quiet the pain.
I obtained the services of Dr. Anthony Houssain at SpineCare.  My first meeting (Jan. 2016) with Dr. Houssain, I laid out my objective. My objective was to lessen the pain between the shoulder blades by 80%.  Dr. Houssain set me on a treatment path to help me accomplish my objective. He was encouraging and very knowledgeable. Dr. Houssain believed he could give me back a part of my life that I had lost.
On my second visit,  Dr. Houssain manipulated 3 vertebrates in my thoracic area. I went home and lay down. I had a first, two hours pain free between the shoulder blades. Now, I had hope and believed we were on the right path to accomplish my goal. He has helped me not only to obtain my objective , but to exceed my objective. At times, I do have pain between my shoulder blades. When I experience the pain, I execute the home part of Dr. Houssain's treatment program. Dr. Houssain's treatment program with other tools in my toolbox are sufficient to manage and mostly alleviate the pain between the shoulder blades.
I love the game of golf. Seven or eight years ago, I was having a good day for me. My son and I decided to play a round of golf. My whole body was in pain after the round. I got home, went to my room, shut the door, and cried my heart out. I was in total body pain and believed I would never play golf again. This was my last round of golf with my son. I did not hit a golf ball for another 7-8 years.
After the pain between my shoulder blades was mostly alleviated and/or pain level lessened, it was time to attempt a round of golf again. On April 19, 2016, I played golf with my son, shooting 89. I was sore, but did not have any serious side-effects. I now play golf, about once a week. I am now able to be up more hours per day.
My objective was accomplished with Dr. Houssain's help. In fact, it would not have happened without him. I am not well, but I have a much better life. Will I continue to improve or will the good ride end? I don't know, but I know it been a much better ride since April. I thank the good Lord for putting people in my life to help me, Dr Houssain being one of those people.
I know every one is different, and one may obtain better results than me, or not obtain as good results as me. But, I always have kept trying to find any nugget that would help me be better. I hope those who read this, will keep trying to find that nugget for themselves. If one keeps trying, they may well find the nugget that makes their life better.. Keep on, keeping on. God bless you in your journey.

name: Cheryl Conrad
text: After struggling with heel pain for 6 months, I finally went to a medical specialist.  Without x-rays, MRI, etc., he told me I had heel spurs & the only thing to do was surgery.  I then went to a 2nd specialist who said I did not need surgery, wearing a boot for 4-6 weeks should take care of it.  Again no MRI.  After 6 months in the boot & still the same level of pain, the doctor said the only thing that would help would be surgery.  During those 6 months, I met 4 people who had the same problem & either had the surgery & had to have a 2nd surgery to correct the first or gave up when the surgery didn't work.  I went on the internet & read about Chiropractors  & their success with patients with heel spurs.  I made an appointment with Dr. Hussain at Spine Care & he ordered an MRI which showed my problem was not spurs but Achilles tendonitis & a tear in the tendon. After 3 months of treatment, I am out of the boot & in no pain.  I can't thank the doctor enough.  I only wish I had gone to him first.

name: AD Williams
text:
Dr Houssain and the staff is my first point of contact for any injury that does not involve a bone sticking out.  They have seen all five of my family members.  In each case he has evaluated the injury.  He has sent us out for MRI/XRay when necessary.  (In my opinion, practices with XRay/MRI have a tendency to use them every time and cost more money...)  For each injury, he has provided an easy to remember and execute program of exercises to build strength in the area of concern.  He provided excellent referrals to other medical providers when necessary.  He is always looking for literature backed programs of treatment.

(I have been a SpineCare patient for nearly three years now for an over 20 year old case of Degenerative Disc Disorder.  Dr Houssain has kept me out of surgery, for which I am greatful!)

I highly recommend using SpineCare.

name: Leslie Boyd
text:
We are so pleased with the results from our visits with Dr Mix.

My infant daughter failed her newborn hearing screening at the hospital, and at her 2 mo check up. She was diagnosed with having excess fluid on and around the eardrum, a condition which causes hearing loss and typically causes ear infections. We had taken her to an ENT and pediatrician, and both recommended surgery to put tubes in to help drain the fluid off her eardrum.

After her diagnosis, we visited Dr Mix twice a week for adjustments at approx 2 months old. In only a months time, we have seen vast improvement.  Her last ENT visit was a couple of days ago. She finally passed her hearing exam for the very first time in both ears!!! There is still a small amount of fluid remaining, but our ENT detected a noticable reduction in the amount, and has postponed the need for tubes.

We will continue to seek weekly treatment with Dr Mix, and are so happy that his treatments allowed us a non-invasive approach to restore our  baby's hearing. Dr Mix has been wonderful to work with through such a difficult time. He has taken extra care to go over computer readings with us that have  conclusively shown the gradual improvement at each stage as well. My daughter  has smiled and cooed through every adjustment (no, they don't hurt AT ALL). As a side benefit, one of the computer screenings showed she also had a vertabrae out of alignment which can affect digestion as well. After her adjustments we have also seen improvement in this area also.

Parents, DO NOT HESITATE to schedule an appointment for your babies and children at this office. Both Dr Mix and Yvonne are wonderful to work with, and show genuine concern for us at each visit. The office is super clean, and has very up to date equipment too. We have never had long wait times, even when we have stopped by unexpectedly without an appointment, and the waiting room was full. I am so happy we "discovered" Discover Chiropractic.

text: It was my first time going to a chiropractor and the experience was amazing. I was made aware of how the body moves and what was going to happen as I explained what was happening with my body. They took the time to listen and add relief back to my life.

resp.text: We’re glad you enjoyed your adjustment, Eric! We look forward to seeing you in clinic again soon!

name: Katelyn G
text:
Update after owner reply:
Unfortunately that response is completely unhelpful. The focus of that response is explaining the membership and 2 month commitment which I never asked or said I was confused by. I understand that it takes time for an adjustment to make things better (as I stated I assumed that was the issue at first) BUT after multiple visits the pain should be getting better not worse. It's insane to expect someone to continue treatment for 2 months that is causing pain. In the future, it would be helpful if a business response is helpful and not just say irrelevant things to provide a response.

I was really excited to have a location close to my house and hopeful the frequent adjustments would be helpful. After my first visit I felt great and decided to do the membership to make sure frequent visits was economical for me. You're required to do 2 months of membership which wasn't a problem for me at the time BUT after multiple visits (they give you a few free visits so you can get in twice a week at the beginning as recommended), I was in more pain. At first I assumed it my muscles adjusting to a new and better alignment but the pain lasted way too long after my visits. I decided to go see a different chiropractor group that maybe has more focus on time with patients versus the in and out style of The Joint. Luckily the pain started to resolve after my first visit at the new practice. Unfortunately I wasted money for 2 months of treatment at The Joint where I spent one month in pain and paid for a 2nd month (obligated) where I'm not going. You're also required to cancel your membership in person which is going to be difficult. I think the idea of The Joint is great but I also think the "drive thru" style isn't meant for when you have actual back problems or want more personalized care.

resp.text:
Hi Katelyn,

Thank you for sharing and please know we are very sorry that you weren't fully satisfied by your experience. The Joint Chiropractic is designed as a wellness clinic for patients with busy schedules who may just need routine adjustments.

Our Wellness Plan is designed for the best deal on routine maintenance, giving patients 4 adjustments a month for only $59. With this discount comes the commitment of at least 2 months, as providing relief usually requires regular visits.

We regret to hear your concerns and invite you to please reach out if you wish to discuss this further with our team. We are glad that you found the relief you seek- whether with us or a more traditional clinic. Thank you!

Best in Health,
The Joint Chiropractic

name: Sarah B
text: Today was my first visit to Dr. Le’s office. I have experienced many different chiropractic practices in different states. We just moved here and after a visit to Cornerstone Family Chiro in the area, I was seeking a different technique and a pay-by-the-visit. Cornerstone asks you to pay for the full treatment (mine was months and took all my insurance covered visits and more) and then refunds you whatever you may not use. I didn’t really prefer that. They were nice and had lots of social events but I wanted a more treatment focused  (not that they weren’t, this is just me), so I just googled and wasn’t very hopeful. Dr. Le’s came up and oh my goodness, I could not be happier!!! I want everyone to know! Dr. Le offers many different ways of treating the injury/misalignment (not just an adjustment) and all of it is to help you heal as soon and as quickly as possible. I will absolutely continue to go and am wanting my husband to go too! So thankful to have found a great chiro in the area!!! He was also happy to explain each technique and how it helped as well. Took the time and listened to all my issues and literally treated every single issue. This is not just chiropractic! He even sent me home with exercises to strengthen my back, etc. I can’t recommend him enough. And Amy, his assistant, was present at all times during my treatment and did a great job to help treat me as well! Looking forward to my next visits! I know I wrote a novel, but really, I am so glad to have found a thorough doctor in the area!

text: Dr. Lambert came HIGHLY recommended by about 10 people I've known, so I finally conquered my fears and made my first appointment. Dr. Lambert was really kind, and he listened to my issues attentively. I have several debilitating chronic illnesses that affect my musculoskeletal system, and he was SO thorough during the initial exam, going over every line of the questionnaire without making me feel like a science experiment. After the exam and x rays he talked to me about a treatment plan and he did my first adjustment, and I currently go about twice a week now and my only regret is that I did not go sooner! His office is cute and comfy and clean, and he is very prompt about returning phone calls personally, and he makes room for people who are in pain. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

being a Chiropractor myself, my body takes in a lot of stress as I am petite and the majority of my patients are wayyy bigger than me.
Got to see him this last month at a seminar again and asked him to please adjust me. After thorough analysis, he provided me with one of the most amazing adjustments I have received in YEARS!!! I have been sleeping like a bear, can take care of my patients without discomfort and feel Amazing!!!
Mind you, I am taking the time to write this review because I know Chiropractors all over the country. Have been getting chiropractic care for two decades, but these last two years have been suffering non stop and have seen countless of chiropractors and tried various techniques!
Take it form another Dr. you need to experience his care!

text: My 13-yr old daughter has had a swimming injury in her shoulder since last Oct (it's June) that we haven't been able to fix, despite seeing a surgeon and 2 months of PT plus 4 months of rest. She has really had great results in just 2 sessions at P3 and we are SUPER grateful!!! She's swimming with zero pain! Highly recommend!!

name: M Jones
text: Been struggling with a hamstring injury for almost a year. Went to multiple PTs, chiropractors and orthopedic doctors with no improvement. After the 1st visit with Dr. Olsen, I had immediate relief. The Active Release Technique works amazingly, and his other treatments and recommendations have me feeling better than I have in a long time. Looking forward to being injury free, and I believe Dr. Olsen is the only person in Huntsville that will get me there!

name: Kevin Meier
text: Drs. Olsen, Robinson, and staff will, simply put, fix you. Whatever you're pain, they have a plan. They're warm and welcoming personalities will first put you at ease. Then they're expertise in all things chiropractic, from soft tissue massage, light to moderate stretching, to spinal and neck adjustments, are all part of their holistic approach to your well being. They will gladly work with your regular doctor or specialist to provide the best care available. Whether it's neck pain, back pain, plantar fasciitis, or sports injury, they'll get you moving freely again.

name: Alura Young
text:
Dr. Robinson is absolutely FANTASTIC. He's the only reason why I tried the new place after he moved from Spincare. Unfortunately, I won't be returning here due to the way this company deals with their customers financially.
I saw Dr. Robinson back in October 2017 and again in November 2017. He's always great, he has great bedside manners, and he cracks me up.  Everything was awesome as usual. I paid my copay, was told I have a $0 balance, and was good to go both times. I never like to have balances, so I pay whatever I owe when I see a doctor.
Fast forward SEVEN MONTHS LATER, I get a BILL in the mail for unpaid fees that apparently only went towards my deductable and now I owe $88. I called last Monday and was told I'd have to call next Monday to speak to the billing person, so I waited 7 more days and called today. She went over the bill in detail, including how they even gave me some discount to adjust my bill as if they're doing me a favor.
I maintained my voice and words and told her I guess I have no choice but to pay this bill, even though you guys waited over a half year to bill me. I told her I was coincidentally planning on coming back to see Dr. Robinson again but now that I got this bill, I'll be going somewhere else. She told me "well I'm sorry you feel that way."
So, that's that. I'll miss Dr. Robinson because he's literally a miracle worker, but this billing and the way the company manages their patient's accounts is **extremely** unprofessional.  It does not take 7 months for people's health insurance to get back to you. This is 100% P3's fault due to negligence, laziness...maybe both.

What's funny is my husband got a free massage session from them in the mail the same week I got that bill...he hasn't seen Dr. Robinson in over a year.

name: Stephan Onisick
text:
Dr. Olsen gave me exact treatment that I wanted and needed. I came in looking for remedies to two conditions caused from working as programmer which entailed  too much time sitting with a screen and keyboard.

I had injured myself from improperly getting up and twisting as I came out of a swivel chair and also from straining to see the screen.

In short I had a muscular problem in my lower back and neck.  I expressed my feeling that I was not looking for long-term weekly visits; I just wanted to deal with the painful areas and move-on.

My philosophy seemed to jell with his.  He was friendly, professional and courteous.
I had four treatments in all. On my third visit, my neck pain was my predominant complaint.  He showed me some exercises and also used a laser treatment which really helped with the pain.

I would recommend him to anyone with back pain and I would have no hesitancy in using an MD in the mix as well.

Stephan Onisick

name: Grace Broc
text: Coming to Bayside Chiropractic is one of the highlights of my week. After being snapped, crackled, and popped, my whole body feel absolutely amazing! Dr. Leslie has been working constantly to improve my overall health and from some old injuries as well. I feel much better than I have in a long time. She has also given me such relief from migraines. I am so grateful to everyone at Bayside Chiropractic for the huge improvement in my quality of life. If you're on the fence, just do it! Their friendly professional staff there will make you feel right at home.

name: Jami Clark
text: Dr. Leslie and her entire staff are absolutely wonderful!  I had no real understanding of how much chiropractic care could help my whole body.  Give them a chance you will not be disappointed!

name: Madison Schneider
text: Dr. Leslie and her whole team are so welcoming and helpful!!! I have been going to get adjusted since 2009, and I am a firm believer of the chiropractor's healing effects. I love Bayside Chiropractic!!

text: Going to see Dr. Bobby is the best decision I’ve made in a long time. The entire staff is amazing and just sweet as can be. Danny explained my X-rays to me so thoroughly and in a way that even a child would understand. And Dr. Bobby made me feel so much better even after one adjustment. I can’t wait to see my results after he’s done. Also, they are VERY affordable! They work out a payment plan for you if you don’t have insurance or live paycheck to paycheck like we do. I am very pleased with the entire experience.

text: This is the facility where patients go for all labs and testing. Even if  you think you have an appointment, it doesn't stand. You put your name on a list when you get there. I had an appointment for a test, got down there from Florence, and they were closed! There was a severe weather warning for the county they're in, but I didn't know as I don't live in that county and didn't hear any warning. No phone call. No sign on the door. No answer to phone calls inside, no answering machine or service. They just stand you up.

text: Be prepared to wait over an hour or two past your appointment time to be seen by your provider.  The office is dirty.  Receptionist/office workers are not very friendly. The appointment times are overbooked.  Very disappointing.

name: Cathy Pham
text: This place is absolutely horrible. They always over book patients. The average wait time is 1.5-2 hours. It doesn’t matter if you get there late or early, you’ll always end up waiting for at least 1 hour. It’s ridiculous. Don’t brother with this place unless you want to spend most of your day napping in their waiting room.

name: Tracy Stubblefield
text: My dad saw dr ridgeway. Love him! Well worth the wait. What a gem.  He answered all of my dads and my questions with total patience. 🙏🏼

name: Ann Shortis
text:
Disorganized,fired too many experienced staff leaving mostly young inexperienced staff. Expect long waits from over booking patients.We waited almost 2 hours on more than one occasion due to staff inability to triage patients,forgetting to sign patients in on arrival,not allowing appropriate time for new patients to be seen.Just to name a few.
Also,for months we have heard "our fax machine is old and doesn't work right". I suspect the staff cannot trouble shoot or even work it if the "go" button doesn't work the first time..or it is an extremely old machine that needs replacing and no one wants to spend money on it..faxes have mysteriously gotten "lost" far too often  to be just an accident. We have to go in person and stand at the counter and complain to get anything for another Dr to see.
The technician/Drs who read the CT results are 100% unreliable. 2 ct's can read wildly different even within a couple of days of each other. The X-ray situation is soso.
Staff with minimal in house training take the various scan,ultrasounds etc  and readings..

Mainly,it's a crapshoot on care here.Which has gotten much worse since our Dr died in a 4by4 accident.
I say avoid if at all possible

name: TSR Consulting
text: I continue trying to call Dr. Liotta but no one answers the phone. Kinda hard to see my PRIMARY CARE PHYSICIAN when you dont answer the phone. Not happy about this.

text: Only giving one star because it’s required. I’ve been going here for years and this place has turned into a crackhouse... Going to this doctor  office (regardless of which doctor you see) is like going to a new restaurant on opening day, expect complete chaos and everything sucks!

text: This office is completely unorganized. They never return my calls and never provide critical information to their patients. I'm absolutely amazed that they manage to retain any patients at all.

text:
Staff doesn't LISTEN, they're RUDE, AND YOU WAIT FOR HOURS To see a Dr who barely listens to you for 5 min. I've called 3 times about a referral.
While I was waiting for my second appointment the front staff stopped doing ALL work to ARGUE with each other about why paperwork isn't done.
I've been to two appointments where both times Dr L has sent in a referral to me. I've been back to the Dr twice and the incompetent staff hasn't helped me. I'm in pain and the dr honestly doesn't know what this is. None of the medicine has helped.

UPDATE: This post is from 3 days ago. I called TWICE yesterday about the same referral. I was told I would get a call back, apparently my referral was transferred to a different Dr in their office. Still no call back; I called back again to get the voicemail.
ISO new primary care physician

text: Its sad when the people at the front desk are very rude and are too worried about partying after work. name: Christina Roberson
text: My mother goes to this practice and her Dr is awesome, but the office part is unorganized, rude, and plain unprofessional. It makes you wonder how in the world the people at the front desk even got their degree or if they are educated. It is a nightmare to try to get a refill on a medication. It's impossible. The only way to get them is when you actually see the doctor.. if you forget to get a refill when you see the doctor well your screwed until the next month basically. We live about a hour away from there so we can not just go by there everyday trying to get one refill. Today I called about a refill and have been trying to get this refill now for over a week and eventually instead of helping me they hung up on me. I just am beyond aggravated. My mom really likes her dr and his nurse is so sweet, but it's getting to the point that I'm seriously considering finding her another doctor bc of the fact everything about the front desk is just so unprofessional. When we gofor my mother's appt I'm going to complain about this and try to get a number that is a direct line to my mom's Dr or his nurse. I advise anyone who's thinking about coming to this practice to find another Dr office. It you are a new patient it's not worth the hassle

text: Your gonna spend at least 4 hours to see a doctor for 5 minutes  I quit going I got tired of going up there and they couldn't give me a answers for any problem I was having. All they care about is when you coming back to pay them some more money again at Shoals Primary Care

name: Janice Nix
text: They are professional, and have patience. They really work with you to get your health in order.

name: K
text: At 19 years old I became a patient of Brad Ginevan MD. After my current pediatrician, Dr. Rivas, advised it was time to transition to an adult provider. During the time he was my provider, Dr. Ginevan worked alongside my psychiatrist to continue maintenance of my ADHD and when necessary, he worked with specialists to manage my delicate GI condition. This included references to appropriate clinics and scheduling of applicable tests ie. Colonoscopy, EGD, etc. I truly trusted Dr. Ginevan and was incredibly grateful to have found such a wonderful physician. I never minded the fact that his office was always moving locations or that his appointments had become a nightmare to secure. I still referred only my closest of friends and family to see him. Always assuring them they'd be nothing less than satisfied with him as they're provider. Those were the old days... in 2013 I moved away to live on base with my then husband. I moved back in 2015 and returned to Dr. Ginevan. He and his staff had undergone a complete restructuring as they were now a part of the mega-merger trend and had merged with the tri-cities health giant Shoals Primary Care LLC. Due to the merger Dr. Ginevan no longer had any of my previous medical records from all of my time spent under his care which led to massive complications to my continuity of care. (I now understand the importance of my responsibility to secure medical history documentation and maintain my own current updated personal medical record.) Also, SADLY, due to the implementation of a governmental-esque standard of operating procedures, it is my opinion that Dr. Ginevan no longer maintained the level of patient care he had became known for. His office staff has always been grade-A; to be commended. If you are considering seeing Dr. Ginevan as your primary care provider this review is for you. In closing I want to say that this review in no way, intends to slander or cause malice. This review is my personal experiential reference/opinions of Dr. Ginevan meant solely for the purpose of socially informing fellow peers.

name: Diamond Love
text: Dr Karr is a wonderful doctor.  He really cares about his patients well being.

name: Em Means
text: I had planned to start seeing Dr. Martin as a new patient after my husband's first visit (where they had down on his chart that he was a 60 year old female with impacted bowls). I ignored that fact and still decided to give the doctor the benefit of the doubt because I could understand things sometimes happen. However, upon my scheduled visit as a first time patient it was for 7:30 am, and I arrived at 7:15 am for new patient paper work. I signed in and no one even showed up at the front desk until my appointment time, where I  then asked for my paper work and filled it out. About ten minutes after that, another woman called me by the wrong name and when I corrected her, I was made to feel as if I had done something wrong. Also, you can not hear when you are being called because the TV is loud, so people are talking over the TV, and I have two ear infections. After filling out my paper work, I was then called back to the window, where I was asked to write down my SSN, but I had already written it down twice on the form already. This told me they obviously were not paying attention to the information they were entering. After this, and already feeling on edge from just the front desk experience, I am called back by the doctor's nurse practitioner who tells me to step on the scale, and with a horrible tone says, "you're going to have to take some of that off." Meaning my purse. I ask where I should put it in case of a designated area, which seem to make her even more annoyed and she replies with, "I don't know." Very snappy. I am a new patient and felt like I was asking a very simple and non offensive question. We then walk to the exam room where she informs me that I would not be seeing the doctor and that he also would never been doing my exams or ever seeing me other than a quick peek in the room. Which, as someone looking for a long term doctor, it does not feel comfortable not even meeting my doctor on the first visit. When I tried to explain that I was uncomfortable with the fact she would only be relaying my issues to the doctor, and that I didn't feel comfortable having my health looked after in third person, and that I didnt understand why they wouldn't tell a new patient to begin with when making an appointment that he or she won't be seeing a doctor. She then got upset about it and told me I could reschedule or abort because she had been doing this for 40 years. Which is fine and I explained to her I was fine with her seeing me, but that I didn't feel comfortable having a doctor diagnose me without speaking with me and knowing me as a person. She gets more upset and I said I think it would be best just to cancel because at that point, being someone who has been diagnosed with a generalized anxiety disorder, I was overwhelmed and ready to go home. She proceeded to then say to me, "Fine then. Adios." I feel as if the entire situation was unprofessional on many different levels. I decided to keep searching for a new doctor. I would not advise this practice if you want to get to know your doctor for long term use, or have anxiety issues, seeing as how it is the only doctor's office I have ever been in where the lobby is loud and over packed.

text: Well where do I start.... First I guess I could start off with the fact the receptionist are very rude. Next I am being seen by Dr Aaron karr aka his assistant for a blood clot in my liver. So as I'm being processed for my visit the nurse asks me." Ma'am which side is your blood clot on".........eeerrrmmm. unless I have 2 livers it is on my right side. I over looked that. NEXT , I go in for my inr check and my levels are still below standard so he send me to Hellen Keller to do bloodwork and says he will call with the results. No call..... Instead I call up there later in the day and she says you need to come pick up you medicine. So I go get it they have switched my medicine with no telling me no nothing I am a breastfeeding mother. He switched me to a medicine that I cannot breastfeed on without any consultation. I had to Google the risks and side effects. Totally unprofessional and a headache. I went because i had major back pain. I was missing school because the pain was so bad and I came here a couple of times explaining my pain but he seemed to only know how to do one routine and he told my older brother and father that

I don’t understand how a doctor could say that when they barley checked me and my father believed him and even though I complained they thought I was “faking” I went about 2 months without treatment but I couldn’t stand it and went to a orthopedic all I did was explain the same way I did at A.L.A.M.O and he took a x-ray and said
“just what I guessed you have spinal juvenile arthritis” So I guess I wasn’t faking my pain but thanks for making my dad believe I was.

name: Bekah Schmidt
text:
Amanda is the best chiropractor in Huntsville! Amanda has cared for every member of my family, from my mom, husband, three year old son, and newborn. Amanda is great with kids and my son LOVES visiting "Dr. Amanda". He has no clue he is getting adjusted because he is having so much fun with her. When my husbands back locked up the week of Christmas, Amanda worked him in ASAP despite her holiday schedule. Because of his weekly adjustments, my husband is able to run again, which he hasn't been able to do in years because of his back pain. Amanda also cared for me throughout my pregnancy. I give her credit for my easy delivery! After my daughters birth, she adjusted my newborn and it helped with her colic. You could see the relief in her face after an adjustment.
Amanda's office staff is friendly and she and her staff are constantly going out of their way to provide excellent customer service. Whether it's scheduling an appointment, or needing to bring the kids with me, the staff is always helpful.
One thing that stands out about Amanda's chiropractic care which separates her from other chiropractors, is she is always going to seminars and learning the latest techniques. She is very passionate about what she does and wants to provide the best care possible. If you pick Health Source for your chiropractic care, you will not be disappointed!

name: James Stafford
text: August 2019, I stepped out of my truck bed and really hurt my back. I could not walk upright or even put on my own socks and shoes. I didn't realize age was catching up to me. I had been thinking about seeing a Chiropractor for a couple months prior but this pushed me. I called four different offices and Dr. Land's office was the first that could see me that day as a new patient. He did on-site X-ray, and back adjustment. Then he applied Tens muscle manipulation before showing me stretches I must start doing to free up the pain center. Lastly, his onsite support staff followed up with percussive massage. Over a year later, I'm still going to Dr. Land and his team for maintenance because this helps me maintain my activity levels. Yes, I get sore and have days that are better than others. But after a visit to their office, I am back to the mobility my body needs to do the jobs I want to do.

resp.text: Thank you. It is a pleasure to treat you ans your family.

name: Carla Davis
text: Dr. Land provides effective and therapeutic treatments in his practice. He provides excellent service to his patients. I’ve been a patient there for quite a while and I’m always feeling better once I leave out the building. Dr. Land keep doing what you’re doing! You are helping many people experience a better quality of life. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you for your families trust

name: Charli Martin
text: Staff is incredibly rude. Doc was nice at first then the last visit was like 10 min seeing him with a 40 min wait. Never again.

resp.text: Our records do not indicate anyone by this name at this facility.  As many reviews indicate, we are a five star establishment.  There is another chiropractic office with a similar name.  We strive for no waiting as a rule but because we accept walkins including new people sometimes there can be some wait but 40 minutes is a rare exception and i cannot recall any patient experiencing any abandonment.  We spoil our patients by acknowledging there time is important, actual time spent with the doctor can sometimes be longer or shorter based upon your progression, but each patient always has all answers and concerns addressed.  This review is of yours is not accurate of this office, and it is your first review given on Google.  Suspect.  If this is a legitimate review call our office and speak to me directly, (256) 430-1771.

name: Victor Pile
text: I really enjoyed my visit with Dr. Land!  I really just scheduled a visit because my wife did, but I not only discovered I really needed to go, but got answers to some issues I hadn’t connected and saw immediate results to his interventions! He is big on educating patients on their issues and treatments. There’s more I could say, but to wrap it up, but if you’re looking for a chiropractor in the Huntsville area, Dr. Land is a great guy to go to!

resp.text: It was a pleasure to meet you and your family and welcome them into ours

text: The best chiropractor in Huntsville hands down in my humble opinion. Although I’ve only been to about 4 chiropractors in town but I refuse to go anywhere else!! He is patient with you, he takes his time, he don’t ask for a dime besides your co-pay. I feel so at home in his office. His place is definitely a hidden secret. Dr Land kept me calm and adjusts me every visit while talking to me about my problems I dont even realize until the pain is gone that he just fixed me that fast. He goes in depth providing instructions on after care or in between appt care and advice on so much more. Dr Land is one of those Drs you will want to see for the rest of your life.

name: Jonathan Moore
text:
Left in a room for over an hour on multiple visits.  Sometimes going in i would get hooked up to a machine, get adjusted, then hooked up to the machine again.

The place is a total insurance scam.  He claims to be the only PT + Chiro in this area.  He had me doing exercises that made matters worse (MORE LATER).

For about 6 months I told Dr Land I had a problem spot between my shoulders.   His adjustments never changed. He simply told me it was fine.  My insurance lapped and while getting renewed I went elsewhere and paid out of pocket.  I told the Dr my problem spot and he worked the spot until it was adjusted.  He relieved a spot that caused years worth of pain in one 5 minute visit where as dr Land has said nothing is wrong after almost a year (just because he was incapable).  I NOW pay out of pocket for chiro once per week so I do not have to visit dr Land.  Turns out everything Dr Land has told me to do is incorrect from a PT perspective, it looks like I have 6 months of PT 3 times per week to REVERSE exercises Dr Land gave me

name: Katherine M ODell
text:
When I first went to Dr. Land about four years ago I was bent over with pain in my back from a fall off a ladder.  I had a chronic lower back pain that came and went for years, but this fall was the proverbial straw that broke the camel's back.
I went bent over with pain.  I left walking upright, with much less pain.
I saw a chart on Dr. Land's wall that showed the progression of treatment from intense pain to no pain and thought to myself, "OK, Doctor, that is your promise to me!"
My low back pain is gone.
All I need now is a tuneup once in a while.  I think it has been six months this time.  This time I went because I have been bending over a knitting project and I was hurting between my shoulder blades.  Pain gone after one treatment.
Thank you Dr. Land!

name: Naja Shabazz
text: Short wait times, thorough care, great treatment plan. Friendly staff, clean office.

resp.text: Thank you the pleasure to take care of your needs. It is truest appreciated

text: I enjoy every visit I have with Dr.Land. He has been there for me and some of my family as we all have had problems with our back. The friendly staff he has are great.  He is open even now (3-23-20). Thank you Dr.Land.

text: I've been using this chiropractor for 5 years! I can not say enough positive things! You need a chiropractor and Dr. Land is the best.

name: T M
text: Dr. Land is awesome. I came in barely able to walk or even sit at times without pain and after X-Rays revealed a minor slipped disc, Dr. Land was able to immediately narrow down the cause. I felt better even after the first visit. Dr. Land and his staff are extremely nice and kind and my experience has been nothing shy of excellent. He doesn't believe in just fixing you for the moment but he helps give you information and treatment that will benefit later in life when it counts most. Definitely recommend Huntsville Chiropractic Clinic and Dr. Land not only for the practice itself but for the genuine care they offer.

text: From your first visit you are treated like family by Dr. Land and his staff, in this quiet and relaxing office.  He spends as much time as possible with you, the patient/family, teaching and answering your questions about how your body works, what could have gone wrong currently, and then proceeds to treat you. I have been going to him for many years and I am very pleased with the results every time.  I highly recommend him to you and your family.

He is interested and concerned for my well being first and foremost and is not satisfied with "good enough", but consistently works with me to feel my very best.

resp.text: Thank you for that compliment, I have to admit that I am not satisfied until each patient has had their expectations exceeded.

I love the challenges of a patient that has fallen thru the cracks.  In so glad you are on the right path now.  Next step after rehabilitation will be long term sta bility

text: I highly recommend Dr. Land, especially during pregnancy. I was 27 weeks pregnant with a major reoccurring back injury that left me unable to stand or walk without assistance. I look forward to continuing care with Dr. Land for myself and my family.

text: When I met Dr Land, I was pregnant and miserable from an injury I had as a result of a car accident 5 years before. I couldn't turn my heads he came up to me at the business convention I was attending and told me he could help me. I told him I seriously doubted it. I had been to another chiropractor and physical therapy for several months. He talked me into giving him a chance. I'm so glad I did--I could turn my head again in two weeks. It felt miraculous!!! That was in 2009 and I've been seeing him since. It makes such a huge difference. I recommend him to anyone.

name: Reetta Destler
text: This business and its staff are listed in Yelp's Top Ten Chiropractors in Huntsville for a very good reason. I have had two visits now, with my spouse in residence, and have never met a more caring, compassionate and knowledgeable member of the medical community. We are eternally grateful for the care and compassion I have received so far as a patient of Dr. Land, and I would highly recommend him - and in fact, I have already! - to anyone who asks. He is gentle, compassionate, gets right to the root of the problem, and never ever tries to make me feel as though I don't know my own body and what it can or cannot do. I am highly impressed by his professional manner and endless willingness to help in any way he can. He is truly a Doctor with a capital D - he is in this business to make sure everyone he sees ends up feeling their absolute best, and will not rest until that is attained. He has gone a long way toward restoring my faith in doctors which, in Huntsville, has been sorely tested as of late. He is an incredible chiropractor, and will stop at nothing to see that you get to feeling the best you possibly can.

resp.text: Thank you, you are right.  I don't know how to stop until all of the pain goes away and the condition is stabilized.  That is what rehabilitation is supposed to be.

text: Dr. Land and his staff are wonderful!  Always very friendly!  Dr. Land is a very caring individual and always takes the time needed to make sure you understand what he is doing.  I was told by 2 different Neuro-Surgeons that I needed surgery to replace all of the discs in my cervical spine and I talked to Dr. Land and he checked everything out and informed me that he was pretty sure that he could fix my neck without surgery, and that was over a year ago and I have been pain free and no further neck problems since I have been going to Dr. Land's office!!  Thanks Dr. Land for all you have done for me!!!  I most highly recommend Dr. Land and his staff!!!

resp.text: Many times surgery can be either avoided or prevented.  As in your case your main problem was the continued spinal instability, and once it was corrected your condition was stabilized and symptom free.

text: I had my first experience with the office when I found myself in need of a chiropractor immediately. I called the office and told them about my pain level and what happened. Also the chiropractor explains everything before hand until you understand, so there are no misunderstandings. All of the people are nice kind and considerate of your schedule. text: The downtown facility is a great and pleasant atmosphere, my experience over the last few months have been great. I would highly recommend them the doctor even sat at his desk and explained my injury and gave a step by step process of the treatment plan. 👍🏽🙏🏾

name: Sandy Peters
text: After being treated for a pinched nerve by another doctor for nearly a year, I went to Dr. Johnson.  He diagnosed the problem as my hip.  It was bone on bone and needed a replacement.  He recommended a surgeon, and less than a month later my hip has been replaced and my pain is leaving.  I'm so grateful for his diagnosis.

name: Charity Jackson
text: Dr. Johnson is amazing! I have been coming here for the past few years. They are professional, quick and provide full care. I received suggestions for mattresses, pillows, office supplies to support a healthier back and neck. I would suggest anyone to visit their office downtown!

text: Staff is amazing. Very helpful.. The space is relaxing and Dr. Johnson does an awesome job making you feel comfortable.

name: Telayo Standfield
text:
For a week my co-workers kept saying Telayo you don’t look like you feel well and my response was I don’t ... then one of my co-workers called me to their off and said I have friends who say when they went to Back on Track Chiropractic that it helped. I got an appointment and felt some immediately relief of the discomfort on the first visit ... after a few visit the tension we sometimes describe as a crick in my neck was gone. Dr Kris explained the discomfort was coming from my C5 area being out of alignment and after a few adjustments I could tell a real difference. Honestly the first visit and hearing my neck crack was a little scary sounding but it didn’t hurt... thanks for helping me to feel better! If I hadn’t had the experience I am not sure I would have believed it helped but now I am a witness it does! Telayo Standfield
Fultondale, Al

I WALKED IN WITH MY GOOFY PERSONALITY AND THERE STAFF REALIZED THAT I WAS A FUNNY GUY BUT WITH A LOT OF PAIN. EVERY STAFF MEMBER IS SO FRIENDLY. THEY LISTEN, IT IS ALL ABOUT YOU AND YOUR TIME NOT THEIR TIME. I AM NOT ALL WELL BUT I AM A LOT BETTER AFTER MY THIRD VISIT AND I KNOW THAT THIS  DOCTOR AND HIS STAFF WILL GIVE ME THE TIME I NEED BECAUSE THIS TIME SOMEONE HAS GOT MY BACK.
