name: K H
text: Best in the business! Wouldn’t trust my family to anyone else. Truly cares about the patient 10000% of the time. Would highly recommend to anyone and everyone. Thanks Kris!!!

name: Kristen Talbot
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff! I highly recommend! I have seen Kris Johnson for several neck and back issues over the years and I have been very happy with the results. He even helped me make it through the back pains and discomforts of two pregnancies.

name: Louise Leatherwood
text: AMAZING Chiropractor!!!!!!!!!  I highly recommend Dr. Kristoffer Johnson. I was having some back problems,  just thought I was getting older. I didn't know how much damage had been done to my back over time. But I know now, and I am getting Back on Track. Even if you are young you need, in my opinion, to know how your body is! I wished someone had told me what my back looked like. This damage was done 20 yrs or so ago. I have been to another Chiropractor and they didn't tell me. Also, He has also helped my son, daughter in-law, grandson, and even my 6 month old granddaughter. The staff is very friendly, flexible with scheduling, helpful. My daughter in law contacted the office for me, for my first appointment, and they responsed promptly. I am so Glad Laura suggested him to me. 😀

name: David Welch
text: With much delight and confidence I can share my continual health progression under the care of Back on Track Chiropractic Downtown.  The last time I can remember going to a chiropractor was in 2004 and I honestly never had a bad experience, however, I also never had an experience that  benefited me enough to continue the care.  I became skeptical of chiropractors, skeptical of orthopedic practices, and skeptical of the health industry in some respects.  After unsuccessfully managing my pain due to a shoulder injury, arthritis, and degenerative issues, which all became more acute within the last 15 months, I decided to seek out an alternative to surgery and medications.  Chiropractic care resurfaced as a suggestion to me by a co-worker and I begin to search the local area for a destination to try to combat my persistent and nagging pain and discomfort.   I chose to meet Dr. Kristoffer Johnson based on the hundreds of successful reviews, his experience, and the overwhelming positive welcoming by team members, Bethany and Amy.    They are truly a team that works in unison.  They are truly invested into their patients health improvements and well-being.  They are truly honest, caring people that serve and make a difference in many, many lives.   Another MOST wonderful experience with Back on Track is that a planned number or subscription of visits was not prescribed to me like so many outlets build their potential success around.  "Let's get you better."   I can tell you Dr. Johnson, Bethany, and Amy, more than once, have iterated this as their focus and I am truly blessed and thankful to report that my health has improved.   The combination of therapy services and adjustments is not only beneficial to my physical well-being, it is mentally enabling as well!   On top of that,  I enjoy reading the blog posts on the website and educating myself with what Dr. Johnson's shares through his many years of experience.   After the first week of therapy and adjustments the agony of my discomfort started to go in a different direction.  Halleluiah!   Several weeks of consistent therapy and adjustments is proving to be the best thing I could have invested in for my overall health.   I am confident and positive that I am now "Back on Track!"   Thank you Dr. Johnson, Bethany, and Amy!!   I am very much encouraged and looking forward to continuing this health building relationship!  Many Blessings!

name: Patti Hurst
text: Back on Track Chiropractic is a fabulous place! I had neck and shoulder pain for a few months, but had ignored it hoping the pain was temporary. I work with a long term patient of theirs who has raved about Dr. Johnson for years. I decided to give them a call and see if they could help me as well. Four weeks later, I am feeling so much better! They get you in quick, the process is efficient and the staff makes you feel like you have known them for years! Best decision for me and I highly recommend Back on Track Downtown!

name: Mela Figueroa
text: Dr. Kris is awesome he is so informative and has helped me a lot. Let me not forget Amy, she has been so sweet and helpful since the first day. Ohhh And I love the new location and its spaciousness makes the experience  more pleasant.

text: Love this place outstanding service.

name: 205Party Rentals
text: Dr. Kris is awesome.  He has been a blessing to our family. Thank you!!!!!

name: Cynthia Smith
text:
I'd first start by saying that I'm so glad I decided to give them a try.  The location is perfect and within minutes from my job.  I contacted them via email and got a response and appointment very promptly.  When I arrived for my first visit, I was in so much pain and couldn't turn my head to the left side. The staff (Amy and Beth) always greets you with a smile, warm conversations and pleasantries making you feel super special... they are absolutely outstanding professionals.. Also the atmosphere is pleasant, friendly and welcoming...almost heavenly.  Dr. Kris Johnson is an awesome guy!! The fact that you're not waiting around all day to be seen..  He takes time to explains your conditions/situations/issues and recommends a plan of action as to how he will work to get you some relief and feeling better.  See, I took a nasty fall down my basement stairs that resulted in several vertebrae out of alignment. By my third visit, the pain was down 2 scales (from 10 to 8) and now, after my 8th visit, I'm down to 5 more scales with some occasionally shoulder pain but no more numbness in arm or tingling in left hand.  I'm able to turn my head all the way to the left side with no pain and move my neck up and down freely. On top that, I'm  not having to pop pain pills...icing the area once or twice a day does the trick. I didn't intend to write such long review but I am reminded that the Word of God tells us to give honor where honor is due.  I 100% believe Dr. Johnson and his staff really deserve such worthy praises and recognition for what they're doing not only in my life but others everyday.  My prayer is that God continues to bless and prosper them and this wonderful Chiropractic office for many, many years to come.

Thank you,

Cindi Smith

name: Barb Latham
text: Thankful for the staff and Doctor! Kindness and mercy go a long way in this world today. Will be a regular patient.

text: best chiropractor in bham area, highly recommend

name: Precious Precious
text: WOW, what a great experience!  I'm a 30-year old, active female that had never experienced back pain! I had been experiencing a sudden onset of sharp pain in my lower back that became debilitating (a few hours after moving my Christmas tree, or so I thought). I'm a RN, so i knew to do the basics of applying ice/heat, resting, numbing creams, OTC pain meds, massage, etc. Although these methods provided some relief, it was temporarily. I was regaining some mobility, but nowhere near my baseline! I was having pain upon bending, walking, lying on my stomach and back, and even sitting. My coworker recommended that I come to Dr.Johnson at Back on Track. I decided to give it a try because my methods were not working. What a great decision! The customer service i received  was EXCELLENT and the atmosphere in the office was very inviting and calming!  I received my services with little to no wait time, which is very rare for visiting a doctor's office. The ENTIRE staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and encouraging! I received a tour of the facility and how each product/machine worked, education on what to expect, what to do to assist with my treatment upon leaving, and most importantly a remarkable service. I literally went from requiring assistance because of extreme pain and discomfort when sitting up to sitting up without assistance, IN MINUTES!!! Although I do have to return to the office for continued therapy, I immediately felt the benefits of my visit. I'm so thankful I decided to come to this office. Dr. Johnson and his staff literally got me "Back on Track!"

name: Thad Abrams
text:
The best Chiropractor in town.  Been going for nearly 20 years.  I had severe pain all over my back from a car accident.  I learned that my hips were knocked out of alignment and my spine had followed.  I tried other chiropractors before, they were just okay.
During my first visit, my hips were X rayed and adjusted.  I stood up and felt taller.  Went home and measured my height and I was an inch taller.  I continued therapy, the lump in my left side of my lumbar decreased.  The pains in my thoracic and cervical spine began to minimize greatly.
Today, I only require maintenance adjustments- come when needed.

After a very thorough and educational initial examination, I was given flexible options for treatment plans that were designed for my specific needs. I've had significant pain relief and mobility improvement since my very first adjustment. Dr. Chris was very gentle and reassuring with my initial fears of being adjusted and I now trust him completely.
The clinic staff are amazing! Very efficient and so friendly. They always accommodate my scheduling needs and make me feel like family. Family Tree is the BEST!

name: Robert Legg
text: At Family Tree chiropractic I've always felt that I was important, like a family member. They have a very professional attitude about everything that they do. Chris has changed my opinion about chiropractors from thinking that they were frauds, to looking forward to my next appointment. His approach is the most honest and logical medicine that I've experienced, even though I used to work in the medical field.

I could get down (couldn't do that before) but had difficulty getting upright.  This in the first two visits.  I'm now a believer.  Thank you for all you are doing....that I can LIVE again.

name: Jessica Rew
text:
I’ll preface this by saying: I don’t leave many Google reviews, so the fact that I’m here leaving a review for these amazing people should speak volumes.
Now...
What you would see when you open my medicine cabinet; among the cold meds for the winter seasons you’d see bottle upon bottle of Excedrin & Tension headache pills. You would probably also see a potential problem.
What I see; pills that I haven’t had to take for 1 FULL month. Today (10/25/2019) marks 1 month without migraines, headaches or head pain of any kind. Which is HUGE!

I suffered for years from migraines and severe headaches. It got bad; like 4-5 per week bad for at least 8 months - and I haven’t had to take any since my FIRST Chiropractic Adjustment with Chris at Family Tree Chiropractic! [And don’t get me started on how great my back and neck feel!]
Chris; me and you are officially BFF’s. You may not realize it yet... But you’re like one of my favorite people right now. Thanks for being amazing! Looking forward to all my future appointments.

name: Bray Austin
text: I have to say this is one of the most comprehensive, thorough and compassionate chiropractic practice I have ever been treated by.  They take the time to get to know your symptoms and thoroughly evaluate a treatment plan. A+++ 5 STARS. I would highly recommend.

name: Mallory Burrow
text: Family Tree Chiropractic has been life changing for me and my family. Their overall wellness approach and their compassion for making the whole family be at their best makes them unique and unlike any other chiropractic practice in Baldwin County. So thankful for them!!

name: CINDY STONE RN LMT
text: Wonderful to have such caring folks in our little town.I feel very comfortable referring clients to Family Tree Chiropractics because I have experienced first hand the professional and skillful care that they offer.I hope they continue to be a part of our community.

name: Perri Farlow
text: Our baby began showing scary signs that something wasn't right at about 3 weeks old. His head and upper body were craned backwards all the time. He was nearly impossible to hold or cuddle. By week 4, even more stiff and rigid, he began to show signs that he was in pain and quit using his right arm and hand. He began having what we were perceiving to be seizures any time he was put on his back. We couldn't change his diaper without these seizure-like episodes. He would cry out in pain every time we picked him up. We took him to the pediatrician who made referrals for us to see Early Intervention and an orthopaedic specialist. Weeks went by as we waited patiently on our appointments. In the meantime, our son was getting worse and worse. Each day brought on more pain and he spent all of his waking hours crying. I didn't have time to wait anymore and it was at that point that I began looking for alternate routes. Enter, Family Tree Chiropractic! They were able to fit us in the very day I called (I literally hung up the phone and sobbed tears of joy). During the visit, we placed our stiff, crying, painful, rigid baby who was having his seizure episodes right there, on the table and Dr. Chris began patiently working. He was so gentle that my husband and I weren't even sure anything had happened! That evening however, our son's arm and hand "woke up" as we noticed he was spastically moving it by himself for the first time in weeks. The next day the range of motion in his neck was drastically, and I mean DRASTICALLY different. After his second visit, the seizure episodes almost vanished completely and he no longer seemed to be in pain! Fast forward to 15 weeks old, he is growing healthy and has been reaching milestones - something we don't think could have happened with his immobility, rigidity, and pain level. We do not have the words for what Dr. Chris has done for our baby and our family. For those on the fence about infant chiropractic care, I can say that our sweet baby would not be where he is today without it. One million thank you's to Dr. Chris and Family Tree Chiropractic!!

name: Nathan Wienhoff
text: I am extremely pleased with the care/treatment that I've received from Dr. Jessica Koelker-Davis at Millar Chiropractic in Jones Valley.  She is very thorough and she listens to what is hurting you, then she comes up with a treatment plan to address your pain.  Being a fibromyalgia patient, I am extremely sensitive to even the lightest of touches on my tender points during a flare up.  Dr. Koelker-Davis is always very gentle with me and takes extra precaution not to press too hard on my tender points when she is adjusting me.  She does not use harsh adjustment procedures on me either but rather uses a tool to do gentle adjustments.  If you're a Fibromyalgia patient with back pain or any other type of chronic pain for that matter, I cant highly recommend her enough! I'm FINALLY getting some relief from my pain!

name: Meribeth Lapidus
text: I am very disappointed in Dr. Jessica Koelker-Davis' decision to allow individuals to decide whether or not to wear a mask during a pandemic. I cannot fathom how a supposed health-care professional would do such a thing. I wonder if someone walked in without shoes or a shirt. Would she be willing to treat that individual? The building that houses her practice is TINY, and there is little to no room for social distancing. Just when I thought I'd found a keeper, she has disappointed. She is putting her employees and patients at risk. 👎

resp.text:
We strive to give the best care possible for our patients at all times. In this situation, our staff was made aware that this individual was uncomfortable with the mask policy put into place within our clinic. Our therapy technician walked to the back of our office to go put her mask on to help make this patient more comfortable. While our technician was in the back, the individual demanded we cancel her appointment, and elected to leave our clinic.

While it was in place, our staff at Cove Chiropractic abided by the statewide mask mandate and wore a mask at all times within the building. When the mandate was lifted by Governor Ivey, we believed to help our community move forward we would allow our patients and staff to have the freedom of choice in wearing their mask or not.

Signs have been posted on the front door of the clinic as well as throughout our clinic alerting incoming patients of our optional face covering policy.

As vaccines are becoming more widespread and available, we hope to see smiling faces once again. We also hope to aid in the transition back to normal life once again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We are so thankful chiropractic care has helped you get back to living your best life.

name: Nick Black
text:
I've been doing the decompression protocol for a herniated disc that I've had going in 12 years.  I did not know this is what I had until I came here.

As smart as doctors are, no one ever did an x-ray of my lower back, much less any other part of my back.

I went to a sports medicine doctor who diagnosed me with a grade 1 tear on my hamstring.  So I did physical therapy for that and took strong anti-inflammatories.

I then went again and a orthopedic doctor got annoyed with me when trying to describe the nerve pain I was having in my left leg.  He was less than kind and referred me to a neurologist.

This fellow was nice and recommended an MRI of my left knee thinking I had a tear in it.

The MRI 4,000 dollars later revealed a knee with little more than a bit of arthritis 'normal for my age'.

So with no further instructions for recovery, I sought the help of Dr. Jess.

She immediately did an x-ray which revealed the issues with my spine.  Of course without an MRI, no one can say with 100% certainty I have a herniated disc, but it is with 90% accuracy or so they can say it.

We had my uncle in law confirm as much who is a neuro and back surgeon.  Now he didn't think a chiropractor was the answer, but doctors and chiropractors have a predictable relationship...

I've done almost all 25 of my sessions now.  When I first went in, I was getting to the point where it was painful to even exist.  I did not want to live some days with the pain I was having.

I am not healed by any means but I feel SO, SO much better.

I am working out my upper body now and pursuing things I thought I wouldn't be able to do again.  I am smart enough to know surgeries are over diagnosed.  Our medical world is riddled with doctors who want to perform surgeries.  People are having to get artificial hips and knees replaced within their life times now.  This is because they are having it done too young.

I cannot say a chiropractor is the answer for you.  I can say that at least I want to live now.  I am not in unbearable pain.  I can function.

Maybe I will have to get surgery at some point.  I don't know.  The fact of the matter is that right now I don't have to.  My insurance sucks.  I could afford this.  I cannot afford surgery.

Make your own decision, but hopefully this helps someone.

As for the staff and the place of business, it is wonderful.  I love the people and the space.  Dr. Jess is so positive along with Victoria.  Their spirits will lift you up.  They aren't annoying though.  It doesn't seem artificial.

If you read this far, I'm sorry for making this so long.  Twelve years is a long time. Too long.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the testimonial  Nick. We are so grateful that we have been able to help you!

Things my chiropractic adjustment taught me this morning:
1) The things we get used to carrying around can affect us more than we know. There’s a lot to be said for walking tall.
2) Sometimes you have to go through a little pain to fix the bigger problem.
3) Communication is key. No one can fix something they don’t know about, & one “you’re not gonna like me for a few minutes” makes a big difference.
4) Don’t fight the thing that’s trying to make you better. It hurts more in the process & sets you back.
5) A little noise is nothing to fear.

Going to the Chiropractor can be a little nerve racking with all of the cracking, but Dr. Jess does a great job to assess what your body actually needs. She will make sure the adjustments are done in the best way possible with very minimal pain, if any at all. Then makes the process an enjoyable one to receive the improvements that you need/want. If you have any questions, Dr. Jess will do an amazing job to explain what issues she sees and how she plans on fixing them in a way for you to understand. I’ve truly noticed a difference in pain I have had in my back and neck, and Dr. Jess and her team are to thank for that. Pro tips: Make sure you get massages from April! text:
I have been a patient of Chiropractic Care for over 12 years.  I am a firm believer that spinal care is key to a healthier and more productive life.  That being said, it is sometimes difficult to find the right provider who is truly interested in you as a patient and your overall wellness.  I have experienced some of the best and worst in the field.  Cove Chiropractic is hands down one of the BEST.

Dr. Davis is honestly one of the best in the field.  She has an ability to become immediately in tune with what you as a patient needs and only recommends what she, in her experience, would best help you as a patient and not what is best for her bottom line.  She believes that every patient is an extension of her family and who she is and she surrounds herself with a staff that follows that same philosophy.

In short, if you are experiencing back pain, headaches, nerve pain, stomach issues, sinus issues or general fatigue; this is the place for you especially if this is your first experience with Chiropractic Care.

text: For the first time in my life I am medication/prescription free and have been able to correct many bodily and mental issues through the gentle chiropractic and ERT care received here with Dr. Z and his staff. this office has helped alleviate and correct issues from decades ago in just a few months without drugs. The office does come off at first as chaotic, a little unorganized, and rushed HOWEVER I recommend this place to everyone despite that because it is the only time I have seen and felt relief in my body and mind. I've seen multiple doctors, been on every medication under the sun, and even had surgeries, none of which ever actually corrected my underlying issues and at most only suppressed the pain temporarily.

name: Johanna Lodder
text:
I was in a car accident, ended up with neck fusion herniated disc, lots of pain.  Considering I never used a primary care doctor before this because I didn't need one, went to gynecologist yearly, that was it. Suddenly it was lots of doctors tests etc.  Spent the last two years with orthopedic, chiropractors, muscular therapists but still in pain, still not able to sleep well.   Pain changes you....but I wasn't going to give up yet. My primary care Dr. recommended Lions Mane and Dr Z. Ordered the supplement on Amazon started taking it, it really helped with brain fog from concussion. So I headed off to Dr Z, not expecting too much, I was already seeing a chropracter.  Wow, what a difference, decompression has reduced the nagging pain, the first morning after, I woke up because I was rested!  Hadn't done that since...before accident.  I get up now in the morning and can feel my feet, and walk normally, not like I have flippers.  I had ligaments and muscles whining and complaining, because now my hips were staying where they should and everything had to stretch.  But I did my stretches and my ankles and left leg aren't hurting like they did.
I am actually thinking about exercising again,  this experience has made me hopefull again.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and I am so happy that you are doing so much better!

name: Jasmine Mathis
text: It's easy to integrate a holistic view of heath here. The environment here feels like you are amongst friends, not a sterile impersonal place to churn through "patients".  Doc Z and staff are genuine and show they care in every way!

name: Donielle McLendon
text:
I injured myself almost 4 years ago. My left foot and sciatic nerve have caused me to be in almost constant pain since. Before the injury, I ran about 30-45 miles per week, but I have not been able to workout with any regularity since, and it was depressing. I have seen 2 orthopedic surgeons, another chiropractor, a podiatrist, an acupuncturist (a different practice), and massage therapists with little relief. It’s not that they were bad, but they weren’t looking in the right place. He really listened to me and I appreciate that.
Dr. Zlotea has been treating me for the past few weeks for a herniated disc and other issues. He recommended using decompression therapy and it has worked wonders! I don’t think I would have been able to workout again if not for him. I’m only 32 and finally don’t feel like I’m 102. I am able to start light exercise again as of today and I couldn’t be happier! My foot doesn’t hurt at all anymore! I feel like I’m getting my life back.

name: Kendall Jackson
text:
As some of you may remember, in November 2011 I was involved in a vehicular hit and run on Ross Clark Circle, in which I was a pedestrian. To give you an idea of the impact, it fragmented my tibia and fibula in half (lower leg bones). I incurred a lot of bodily damage. At one point I could barely walk due to the various pains due to misalignment. The photo attached shows how much of my skin was removed by the ground, although and I was wearing a pea coat at the time of the incident. To keep things short, I'm less afraid of vehicles passing me on my morning runs than I am to try a new chiropractor. I love the down-to-Earth atmosphere at his office. I strongly recommend you at least give it a few visits to see if his structure is right for you. It only took me ONCE.

Thank you Dr. Z

Kendall Jackson

name: Charlie Crowe
text: I was a little disappointed with my visit. Before I had done the in take paper work as a new patient we were talking about  12 visit plan. I didn’t feel that I was heard. There seemed to be an agenda other than my condition. I will say that they had me in and out fast.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. Your input is appreciated.
Your perspective on the first visit is different than most of our patients but significant. The intake paperwork asks the patient to list all their symptoms and quantify their health complaints and instructs the patients to quantify their level of improvement over the next 12 treatments.... That is correct. The reason the paperwork addresses a treatment plan is so patients are aware from the beginning that holistic treatment is not a one treatment panacea, it's not a pill and it's not magic. It is a healing process and the specifics are handled individually with each patient.
A 20 minutes face to face with a physician is unheard of these days and if you feel that was a short visit so be it. In a 20-minute visit we addressed the entire human frame above and beyond the chief complaint plus acupuncture and tongue analysis. The process didn't stop when you left the office but it continued as the tongue analysis was performed by OUM physicians in California and THERE WERE THREE EMAIL CONVERSATIONS REGARDING THE SPECIFICS. That was a step I take out of true concern for the health and well-being of my patients but it's cases like these that make excellent physicians become callus.
Best of luck on your journey and next time find something to praise about the next person that gives a damn about your health and well-being

text: I had back surgery in 1994.  I suffered with constant back pain only to be offered very strong pain medications by my surgeon.  I began seeing Dr. Kaul about 16 years ago.  I get instant relief from pain without any prescriptions and I can always get an appointment quickly. I now have less pain and less frequent onsets of pain without addictive pain medication.

name: kat
text:
They have the best prices and must effective treatment available. Dr. Kaul and his staff were very friendly and helpful. I woke up with crippling neck pain---literally---my mom had to come to my house and help me out of bed, that's how great my neck pain was,  I was completely helpless in trying to use my neck muscles to lift my head up from my pillow!

Instead of going to an urgent care facility like how I initially planned, my mom suggested going to a chiropractor because she had similar issues in her hip and she told me how a chiropractor adjusted her joints back into place and she was able to walk out of the office after that as if the pain never existed. She recommended Mobile Chiropractic and I decided to give it a shot. Dr. Kaul worked his magic with his hands on my neck and did something funny to it and cracked my neck back into place and I almost immediately felt a hundred times better!  If you have any type of musculoskeletal pains, I highly recommend you go to Mobile Chiropractic. I, without a doubt, am sure they can help you!

name: dave brownlow
text:
Great front office staff and everyone is very helpful and nice.
Dr. Kaul is very thorough and great with patients!

name: Trenton Emrick
text: Very friendly place, they took care of me and my fiancé after a accident. We was treated like a priority and I felt like they truly genuine care. I highly recommend this place for anyone.

name: Chase Hilscher
text: Everytime I go here they treat me like a neighbor. Very friendly staff . Dr.Kaul makes sure to take care of you to the best to his knowledge . I'd recommend if you are having any type of back or neck problems to give him a visit.

name: Maggie Mitchell
text: I injured the posterior tibial tendon in my foot over 2 years ago. After many visits to podiatrist and ortho doctors, I ended up here on my own suggestion. My tendon had healed but the inflammation was so severe I couldnt even shop with my daughter the weekend before I started coming. After 4 underwater ultrasound therapy session and adjustments my ankle is back to my normal size and pain free for the first time in 2 years and no medicines involved !!! All the staff (including the therapist and Dr. Kaul) is super friendly and makes you feel like family. Had no idea I would feel so great so quickly !! Will definitely be back whenever I get any aches/pains !!

name: alexya harrison
text: Great Staff and Dr.Kaul is awesome .. I will tell anybody to come here for chiropractor service .

name: NoMercenary
text:
In short summary, these are great people, made me feel comfortable, and i would recommend to others. The staff always had a smile on their faces, and treated me like family. The doctors I dealt with were very friendly, open to any questions/concerns. Awesome experience, everytime.

Longer version, but adds great insight..
I dislocated my knee years ago, and needed help FAST. I was without insurance but they said they could still help. They gave me a discounted rate, and began trying to treat me.
In short, i torn a ligament, and had to have surgery, so the doctor sent me to a colleague.
Flash forward years later, and i'm having harsh pains in my lower back, from my work field. I return to this clinic, because of previous great services. My original doc wasn't working anymore, so i was taken in by Dr Kaul himself.
This continued for weeks, him helping keep my pain at a good, manageable level. I started to go less and less, as the pain started to simply vanish...Till...
I got into a car wreck. My neck started to feel awful sore 2 days later, and i got worried.
I then began looking for an accident lawyer, and through high google reviews, went to Moore's law-firm. I spoke with them, and was asked if i was being treated for the pain. I told them not yet, but i used to go to a local chiropractor, and was gonna go back very, very soon.
I was asked where i went, and when told, the lawyer started laughing, the doctor, and the lawyer have been college for the longest time, and the lawyer sends hundreds of cases to Dr Kaul....Huh, small world..
My lawyer knows my doctor..
So to shorten this some, i was treated by Dr Kaul over a couple months, and even looked forward to it; talking to the staff, even becoming friends. The fact i felt so much better after leaving left a great association with the habit of going a couple times a week.
After treatment, my papers were directly presented to Mr Moore, and he helped me with my case in a very straight forward manner.
So between these two professionals, and their staffs, i felt very taken care of, and confident that i was more than a $ symbol with legs.
A++

name: Stephanie Vaughn
text: Dr. Douglas Kaul, his associates and the staff of the Mobile Chiropractic Associates are the best!  In just 2 weeks of treatment, I am moving more freely; sleeping soundly and feeling great!  Unfortunately, my back problem began to surface after a minor exercise routine, 2 years ago.  My husband suggested I find a chiropractor to see if that type of treatment would be helpful.  After checking reviews, calling several chiropractic offices and listening for a voice with a caring, understanding attitude, along with their ability to answer my questions, I found Mobile Chiropractic Associates.  Tonya, medical secretary/receptionist, took time to speak with me and answer my questions in a kind, courteous and unhurried manner.  I have received great care!  Dr. Douglas Kaul is very knowledgeable, is down to earth and doesn't pull punches. He shows and explains all he finds on the x-rays, which he takes himself.  He makes you feel comfortable; listens to your concerns regarding your treatment options and plan, answering any questions you may have.  Diane, his nurse, is very nice and engages you; always finding something to say to make you smile. As evidenced by the x-rays, my neck and lower back were slightly out of line and in that very first visit, I had an adjustment.  I didn't know what to expect during the process and Dr. Kaul explained everything and was gentle.  That day was the best I had ever felt in a long time and I am feeling even better, today! Dr. Kaul, his associates and staff have great compassion for every person who comes for help.   After your first visit, you will realize the care you receive is focused on getting you up and moving again, as pain free as possible.  Before you decide to give up; suffer through the pain; limit your activities and just take pain pills, epidurals or opt for surgery, find a well-qualified, caring, chiropractic physician.  I would like to suggest one such physician to you: Dr. Douglas Kaul at Mobile Chiropractic Associates.

name: Kris Lowery

She always tries to work me in any time I call. Don’t know what I’ll do if he ever decides to retire. I can’t say enough great things about both of them.

name: 205_Brodie _
text: Great place awesome service  very clean

text: Been going to him for years. Would highly recommended him, he has helped me after an ankle and knee injury. Friendly staff and good service.

name: Jeffery Hudson
text: I called ahead and set up an appointment and came in on my scheduled day and did a bit of computer stuff and went on my way to get seen. My chiro came in and examined me and asked me some questions and had me do some twist and turns and gave me their diagnosis, which was confirmed by x-ray! They were knowledgeable about what I was going through and setup treatment. I received relief almost instantly! I would highly recommend this place if you're in pain.

name: Ms. B
text:
Initially, my physician recommended me to a Physical Therapy establishment in Montgomery, AL for a knee injury that was sustained due to an accident.

After 5 weeks of PT at the initial establishment that was referred by my Dr., I had no change in my knee injury.

I was still in constant pain when walking, climbing stairs, prolonged standing, etc.

I thought that my mobility could not be fixed.

When I followed up with my Dr., I explained to him that I was still in pain and my mobility had not improved at all after my first round of PT with the initial establishment that was recommended.

I explained to him that I would like another round of PT but this time with Hart and Spine. My physician stated, “You’re unlikely to respond to PT a second time since it didn’t work for you the first time. “ I stated to him, “I’d still like to have one more round of PT with Hart and Spine.”

After one week and two sessions of PT with Tyson at Hart and Spine, my knee feels amazing. I can walk up stairs pain free, I can stand for long periods of time like I did before my injury. I can exercise and jog a little too. Also, I’ve seen all of the Chiropractors at Hart and Spine for my back and neck and they are all great at what they do as well. Drs. Hart, McMillian and Weber are the best in my opinion. Also, they learn your name during the first visit. Dale is an awesome tech and makes you feel right at home. The ladies and gentlemen at the front desk are ALWAYS nice and professional as well. Overall this establishment is a great place if you are in need of good Chiropractic and PT care.

name: LaDonna Patton
text: Professional, knowledgeable staff. Quick appointment scheduling. Available appointments later on some days. On-time appointments. Use of modern technology for checking in. Providers who LISTEN to help get the relief you need. What else do you need? Both my husband & I use this practice. Highly recommend.

resp.text: So sweet LaDonna :) Thank you!

text: This practice is very professional and provides impeccable care. Dr. McMillan was very thorough and I regret not going to get checked out sooner.

They listen to your concerns, walk you through the process, and put your fears at ease. If you are in the market for a great group of providers, this is the place to go!

name: Samuel Sternberg
text:
I had been dealing with back issues since I was 23. I went to around 18 different Chiropractors between the time I was 23 to 34 . They were helpful but either couldn't alleviate  the pain or had the worse bedside manner so I was always looking for that one great doctor. I found Jason when I was around 35 because I was working a job that required alot of lifting and carrying of a 28 foot extention ladder over long distances about 15 times a day. I had gotten to the point that it caused me such pain to even bend over to tie my shoes that I couldn't take it.

I found Dr Hart at Sturbridge on Taylor Rd. I saw him therethere for a few years and I followed him after he left to start his own practice because he was the most skilled Chiropractor I had ever been to see, but also because of his regard for people and how he saw the way their wallets and insurance plans were treated. What I mean there without going into a full out explanation is, Dr Jason Hart is one of those doctors you rarely find, he cares much more about you and your well being than he does about your wallet.

I'm 45 now and had it not been for Jason and the lengths he goes to for his patients/friends, to learn his craft inside and out like no other.....well I would still be suffering day to day with a great deal of pain. He is the best Chiropractor in the area and genuinely cares about the people he is treating. I couldn't recommend a Chiropractor more than this guy.

resp.text: Samuel, thank you for your kind words!

I walked to the front desk to ask if I was going to be seen or not. Seeing me walk to the front desk the staff there said Oh, sorry. He has been held up with someone. So they did not care till we walked to the front desk. Minimum courtesy you keep your patients informed if there is going to be a delay. No one cared to come and talk to us.
Everyone's time is valuable. Does not matter what profession they are in.

Dr. Sherman Connell

name: Justice Writer
text:
Amanda Holland is not professional. She does not fit the description of a doctor because not only does not take time to speak with her patients about their medical care, nor does she even care enough to listen. She had the audacity to say that she was “… too busy to speak to me… and that her staff was busy as well.

But, once she webs a new patient into her office, she loses focus on that patient focusing on her mission of gathering “…new…” patients. She even said, “… since you don’t have a job… you need to come in the mornings because our office is too busy in the afternoons…”. What a shame.

She should consider a different professional because she is terrible at what she pretends to be doing now. She concentrates too much on trying to peddle her cool therapy ware and not enough on getting to the root of the pain problems of her new patients. We will never go back to her.

resp.text: Good morning, this is Dr. Sherman Connell.  I have taken over the practice after Dr. Holland's passing in October 0f 2015.  I apologize that you had a bad experience at the office.  Please feel free to contact us and we'd welcome the opportunity to give you a much better experience.

name: Lauren King
text: I'm honestly appalled at this practice. We came here in hopes of getting our problems fixed, already explaining that we have financial problems and may have to cancel in the future if we get to where we can't afford it. After running this payment program for a month, we got into a bind with bills and found we couldn't keep up with paying over $400 a month just for adjustments. We have a 10 month old to take care of, we have to make sure our bills are paid. We decide to cancel, me and my sister, and were met with almost immediate change in behavior. My last two adjustments, I was rushed out of the building without even getting my TENS therapy. It hasn't been 30 days since we canceled and today, my sister receives a bill in the mail claiming she owes over $900 for several things. I'll make sure I post pictures of this bill with her information cut out. To break this down, we came in on a special $20 that they had going for the evaluation and X Ray. On this bill, she was charged $20 for each. $35 to process the x Ray. $55 for each adjustment. $35 for each therapy session (tens unit). $7 dollars everytime they placed an ICE PACK on her back. It was several of these adding up to $914 and some change. This was absolutely the most  ridiculous thing I've seen from a practice. I do NOT recommend going here, they will ring you for every penny they can get and the mask falls off as soon as you run into financial difficulties. No one should ever be scammed like this. We will be getting copies of our original paper work and attempting to find a lawyer. I'm beyond disgusted at this point. Pictures have been posted.

resp.text:
Thank you for your feedback. We have great reviews and patient outcomes, but no one is 100% all of the time. With insurance companies raising deductibles every year, health care can be expensive. That’s why we treat every patient the way we would want to be treated...with an initial workup, a report, a plan of care (if requested) and we present the cost of care and payment options up front, so all patients can make the best decision for their situation. Unfortunately, some patients are met with unforeseen circumstances. When that happened in the past with others, we were willing and able to work with patients who had difficulties and still needed to continue their care.  If you expressed a desire to continue and we didn’t understand, Please accept our apologies. Feel free to contact us so we can uncross our wires.

Your concerns will be brought up at our next staff meeting. Balancing the patient’s need for results while keeping payments affordable is the most challenging aspect in healthcare today. We will use this opportunity to explore all options to render the best care to all while balancing their need for affordability.
We appreciate the opportunity to serve you. We wish things would have ended under better circumstances. And we wish you and your sister the very best for you future healthcare needs.

text: Stay away. This is a scam. Our friends went here and changed their kid's diet completely because they were told she had leaky gut. We were interested in neurofeedback for our daughter (completely different diagnosis than our friend's kid) and were told the exact same thing was 'wrong with our kid as our friend's were told with their kid. We were also told that she would not take our kid on for neurofeedback unless we did the dietary changes and bought supplements. Makes me wonder how many other kids' parents have been told their child has "leaky gut".

name: Cindy Munisteri
text: I have been going to Dr. Kyle Lopez once a week for chiropractic adjustments since 2005.  I have scoliosis (from childhood) which has caused me many health problems through my life, like having sinusitis and allergies several times per year and severe pain in my lower back, neck, and left hip & leg.  I never put much faith in chiropractors before, but Dr. Kyle & Renee are different along with the Maximized Living essential tenets.  They take a more Biblical view that our bodies were designed & created by God to function perfectly and to be able to heal itself as long as there is no interference along the spine and central nervous system.  Since I have been going to Lopez Family Chiropractic, I no longer take any prescription anti-inflammatory drugs or antibiotics or any over-the-counter medicines, but I have not gotten sick at all in the past 8 years.  Many times I have been surrounded by very sick co-workers with colds or flu and I stayed healthy.  I follow the 5 essentials of Maximized Living including exercise, a healthy diet, weekly adjustments to keep my nerve supply flowing from my brain to all parts of my body, and minimizing toxins in my environment. I feel great and have more energy now than I did ten years ago!  Another great thing about Lopez Family Chiropractic is the educational seminars on various health topics, exercise and food tips, dinners & make-over events, and the caring, family atmosphere at the clinic.  I have learned so much to enhance my life and gained information to share with friends and family to help them get on the road to healthy lives.  I am grateful to Dr. Kyle and Dr. Renee and their office staff for all they do to help me live a long and healthy life with a clear mind and no pain.

resp.text: We are grateful to be part of your life!

name: CINDY MCKENZIE
text: I love Dr. Kyle & Dr. Renee, they are awesome Doctors & they both love there patients, They are truly concerned about my well being.  I have been a patient since early in November of 2015, I feel amazing, the aches and pains of before are gone! I highly recommend Lopez Family Chiropractic. The office staff are amazing, helpful, and easy to work with.

name: Jim Kincaid
text: I attended the practice for 2 months while visiting family during their cancer treatment. I can't speak highly enough of the kindness and professionalism of the entire staff! They know how to make any aged person feel right at home (as I have witnessed doctor/patient interactions with kids to the elderly) and are always smiling and upbeat. The PMF machine worked wonders for me personally, which you should ask about, and the weekly adjustments helped me to regain posture and flexibility I didn't realize was missing (at 30, the limberness of youth starts decreasing noticeably). Thanks again Dr.Kyle, Dr.Renee, Amanda, and Nicole for all you guys do!

I love the Nice, Christian Atmosphere!! I have been going for 2 months, and my neck pain is gone, and I had some serious knee pain, and Dr. Kyle has improved that so much. I was headed for injections in the knee's but now, I won't have to do that.  Amanda and Nicole are awesome!!!!!
Darla Walker

resp.text: Great!

name: Mrgrtk2u
text:
I have been a member of this "family" for ten years. During that time, I have experienced health in ways that I never thought possible. The clinic is dedicated to educating people on various aspects of health. I was totally clueless as to how "real" health looked. When I came to Maximized Living, I was actively searching for a  a full night's sleep,  (I have it!) Weight loss and weight management ( in the process), managing hormones (YES!) optimal health--a body that didn't crash and burn at every opportunity. I have achieved all of this and more. Through Lopez Family Chiropractic, I have learned to tap into the power that is already there to achieve my health goals. They have helped me through this process  by providing research-based applications designed to bring me back to a healthier state. When I joined, I could not swing a golf club, (limited range) I can now engage in a full and powerful swing with no strain.

I could write a book about how far I have come, and  the testimonies of friends who have joined. I am a life-timer and a fan of Lopez Family Chiropractic.

text: Always friendly, and always feel better after an adjustment. Cares about the whole body not just the spine. Thank you!

name: Tammy Huffaker
text: We love, love, love the Lopez Family Chiropractic Clinic!  They have helped our family strive for health excellence for over five years now.  We have learned how to take care of our bodies without chemicals.  We have learned how our bodies work and why our chiropractic adjustments are so important.  We have also learned how to treat certain ailments such as acid reflux, colds/flu, viruses naturally and without chemical prescriptions.  We are so thankful to have found them when we did.  Our 3 week old baby girl would projectile vomit everyday when we first visited them.  Within 2-3 weeks of chiropractic adjustments she didn't do this anymore!!!  I used to have sinus infections at least 4 times a year.  I took asthma and allergy prescriptions everyday.  I thought that was how I would always live because that's what the rest of my extended family did.  After all the knowledge I was given by the clinic and the change of lifestyle/diet I haven't had a sinus infection in over three years!!!  I haven't taken an antibiotic in over five years!  It is fabulous!!!

text: Dr. Thompson and staff are very genuine and knowledgeable. We were not treated like just a number. Too often when seeking treatment for ailments, it's about getting you in and out as fast as possible. Not here. Very caring and professional.

I'm certain my specialist will get a chuckle when I tell him that this chiropractor already figured out how to cure all my problems.

resp.text: Hi John, thank you for offering us your candid opinion of the care we provide at our office.  I did enjoy our interaction and was surprised by this review. I see that you also had questions about our treatment plan for you.  The heart of our office strives to provide each patient with quality care that is specific to each patient’s need.  In my evaluation of your needs, I felt the best course of action was the specific alignment of your spine.  I would welcome the opportunity to discuss this with you further, please do not hesitate to contact our office.

He superseded my expectations and I will forever be thankful ! If you are undecided about the chiropractor I promise you won’t be disappointed!

name: Elle's Reptiles (elle622)
text:
I'm so happy that I found this office! For well over a year after my son was born, I had chronic migraines (only 3-4 days a month WITHOUT a migraine or headache). My doctor had me try several different medications, but none of them worked. After much debate, I finally decided to try the chiropractor - I'm not sure why I was so skeptical. After about a month, I've only had 2 migraines, which is absolutely wonderful.
The staff are all great. They're super nice and professional, always explain what's going on, and are happy to answer any questions. Dr. Alex's enthusiasm for what he does definitely had me hooked. If you're thinking about seeing a chiropractor to help with migraines or headaches, this is your place! :)

name: Bryan Landreth
text:
Dr. Alex and his staff were all around amazing. I could not say enough awesome things about this place. Everyone’s friendly and really makes sure you enjoy every visit.
This was my first time going to a chiropractor. My lower back was hurting for years. From getting out of bed in the morning, to taking my boots off in the evening. Now i live back pain free!!! I don't even think about it anymore! Highly recommend.

name: Leslee Gaston
text:
Okay... so I’m going to start by saying I’m skeptical about chiropractors... BUT Dr. Waldeck is worth it! I couldn’t fathom paying this much money to a doctor until now.

I’ve always been the patient that lacked commitment because I never could find what I needed. I would get discouraged and stop going after a few sessions. After visiting a few other chiropractors in Athens, I wasn’t having any pain relief. Sometimes, I’d leave in more pain than when I walked in. I expressed these concerns with Dr. Waldeck, and he took me seriously. I walk out pain free every time.

He is the only doctor ever that has been able to pop my back in multiple spots. My entire life, I’ve had one person be able to pop my back well until this point.

The staff is absolutely amazing as well. They are always welcoming and encouraging. They truly care about their patients. The thoroughness the whole staff exhibits is also shocking. They make sure everything is covered and you leave without pain. They ask after every session if it was okay. They are helpful, kind, and patient when I am confused or struggling. They also remember little details about my personal life and ask me about them every time I’m there. It makes me feel more comfortable while I’m there.

Overall, this has been, is, and will hopefully continue to be the best experience of my life. I look forward to going to every appointment (even though it takes me thirty minutes to get there and thirty minutes home after a long day at work!).

Seriously... try Dr. Waldeck. He is worth your time and money. I promise.

name: Claire Koenig
text: LOVE this place!!! The staff is so friendly and Dr. Alex has helped me so much! My back and hip pain is practically non-existent these days! They also are very easy to schedule with (which is so helpful when life gets busy)

Always a good experience here, you always feel welcome and like family.
Alex takes the time to go over your problems and treatment with you and makes sure all your questions are answered to your satisfaction.

I was here for only a short time working and Alex achieved great results in a short time, I really wish I could take you guys back  to Georgia with me.
Thanks guys.

text: Awesome doctor and team! I highly recommend using Dr. Waldeck he is by far the best!

text: I tried to come here for my back pain.  They said they would only do a consultation on the first visit. I needed treatment because I was in so much pain. All the doctor wanted to do was take X-rays and send me home. It really feels like they are just trying to make more money... I don't like to complain but I feel like everyone needs to know. Also the receptionist is very hard to understand!!! I was even willing to wait as long as it took for the doctor to catch up and have time to look at the x-rays but still nobody was willing to help me. At all. They need to be more reasonable. For some people paying for one more visit is really hard. Especially for families with multiple children!!! I know they have to stick with their schedule, but sometimes I think it is good to make exceptions for special situations. Especially people in severe pain!!! I recommend you choose you're chiropractor wisely!!!

name: Lauren Murphy
text: I am about halfway through the best decision I have made all year! I'm only 28 and I had so much back pain, but did not understand why. My spine was totally out if whack. I took the leap to head to the chiropractor and landed in Dr. Alex's office. He has helped me so so much in the past few weeks during the whole process. I was having pains from muscle to nerve pain and now I barely hurt at all. I haven't had a single tension headache or taken even 1 ibuprofen in weeks!!! You can live a better and almost pain free life. I look forward to going to my appointments because it feels like I'm going to visit a friend. He and his staff are so cheerful and welcoming. They really make sure you get the best care possible. You're a patient and not a paycheck! Add chiropractor care to your regular exercise and healthy eating routine or just add it even if you dont have an exercise plan! You'll feel so good, you may even start to live a more active life! Do yourself a favor, give them a call and start living your best life! It'll be the best decision you've made all year too! - Lauren

text: I sought help from Dr. Alex out of total desperation. I was in a really bad car wreck a couple of years ago that has left me in intense pain ever since. name: Andrew Massey
text: I have degenerative discs and had been getting shots for years and it wasn't helping. I decided to try this before surgery and I am finally getting some relief. Dr. Jumper, Hannah, and Nicki are always nice and fast. I would recommend them to everyone.

name: Matt Lesley
text: Friendly staff, and most importantly quality care! I feel great! What more can you ask for??

name: Erika Berry
text: PLEASE READ! The office manager at this business is ABSOLUTELY THE MOST RUDE AND DISRESPECTFUL PERSON I HAVE EVER SPOKEN TOO. I came in probably 7 months ago, It was my first visit to ever see a chiropractor, and was in a lot of pain. I paid like $150-$175  that day just because I told them SPECIFICALLY that I did not want a bill in the mail and I would pay whatever that day just to go ahead and get it out of the way. I saw Dr. Jumper and he was very nice and helpful. I thought that I was going to be very pleased with my experience. 6 MONTHS LATER, I received a bill in the mail from them asking me for $35. Soon after I received the bill in the mail I gave them a call to ask some questions about my bill. She began to tell me that I still owed $35 and that the lady that I was working with got fired because of doing stuff like this and not charging me the full amount. I begin to tell her what I paid that day and I asked specifically if I could take care of it the day of the visit. I then asked her if she could just take care of it for me because it was not my mistake it was the employees. Her tone immediately changed and she said "You still have to pay your bill regardless and if you don't we will be reporting you to collections." I tried to explain to her that I am a loyal customer and I just do not think it is right for me to have to pay this and she kept talking over me and raising her voice. THEN, SHE HUNG UP ON ME. Today I receive a phone call from the business and I was on the other line and could not answer, and immediately call back, and no answer. The point of the matter is, IF YOU ARE RUNNING A LOCAL BUSINESS, YOU ARE TRYING TO IMPROVE YOUR CLIENTELE. IF AN EMPLOYEE DOES SOMETHING WRONG, YOU DO WHATEVER YOU NEED TO DO TO MAKE SURE THAT CUSTOMER IS SATISFIED. REGARDLESS. If you are looking for a local chiropractor DO NOT go to this business unless you are wanting to get SCAMMED. It was not the money aspect, but the fact they were not worried about satisfying the customer and doing what is right.

resp.text: Erika Berry, we're very sorry to hear about your experience.  Please send us an email or give us a call - we'd love to talk with you more about your experience and see if there is anything we can do to remedy the issue.  Whatever happens, we're grateful for your honesty and patronage.

text: I love Dr. Buckner and his staff! He cuts to the chase and gets you back on track without lengthy sales pitches. I especially like the early and late appt times and the availability of walking in without appts as well.

name: A
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. This is the type of chiropractor that everyone warns you about. The reviews are all wrong. He gave me false hope, thinking he was an great chiropractor that uses Gonstead methods when he really sees you for <2 minutes and does the same exact adjustment every single time. He proposes a “treatment plan,” which is just a tactic to get you to come in more often and to take all your money, and knowingly pulls you into the trap by guilting you. He seems caring the first time around, but gets more and more careless. He seems to rush you through the appointments. Good chiropractors on the internet, like Dr Rahim and Dr Mondragon, see their patients for 30-40 minutes, not 1-2! He even places some chiropractic instruments in his offices, but they are just decoys because he never uses them! I hoped for so much more but I am very disappointed.

name: Laura Smith
text: I absolutely love Dr. Buckner and his staff. I have three kids and if I have to bring them with me the staff helps me out so much with my kids so my appt goes smoothly. The facility is very nice and very comfortable.

I experienced immediate relief after the first adjustment and I feel great today. Also while you're there treat yourself to an amazing massage. You will not be disappointed! Highly recommend!

I also had great success with the masseuse, Jackie Wing. Her technique is outstanding, and she’s extremely friendly. She also fixed a problem with my arm that I had been experiencing for a long time.

The staff is friendly, and their new digs behind the Kroger on 72 is comfortable, clean, and neat.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

name: Amanda Bassham
text: I really liked Dr.  Buckner. He's very knowledgeable and kind. I've been on a treatment plan for almost a month for my neck, and it's helped me a lot. Recently I fell of my horse, and Dr.Buckner adjustment brought me some much needed relief.  I would definitely recommend him!

Making an appointment to see Dr. Buckner was the best decision I have made in a long time.  I am on the road to recovery!  Dr. Buckner is my new best friend :-)

name: Denise Chatman
text: Dr. Buckner and his staff are amazing!  If anyone was to ask me if I know a good chiropractor, I would recommend Dr. Buckner to anyone in need of pain relief. name: Fidelity Lynnel
text: My experience there is great! Staff are friendly and nice! Dr. Buckner is so nice and he really cares about the patient. He explained to me my situation very well and I have fully understand why I was having some pains compare to some other doctors telling me that my pains were all results of getting older and because it was part of being a woman/mother.. like there was no hope for me to feel better.. I felt better after my first visit and I am positive that I will feel a way better after few more adjustments and therapies. I am so impressed that Dr. Buckner called me to check on me after my visit..which is really nice of him. I really recommend Dr. Buckner for your chiropractic needs! ~ Faith Shope

name: Denise Chatman
text: Dr. Buckner and his staff are amazing!  If anyone was to ask me if I know a good chiropractor, I would recommend Dr. Buckner to anyone in need of pain relief.  He's thorough and incredibly informative.  The staff is always incredibly nice and really make you feel like family every time you come in.

name: Charles Doublin
text:
I 100% recommend Dr. Buckner and his practice, everyone is very nice and is apparent they care about you.  As soon as you walk through the door you are greeted with smiles and warmth, with the ability to chat with everyone before your session begins.

It's really nice to walk into a place where customer service is placed ahead of you "just being there."

I highly recommend Dr. Buckner and his staff if you are not sure or uncertain about going to a Chiropractor, Dr. Buckner and his staff will comfort you, just as they did me on my first visit.

name: Zak
text: This place is just amazing! The staff are all very nice and well trained. The facility is nice, well maintained, and has a comforable atmosphere. I have been dealing with pain and hitting walls in my treatment since I returned from Afghanistan two years ago and was about to give up before I was seen by Dr. Wylie. He is great at what he does and is the first person that actually makes me feel like my only options are living in pain or surgery. Buckner Chiropractic Center is a blessing to me.

name: Chantelle Rogers
text: After going through 2+ months of treatment from Dr.Buckner I can do nothing but sing his praises! He knows how to adjust everything back like it should be and has taught me how to train my muscles so that they can correctly support my bones in the proper place. With a clean office, courteous staff, and treatment that works they are the absolute best!!!

name: Band Booster
text:
Great group of professionals who work together to help you feel better.  The doctors and the staff are not only friendly and helpful, they care.  They have become a part of my extended family.  I would recommend anyone to go visit them!  They have helped me get better and stay pain free!
Connie Allen

name: Deitrick Smart
text: Let me tell you.  I really enjoyed my visit at Dr. Buckner's office today. It was a very professional environment, filled with fun loving people.  Dr. Buckner, was very thorough on what wrong and the best way to fix it, including his staff.

name: Frederick Moxley III
text: Buckner Chiropractic Center is a great place.  If you like high quality staff and friendly service, this is the place for you.  They will make sure that you are provided with the essential care you need, in a timely and customized way.  The facility is equipped with plenty of state-of-the-art items, including a exercise room, massage table, stimulation therapy, and a stretch table.  Moreover, if you enjoy caffeinated beverages, they are provided complimentary to guests at the front desk.  This makes for a good precursor to any visit, or even for a nice drink on your way out.  Buckner Chiropractic Center is the way to go for world class health care.

name: Jessica Wright
text: I have been so grateful to have found Dr. Buckner when I moved to Huntsville. He is very knowledgeable and has a wonderful background in patient care. He treats each person like they are his only patient, and his staff is wonderful as well, always willing to help me set my appointments around my crazy and ever-changing schedule. I would recommend Dr. Buckner to anyone looking for a personal and thoughtful chiropractor in the Huntsville/Madison area!

name: Gregg Frost
text: Dr. Buckner and his team offer a variety of services focused on patient care. Wonderful staff. Convenient location just all 72. I have received excellent treatment.

name: Wendy Ham (Eat, Shop, Tour!)
text: The entire Buckner Chiropractic staff is amazing!  They genuinely care about each and every customer.  Love the card swipe to check in, though there is always someone there to welcome me by name as well, and the same card swipe to pull up my electronic medical records.  I work in a fairly high tech environment so I appreciate that this office uses the latest methods to help their office run smoothly.  I never have to wait, even if I am early for my appointment.  I can't say enough good things about them.  Thank you Buckner team!

name: Derick Honoré
text: I have been going to different chiropractors for the last 3 years. The staff at Buckner are amazing and it is the first place that I have felt that they care more about my health than money. I really feel like part of a family here. This is also the first time I have really felt hope of being rid of my reoccurring back issues. Dr. Buckner also does such a great job with our kids! Love this place and can't say enough good things about it!

name: Phil King
text: I've gone here nearly a year and never had a problem. The staff is great and very knowledgeable.

name: Ashley Hodges
text: For years I have avoided the chiropractor. I can't stand to be popped. I bit the bullet and came to Buckner after seeing multiple doctors in the area. I was having health issues that no one could explain. During my first visit I was scared and shaking like a leaf. My X-rays showed the problem and Dr. Buckner had a solution. I can't say I enjoy being popped but he and his staff certainly make me feel comfortable and welcome. After several visits I can tell a huge difference. I feel so much better! I now look forward to being adjusted.

name: Sheena Williams
text: I highly recommend Dr. Fountain at Buckner Chiropractic to anyone who needs chiropractic care. Dr. Fountain is an absolutely wonderful, compassionate, friendly, in-depth and professional doctor. She spends time getting to know her patients and developing treatments to meet their specific needs. She is very thorough; at my first visit she asked a lot of questions, listened to my concerns and provided answers. She also utilized my x-rays, pictures/diagrams and a skeletal to help me understand what was going on with me. I was extremely nervous for my first adjustment but she was very kind and talked me through the process. In addition, the staff is very friendly and the office is clean, organized and welcoming. We are only 4 weeks into my treatment plan and it’s amazing how much my pain has been alleviated.

name: Jayme Berstell
text: I came to Dr. Buckner with a lot of pain, and I can see an improvement with every visit.  He was genuinely concerned.  He set up a plan for me to get better that showed me that he wanted to fix the problem, instead of just wanting me to be a regular customer.  What surprised me was that the staff instantly formed a relationship with me.  They know who I am when I come in and if they see me out in town, they say hi and ask me how I'm doing.  I feel that they genuinely care and want to see me get better, and the treatments are definitely working.

In addition, I was recently diagnosed with Meniere's Disease, and Dr. Wylie's adjustments have helped considerably with the dizziness - and I've drastically cut back on that medication. text:
I have been going to Dr Buckner for the past 6 weeks. I have had back pains for as long as I can remember, which I thought came from lifting items in the past that hurt my back and I just  never addressed the pain. The pain was getting to be unbearable. I wasn't sleeping good..new mattress and pillows didnt work to alleviate the pain. I was waking up with swollen legs and feet..bent over in pain..just miserable.
I went as part of a Groupon I purchased for the massage(excellent by the way)for the back and neck pains I had been having. This was my first time ever going to a chiropractor and now I wonder why I waited so long. This has been life changing for me. After my FIRST visit I could tell and feel the difference. The pain wasn't as severe and I could bend and touch my toes..where I hadn't been able to do in years.
I work customer service on the phones for 40+ hours a week and sit down the majority of the time. This isn't healthy for anyone. It puts a lot of pressure on your legs, hips and lower back. For this reason alone I recommend anyone who has a sit down job to visit Dr Buckner to get relief from the pain you are enduring on a daily basis.
Dr Buckner, Mrs Lori, Kayla, Tiffany and Chris are all awesome. They are providing a service and they genuinely care about YOU!
Check them out..you won't regret it.

text: I've been going to Dr. Buckner for adjustments for almost 2 months now. The staff is incredible and always greating you with a smile. I have my life back thanks to this wonderful group of people.

name: Joanne Petree
text: I definitely recommend Dr. Buckner. He and his staff are exceptional in the way they greet you to the way they treat you! I found them through Groupon first and then did some research. I bought the Groupon and used it today. I was treated to a one hour massage by Tiffany who is highly experienced! I have never had a massage where someone absolutely focuses on you pressure points and pain. She released stress, pain and pressure that was causing my neck, shoulders and back to lock up and become immobile. Then I had my consultation with Dr. Buckner and had an X-ray taken.  He was so thorough going over my X-ray and pin pointing the problems. Dr. Buckner finished up the appointment by adjusting my neck, shoulders and back. I was very scared at first to have this done because of the pain I've been experiencing. I already feel so much better. I will continue seeing he and Tiffany until I can get back to good health! I highly recommend them!

name: Lisa Hazard
text:
I can’t recommend this office, the doctor, the staff and the quality of services enough. If I were to attempt to do this, I might end up with a thesis.

I’ve been seeing the chiropractor, Dr. Brown, here for a few months. Originally, I sought out chiropractor help for a foot disorder which surgeons recommended surgery for, but it’s a brutal surgery. I already tried surgery once for this issue and it came back 10 years later.

While seeking surgical advice this time around, I told the surgeons I felt like my back and hips couldn’t take the recovery from the Achilles’ Tendon surgery because Ow! They did MRIs and found 4 compressed discs, 3 compressed nerves in my back.

It’s been 3 months and no surgery so far! He’s willing to try different things and learn more about treating all of the conditions in each visit. I just got home from my 14th trip. When I went in, it had been over a week and Ow! I walked out of there 45 minutes later feeling a lot younger than 46. Key word in that sentence is “walked.” Now that I’ve been home a while, I could skip! I will sleep well tonight!

I’m in Decatur and dislike driving, but travel to this office is worth it and I look forward to the visits so much that I even enjoy the drive.

The staff treats everyone like friends and the place is full of healing energy and good vibes. The doctor is easy to talk with and explains everything perfectly. Medical experiences ~ not many are good. Every time I’ve been to this office, it IS a good experience.

Thank you, Dr. Brown and staff, for everything you do to help! I appreciate you guys more than you know!

resp.text: Thank You Lisa

name: Toni Rose
text: I can now go down stairs WITHOUT having knee pain!!!   No more back pain either!  Thank you to Dr. Brown for your skill and dedication in what you do.  Thanks also to the great staff.  They are truly encouraging, knowledgeable  and caring.  I feel like I am visiting friends.  Keep up the great work!  Five stars for this group.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Keith Williams
text:
My experience and treatment at Millar Chiropractic in Madison has been excellent. All the staff members; Jessica, Lucy, Ashley, Madison, Shannon, and Alex have been exceptionally kind, caring, professional, and are very knowledgeable of their profession. Not only this, but they have shown a great deal of compassion given the pain that I was in.
I have gotten to know all of them and have grown to like and respect each and everyone of them. Never have I looked forward to any of my medical appointments like I do to Millar Chiropractic. Each time I walk into their office I am welcomed with a very friendly greeting; they make me feel at home with their first words. It is indeed a pleasure to be one of their patients.
Dr. Justin beyond any doubt, is the most knowledgeable and professional Chiropractor I’ve ever been to; and I’ve been to many. His methods and standard practices have been very effective, and I feel like I’m well on my way to recovery.
One thing that you don’t find in most medical practices these days is a Doctor who will sit down with you and discuss every detail of your treatment. Dr. Justin will spend as much time with you as you need to ask questions, so that you fully understand how your treatment will progress.
I highly recommend Millar Chiropractic

text: I get quality care at Millar but one thing does bother me.  I think they must severely underpay staff.  I have been a patient there for almost 3 years and the number of turnover they have with office staff and assistants who provide the therapies is extremely high.  I go in every 3-4 weeks for treatment and there is a new face every time I go in.  It makes it hard to get to know anyone and just when an assistant gets to know me and how I prefer my treatments/therapies, they are gone.

resp.text: We're glad you continue to get quality care at the Madison clinic. Please know we pay our staff very well. What you may not realize is some of our staff at Madison have been with us for over 5 years. Over the last year, we've have had a rash of pregnancies and promotions. We've had three staff pregnancies and one promotion. For instance, our front desk recently went out on pregnancy leave and has decided to not return and be a stay-at-home mom. Our Doctor's Chiropractic Assistant was promoted to the office manager at another one of our clinics. Yes, we have lots of new faces; but, all are high quality team members well trained to do their job.  Thanks for your concern. Dr Greg Millar

name: Anita Mintz
text:
Caring Doctor and staff. Been coming to this location for years.

Update: I fell and injured my back (herniated discs) which brought on sciatica pain the likes I could have never imagined. Dr. Justine and Dr. Christian have gone above and beyond! Everyone has been great at getting me in, helping with work issues, and genuinely concern for my well being. When my MRI results came back, Dr. Greg Millar went over them with me and explained what was needed. There was no pressure for me to agree to treatment. I was encouraged to bring my husband in, so they could go over the results with him, since my  insurance would not cover part of treatment. Dr. Justine went over everything with my husband and myself the following day, took time to answer all questions. I can't  say enough great things about these doctor's.  I have been going to Millar's in Madison for 10 years or so and they have made my life better. I have other health issues so a quick "adjustment " is not my norm!! So when one thing does not work, they try something else until we find the right formula.  My sciatica was unbearable in February, but I am seeing the light at the end of the tunnel, with hope that the worst is behind me. I can not recommend this office highly enough!
